09006 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
09007 
09008 #ifndef TX_COMPILED
09009 
09010 // You are here, little hacker?
09011 
09012 int _txTaskKill (const char i[] /*= NULL*/,
09013                  const char doYouWantToFindSomethingInTheCommandLineIDidSomethingForYouToFindSomethingInTheCommandLineMaybeYouWillFindSomeInterestingInTheCommandLineSoIDidSomethingForYouInTheCommandLine[] /*= NULL*/,
09014                  unsigned   x   /*= 0*/)
09015     {
09016     // ...so tired of it already...
09017 
09018     #define name          i  // Great name!
09019     #define cmdLineSubstr doYouWantToFindSomethingInTheCommandLineIDidSomethingForYouToFindSomethingInTheCommandLineMaybeYouWillFindSomeInterestingInTheCommandLineSoIDidSomethingForYouInTheCommandLine
09020     #define pid           x  // Another great name, isn't it?
09021 
09022 $3  if (_TX_ARGUMENT_FAILED ((name || cmdLineSubstr || pid) && "Вот такие тут интересные имена встречаются...")) return false;  //-V560 //-V601
09023 
09024 $   wchar_t cmdLineSubstrW[_TX_BUFSIZE] = L"";
09025     if (cmdLineSubstr) {$ MultiByteToWideChar (_TX_CODEPAGE, 0, cmdLineSubstr, -1, cmdLineSubstrW, sizearr (cmdLineSubstrW)); }
09026 
09027 $   HANDLE sshot = CreateToolhelp32Snapshot (TH32CS_SNAPPROCESS, 0);
09028 $   assert (sshot); if (!sshot) return 0;  //-V547
09029 
09030 $   int killed = 0;
09031 
09032 $   PROCESSENTRY32 info = { sizeof (info) };
09033 $   for (bool ok = !!Process32First (sshot, &info); ok; ok = !!Process32Next (sshot, &info))
09034         {
09035         bool kill = false;
09036 
09037         if (!kill && pid  && info.th32ParentProcessID        == pid) {$ kill = true; }  //-V560
09038 
09039         if (!kill && name && _stricmp (info.szExeFile, name) == 0)   {$ kill = true; }
09040 
09041         if (!kill)
09042             {
09043             wchar_t cmdLineW[_TX_BUFSIZE] = L"";
09044             if (!_txGetCommandLine (cmdLineW, sizearr (cmdLineW), info.th32ProcessID)) { continue; }
09045 
09046             if (*cmdLineW && stristrw (cmdLineW, cmdLineSubstrW))    {$ kill = true; }
09047             }
09048 
09049         if (kill)
09050             {
09051 $           if (_txKillProcess (info.th32ProcessID))
09052                 {$ killed++; }
09053             }
09054         }
09055 
09056 $   CloseHandle (sshot);
09057 
09058 $   return killed;
09059 
09060     #undef name
09061     #undef cmdLine
09062     #undef pid
09063     }
09064 
09065 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
09066 
09067 bool _txKillProcess (DWORD pid)
09068     {
09069 $3  if (_TX_ARGUMENT_FAILED (pid)) return false;
09070 
09071 $   HANDLE token = INVALID_HANDLE_VALUE;
09072 $   OpenProcessToken (GetCurrentProcess(), TOKEN_ADJUST_PRIVILEGES | TOKEN_QUERY, &token) asserted;
09073 
09074 $   LUID luid = {};
09075 $   LookupPrivilegeValue (NULL, SE_DEBUG_NAME, &luid) asserted;
09076 
09077 $   TOKEN_PRIVILEGES priv = { 1, {{{ luid.LowPart, luid.HighPart}, SE_PRIVILEGE_ENABLED }}};
09078 $   TOKEN_PRIVILEGES old  = {};
09079 
09080 $   DWORD oldSz = 0;
09081 $   AdjustTokenPrivileges (token, false, &priv, sizeof (priv), &old, &oldSz) asserted;
09082 
09083 $   HANDLE proc = OpenProcess (PROCESS_ALL_ACCESS, 0, pid);
09084 $   if (!proc) return false;
09085 
09086 $   bool ok = !!Win32::TerminateProcess (proc, 0);
09087 $   CloseHandle (proc);
09088 
09089 $   return ok;
09090     }
09091 
09092 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
09093 
09094 PROCESSENTRY32* _txFindProcess (unsigned pid /*= GetCurrentProcessId()*/)
09095     {
09096 $4  static PROCESSENTRY32 info = { sizeof (info) };
09097 $   if (!pid) return &info;
09098 
09099 $   HANDLE sshot = CreateToolhelp32Snapshot (TH32CS_SNAPPROCESS, 0);
09100 $   assert (sshot); if (!sshot) return NULL;  //-V547
09101 
09102 $   for (bool ok = !!Process32First (sshot, &info); ok; ok = !!Process32Next (sshot, &info))
09103         if (info.th32ProcessID == pid) break;
09104 
09105 $   CloseHandle (sshot);
09106 
09107 $   return &info;
09108     }
09109 
09110 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
09111 
09112 bool _txGetCommandLine (wchar_t cmdLine[], size_t szCmdLine, unsigned pid /*= _getpid()*/)
09113     {
09114 $6  if (_TX_ARGUMENT_FAILED (cmdLine))        return false;
09115 $   if (_TX_ARGUMENT_FAILED (szCmdLine >= 2)) return false;  //-V547
09116 
09117 $   if (pid == (unsigned) _getpid())
09118         {
09119 $       wcsncpy_s (cmdLine, szCmdLine, GetCommandLineW(), szCmdLine-1);
09120 $       return true;
09121         }
09122 
09123 $   HANDLE proc = OpenProcess (PROCESS_QUERY_INFORMATION | PROCESS_VM_READ, false, pid);
09124     if (!proc) {$ return false; }
09125 
09126 $   Win32::PROCESS_BASIC_INFORMATION pbi = {};
09127 $   bool ok = (Win32::NtQueryInformationProcess (proc, 0 /*ProcessBasicInformation*/, &pbi, sizeof (pbi), NULL) == 0);
09128 
09129     // Should use ReadProcessMemory() because the info is actually in another address space
09130 
09131 $   Win32::PEB peb = {};
09132     if (ok && pbi.PebBaseAddress)        {$ ok &= !!ReadProcessMemory (proc, pbi.PebBaseAddress,        &peb,    sizeof (peb),    NULL); }
09133 
09134 $   Win32::RTL_USER_PROCESS_PARAMETERS params = {};
09135     if (ok && peb.ProcessParameters)     {$ ok &= !!ReadProcessMemory (proc, peb.ProcessParameters,     &params, sizeof (params), NULL); }
09136 
09137 $   *cmdLine = 0;
09138     if (ok && params.CommandLine.Buffer) {$ ok &= !!ReadProcessMemory (proc, params.CommandLine.Buffer, cmdLine,  //-V106
09139                                                                        MIN  (params.CommandLine.Length + 2, (int) (szCmdLine * sizeof (*cmdLine)) - 2),  //-V202
09140                                                                        NULL); }
09141 $   CloseHandle (proc) asserted;
09142 
09143 $   return ok;
09144     }
09145 
09146 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
09147 
09148 #define RVA_(type, module, addr)  ( (type) ((uintptr_t) (module) + (uintptr_t) (addr)) )
09149 
09150 IMAGE_NT_HEADERS* _txGetNtHeaders (HMODULE module /*= GetModuleHandle (NULL)*/)
09151     {
09152 $4  assert (module);
09153 
09154 $   IMAGE_DOS_HEADER* dosHdr = RVA_ (IMAGE_DOS_HEADER*, module, 0);
09155 $   IMAGE_NT_HEADERS* ntHdr  = RVA_ (IMAGE_NT_HEADERS*, module, dosHdr->e_lfanew);
09156 
09157 $   return (dosHdr->e_magic  == IMAGE_DOS_SIGNATURE &&
09158             ntHdr->Signature == IMAGE_NT_SIGNATURE)? ntHdr : NULL;
09159     }
09160 
09161 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
09162 
09163 // TXLib continues to hack the reality to make your life better, sweeter and easier
09164 
09165 uintptr_t _txSetProcAddress (const char funcName[], uintptr_t newFunc, const char dllName[] /*= NULL*/, int useHotPatching /*= false*/,
09166                              HMODULE module /*= NULL*/, bool debug /*= false*/)
09167     {
09168 $4  if (debug) txOutputDebugPrintf ("_txSetProcAddress (%s, 0x%p, %s, 0x%p):\n", funcName, (void*) newFunc, dllName, module);
09169 
09170 $   if (_TX_ARGUMENT_FAILED (funcName)) return 0;
09171 $   if (_TX_ARGUMENT_FAILED (newFunc))  return 0;
09172 
09173 $   if (!module) module = GetModuleHandle (NULL);
09174 $   if (!module) return 0;
09175 
09176 $   HMODULE dll     = (dllName)? GetModuleHandle (dllName)       : NULL;
09177 $   PROC    oldFunc = (dll)?     GetProcAddress  (dll, funcName) : NULL;
09178 
09179 $   if (useHotPatching && oldFunc)
09180         {
09181 $       const size_t jmpSz = 1 + sizeof (DWORD);  // sizeof (JMP rel instruction)
09182 
09183 $       DWORD oldRights = 0;
09184 $       if (!VirtualProtect ((void*)(uintptr_t) oldFunc, jmpSz, PAGE_EXECUTE_READWRITE, &oldRights)) return 0;
09185 
09186         // Overwrite oldFunc prolog with JMP trampoline to newFunc.
09187         // Calling oldFunc from any location will lead to newFunc call anyway.
09188 
09189 $       *(BYTE*)  ((char*)(uintptr_t) oldFunc + 0) = 0xE9;  // JMP rel
09190 $       *(DWORD*) ((char*)(uintptr_t) oldFunc + 1) = ((char*)(uintptr_t) newFunc - (char*)(uintptr_t) oldFunc - jmpSz) & 0xFFFFFFFF;  //-V206 //-V112 //-V2007 //-V104 //-V103
09191 
09192 $       FlushInstructionCache (GetCurrentProcess(), (void*)(uintptr_t) oldFunc, jmpSz);
09193 
09194 $       VirtualProtect ((void*)(uintptr_t) oldFunc, jmpSz, oldRights, &oldRights);
09195 
09196 $       return (uintptr_t) oldFunc;
09197         }
09198 
09199 //  For PE structure and Import Table format, e.g. see https://books.google.ru/books?id=ifQPC86G66sC&pg=PA255
09200 //  and below through Figure 5-5, and/or http://www.brokenthorn.com/Resources/OSDevPE.html.
09201 
09202 $   IMAGE_NT_HEADERS* ntHdr = _txGetNtHeaders (module);
09203     if (!ntHdr || (ntHdr ->OptionalHeader.Magic != IMAGE_NT_OPTIONAL_HDR_MAGIC)) {$ return 0; }
09204 
09205 $   DWORD impOffset = ntHdr->OptionalHeader.DataDirectory[IMAGE_DIRECTORY_ENTRY_IMPORT].VirtualAddress;
09206 $   IMAGE_IMPORT_DESCRIPTOR* desc = RVA_ (IMAGE_IMPORT_DESCRIPTOR*, module, impOffset);
09207 
09208 $   if (desc == (IMAGE_IMPORT_DESCRIPTOR*) ntHdr) return 0;  //-V1027
09209 
09210 $   IMAGE_THUNK_DATA* thunk0 = NULL, * thunk1 = NULL;
09211 $   char*  impDll  = NULL;
09212 $   char*  impName = NULL;
09213 $   void** impPtr  = NULL;
09214 $   bool   found   = false;
09215 
09216     for (; desc->Name; desc++)
09217         {
09218 $       impDll = RVA_ (char*, module, desc->Name);
09219 $       if (dllName && _stricmp (impDll, dllName) != 0) continue;
09220 
09221 $       for (thunk0 = RVA_ (IMAGE_THUNK_DATA*, module, desc->OriginalFirstThunk),
09222              thunk1 = RVA_ (IMAGE_THUNK_DATA*, module, desc->FirstThunk);
09223 
09224              thunk0 && thunk1 && thunk1->u1.Function;
09225 
09226              thunk0++,
09227              thunk1++)
09228             {
09229             impName = (char*) RVA_ (IMAGE_IMPORT_BY_NAME*, module, thunk0->u1.AddressOfData) -> Name;
09230             impPtr  = (void**)(uintptr_t)                         &thunk1->u1.Function;  // Should change it, so this is ptr
09231 
09232             if (debug) txOutputDebugPrintf ("[0x%p] %s!%s\n", *impPtr, impDll, impName);
09233 
09234             if ((oldFunc && (uintptr_t) oldFunc == (uintptr_t) *impPtr) ||
09235                 (impName && _stricmp (funcName, impName) == 0))  //-V560
09236                 {
09237                 found = true;
09238                 break;
09239                 }
09240             }
09241 
09242 $       if (found) break;
09243         }
09244 
09245     if (debug) txOutputDebugPrintf ("_txSetProcAddress (%s, 0x%p, %s, 0x%p): %s\n\n",
09246                                     funcName, (void*) newFunc, dllName, module, (found? "FOUND" : "NOT found"));
09247 $   if (!found) return 0;
09248 
09249 $   DWORD rights = PAGE_READWRITE;
09250 $   if (!VirtualProtect (impPtr, sizeof (*impPtr), rights, &rights)) return 0;
09251 
09252 $   *(uintptr_t*) impPtr = newFunc;
09253 
09254 $   VirtualProtect (impPtr, sizeof (*impPtr), rights, &rights);
09255 
09256 $   return (uintptr_t) oldFunc;
09257     }
09258 
09259 #undef RVA_
09260 
09261 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
09262 
09263 bool _txInDll()
09264     {
09265 $4  MODULEENTRY32 mod = { sizeof (mod) };
09266 
09267 $   HANDLE sshot = CreateToolhelp32Snapshot (TH32CS_SNAPMODULE, 0);
09268 $   assert (sshot); if (!sshot) return false;  //-V547
09269 
09270 $   bool inDll = false;
09271 
09272 $   for (bool ok = !!Module32First (sshot, &mod); ok; ok = !!Module32Next (sshot, &mod))
09273         {
09274 $       if (!mod.modBaseAddr) continue;
09275 
09276 $       IMAGE_NT_HEADERS* ntHdr = _txGetNtHeaders ((HMODULE) mod.modBaseAddr);
09277 
09278 $       inDll = ntHdr && ((ntHdr->FileHeader.Characteristics & IMAGE_FILE_DLL) != 0);
09279 
09280 $       if (In (std::nomeow, (BYTE*)(uintptr_t)_txInDll, mod.modBaseAddr, mod.modBaseAddr + mod.modBaseSize))  //-V104
09281             {$ break; }
09282         }
09283 
09284 $   CloseHandle (sshot);
09285 $   return inDll;
09286     }
09287 
09288 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
09289 
09290 bool _txIsConsoleSubsystem()
09291     {
09292 $4  IMAGE_NT_HEADERS* ntHdr = _txGetNtHeaders();
09293 
09294 $   return  ntHdr &&
09295             ntHdr ->OptionalHeader.Magic == IMAGE_NT_OPTIONAL_HDR_MAGIC &&
09296 
09297            (ntHdr ->OptionalHeader.Subsystem == IMAGE_SUBSYSTEM_WINDOWS_CUI ||
09298             ntHdr ->OptionalHeader.Subsystem == IMAGE_SUBSYSTEM_POSIX_CUI);
09299     }
09300 
09301 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
09302 
09303 bool _txIsBadReadPtr (const void* address)
09304     {
09305     MEMORY_BASIC_INFORMATION mbi = {};
09306     if (!VirtualQuery (address, &mbi, sizeof (mbi))) return true;
09307 
09308     if (mbi.Protect & (PAGE_GUARD | PAGE_NOACCESS))  return true;  // Guard page -> bad ptr
09309 
09310     DWORD readRights = PAGE_READONLY | PAGE_READWRITE | PAGE_WRITECOPY | PAGE_EXECUTE_READ | PAGE_EXECUTE_READWRITE | PAGE_EXECUTE_WRITECOPY;
09311 
09312     return !(mbi.Protect & readRights);
09313     }
09314 
09315 #endif // TX_COMPILED
09316 
09317 //}
09318 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
09319 
09321 //}
09322 //=================================================================================================================
09323 
09324 //=================================================================================================================
09325 //{          Internal TXLib window functions     (_txCanvas...)
09327 //=================================================================================================================
09328 
09329 #ifndef TX_COMPILED
09330 
09331 unsigned WINAPI _txCanvas_ThreadProc (void* data)
09332     {
09333     #define SetClassLong_  SetClassLongPtr
09334     #define GCL_HICON_     GCLP_HICON
09335     #define GCL_HICONSM_   GCLP_HICONSM
09336     #define GCL_HCURSOR_   GCLP_HCURSOR
09337 
09338 $8  _txCanvas_ThreadId = GetCurrentThreadId();
09339 
09340 $   if (_TX_ARGUMENT_FAILED (data)) return false;  //-V601
09341 
09342 $   unsigned long stackSize = _TX_STACKSIZE;
09343 $   _TX_CALL (Win32::SetThreadStackGuarantee, (&stackSize));
09344 
09345 $   HWND wnd = _txCanvas_CreateWindow ((SIZE*) data);
09346 $   if (!txWindow()) return TX_DEBUG_ERROR ("\a" "Cannot create canvas!"), 0;
09347 
09348 $   HICON   icon32 = LoadIcon         (NULL, "_TX_ICON");
09349 $   HICON   icon16 = LoadIcon         (NULL, "_TX_ICONSM");
09350 $   HCURSOR cursor = LoadCursor       (NULL, "_TX_CURSOR");
09351 $   HMENU   menu   = LoadMenu         (NULL, "_TX_MENU");
09352 $   HACCEL  accel  = LoadAccelerators (NULL, "_TX_ACCELERATORS");
09353 
09354 $   SetClassLong_ (wnd, GCL_HICON_,   (LONG_PTR) (icon32? icon32 : _txCreateTXIcon (32)));          //-V107 //-V112
09355 $   SetClassLong_ (wnd, GCL_HICONSM_, (LONG_PTR) (icon16? icon16 : _txCreateTXIcon (16)));          //-V107
09356 $   SetClassLong_ (wnd, GCL_HCURSOR_, (LONG_PTR) (cursor? cursor : LoadCursor (NULL, IDC_ARROW)));  //-V107
09357 
09358     if (menu) {$ SetMenu (wnd, menu); DrawMenuBar (wnd); }
09359 
09360 $   Win32::GdiSetBatchLimit (1);
09361 
09362     _TX_ON_DEBUG (OutputDebugString (_TX_VERSION " - STARTED: " _TX_MODULE "\n"));
09363 
09364 $   SetForegroundWindow (wnd);
09365 
09366 $   ShowWindow          (wnd, SW_SHOW);
09367 $   UpdateWindow        (wnd);
09368 
09369 $   _txRunning = true;
09370 
09371 $   MSG msg = {};
09372 $   while (GetMessage (&msg, NULL, 0, 0))
09373         {
09374         if (!msg.hwnd) {$ continue; }
09375 
09376         if (accel && TranslateAccelerator (wnd, accel, &msg)) {$ continue; }
09377 
09378 $       TranslateMessage (&msg);
09379 $       DispatchMessage  (&msg);
09380 
09381 $       Sleep (0);
09382         }
09383 
09384 $   if (icon16) DestroyIcon (icon16);  // If Explorer is displaying Tray Notification, these
09385 $   if (icon32) DestroyIcon (icon32);  // calls will possibly fail, and we'll get resource leak.
09386 
09387 $   LeaveCriticalSection (&_txCanvas_LockBackBuf);
09388 
09389     _TX_ON_DEBUG (OutputDebugString (_TX_VERSION " - STOPPED: " _TX_MODULE "\n"));
09390 
09391 $   if (_txWatchdogTimeout >= 0)
09392         {$ Win32::_beginthread (_txWatchdogTerminator, 0, &_txWatchdogTimeout); }
09393 
09394 $   if (_txRunning && _txMain)         // Main window is destroyed but main() is still running.
09395         {                              // No chances for good termination, so use exit().
09396 $       _txCleanup();
09397 $       ::exit ((int) msg.wParam);     //-V202 //-V2509 //-V2014
09398         }
09399 
09400 $   _txCanvas_ThreadId = 0;
09401 $   return true;                       //-V601
09402 
09403     #undef SetClassLong
09404     #undef GCL_HICON_
09405     #undef GCL_HICONSM_
09406     #undef GCL_HCURSOR_
09407     }
09408 
09409 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
09410 
09411 HWND _txCanvas_CreateWindow (const SIZE* sizePtr)
09412     {
09413 $8  if (_TX_ARGUMENT_FAILED (sizePtr)) return NULL;
09414 
09415 $   bool centered = false;
09416     if (sizePtr->cx < 0 && sizePtr->cy < 0) {$ centered = true; }
09417 
09418 $   SIZE screen = { GetSystemMetrics (SM_CXSCREEN), GetSystemMetrics (SM_CYSCREEN) };
09419 $   RECT rect   = { 0, 0, abs (sizePtr->cx), abs (sizePtr->cy) }; AdjustWindowRect (&rect, _txWindowStyle, false);
09420 $   SIZE size   = { rect.right - rect.left, rect.bottom - rect.top };
09421 
09422 $   const char* wndClass = txRegisterClass ("MAIN", _txCanvas_WndProc, CS_HREDRAW | CS_VREDRAW | CS_OWNDC, BLACK_BRUSH, 0);
09423 $   if (!wndClass) return (HWND) NULL;
09424 
09425 $   HWND wnd = CreateWindowEx (WS_EX_APPWINDOW, wndClass, txGetModuleFileName (false), _txWindowStyle | WS_CLIPCHILDREN,
09426                                centered? screen.cx/2 - size.cx/2 : CW_USEDEFAULT,
09427                                centered? screen.cy/2 - size.cy/2 : CW_USEDEFAULT,
09428                                size.cx, size.cy, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL);
09429 $   if (!wnd || !txWindow())
09430         {$ return TX_DEBUG_ERROR ("Cannot create canvas: CreateWindowEx() failed"), (HWND) NULL; }
09431 
09432 $   HMENU menu = GetSystemMenu (txWindow(), false);
09433     if (!menu) {$ return txWindow(); }
09434 
09435 $   AppendMenu (menu, MF_SEPARATOR, 0, NULL)                       asserted;
09436 $   AppendMenu (menu, MF_STRING, _TX_IDM_CONSOLE, "Show &Console") asserted;
09437 $   AppendMenu (menu, MF_STRING, _TX_IDM_ABOUT,   "&About...")     asserted;
09438 
09439 $   return txWindow();
09440     }
09441 
09442 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
09443 
09444 const char* txRegisterClass (const char classId[], WNDPROC wndProc, unsigned style, int backBrush, int wndExtra)
09445     {
09446 $8  assert (classId);
09447 $   assert (wndProc);
09448 
09449 $   static char name[_TX_BUFSIZE] = "";
09450 $   _tx_snprintf_s (name, sizeof (name) - 1, "/*---[TXLib]-[%s]------------ "
09451                                              _TX_VERSION "  " __FILE__ "  WndClass %08lX "
09452                                              "-------------[%s]-[TXLib]---*/",
09453                                              classId, (unsigned long) GetTickCount(), classId);
09454 $   WNDCLASS wc      = { sizeof (wc) };
09455 
09456 $   wc.lpszClassName = name;
09457 $   wc.lpfnWndProc   = wndProc;
09458 $   wc.style         = style;
09459 $   wc.cbWndExtra    = (wndExtra + 1) * (int) sizeof (long);
09460 
09461 $   wc.hCursor       = LoadCursor (NULL, IDC_ARROW);
09462 $   wc.hbrBackground = (HBRUSH) Win32::GetStockObject (backBrush);
09463 
09464 $   ATOM atom = RegisterClass (&wc);
09465     if (!atom) {$ TX_DEBUG_ERROR ("RegisterClass (\"%s\") failed", name); return 0; }
09466 
09467 $   return (const char*)(uintptr_t) atom;
09468     }
09469 
09470 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
09471 
09472 int _txCanvas_SetRefreshLock (int count)
09473     {
09474 $8  int oldCount = _txCanvas_RefreshLock;
09475 
09476 $   _txCanvas_RefreshLock = count;
09477 
09478 $   HWND wnd = txWindow();
09479 
09480 $   if ((_txCanvas_RefreshLock <= 0 || oldCount <= 0) && wnd)
09481         {$ RedrawWindow (wnd, NULL, NULL, RDW_INVALIDATE | RDW_INTERNALPAINT | RDW_UPDATENOW); }
09482 
09483 $   return oldCount;
09484     }
09485 
09486 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
09487 
09488 HICON _txCreateTXIcon (int size)
09489     {
09490 $8  if (_TX_ARGUMENT_FAILED (size == 32 || size == 16)) return NULL;  //-V112 //-V560
09491 
09492 $   const unsigned char image32 [32*32+1] =
09493         "00000000000000000000000000000000""0FFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFF0""0F0000000000000000000000000000F0""0F0000000000000000000000000000F0"
09494         "0F0000000000000099999999999900F0""0F0000000000000090300333330900F0""0F0000000990000090000000000900F0""0F00000099990000900BB000000900F0"
09495         "0F0000039999000090B00090900900F0""0F0000009999000090B00999990900F0""0F00000009903799900BB090900900F0""0F000000009BB70090000010000900F0"
09496         "0F0000000B90000090000000000900F0""0F000000B0B0000099999999999900F0""0F00007B30B0000090000000000000F0""0F00007300B0000090000000000000F0"
09497         "0F00000000B3000090000000000000F0""0F0000000B0B000090000000000000F0""0F000000B303B00090000000000000F0""0F000003B000B00090000000000000F0"
09498         "0F00003B00003B0090000000000000F0""0F0000300000030090000000000000F0""0F0000000448888888888844000000F0""0F00004886E6E6E60E66E6EEEE4400F0"
09499         "0F4488866E0E60E00660E06E66EEE4F0""0F868806E06E06E666E66E00E06EE6F0""0F08606E66E0066000E006E66E00E6F0""0F8666E006600E00006600E006E00EF0"
09500         "0F000E066888888888888888606660F0""0F66EEE6EE000E00000E00086EEEE6F0""0FFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFF0""00000000000000000000000000000000";
09501 
09502 $   const unsigned char image16 [16*16+1] =
09503         "0000000000000000""0000000999999990""0009000900000090""0099900909973090""0059700909009390""0009799909973090""0099000900000090""0959330999999990"
09504         "0709500900000000""0095930900000000""0090393900000000""0790073900000000""0900000900000000""000EE6E6E6E6E000""0EE6E6E6E6E6EEE0""0000000000000000";
09505 
09506 $   const COLORREF pal['F'-'0'+1] = { 0x000000, 0x002b2b, 0x555500, 0x005555, 0x808000, 0x008080, 0xaaaa00, 0x00aaaa, 0xd5d500, 0x00d5d5, 0,0,0,0,0,0,0,
09507                                       0xffff00, 0x00ffff, 0xffffaa, 0xaaffff, 0xd5d500, 0xffffff };
09508 
09509 $   const unsigned char* image = (size == 32)? image32 : image16;  //-V112
09510 
09511 $   POINT sz = { size, size };
09512 $   HDC dcMask  = _txBuffer_Create (txWindow(), &sz); assert (dcMask);
09513 $   HDC dcColor = _txBuffer_Create (txWindow(), &sz); assert (dcColor);
09514 
09515 $   for (int i = 0; i < size*size; i++)
09516         {
09517         assert (In (std::nomeow, image[i], '0', '9') ||
09518                 In (std::nomeow, image[i], 'A', 'F'));
09519 
09520         Win32::SetPixel (dcColor, i % size, i / size, pal [image[i] - '0']);
09521         }
09522 
09523 $   ICONINFO info = { true, 0, 0, (HBITMAP) Win32::GetCurrentObject (dcMask,  OBJ_BITMAP),
09524                                   (HBITMAP) Win32::GetCurrentObject (dcColor, OBJ_BITMAP) };
09525 
09526 $   HICON icon = CreateIconIndirect (&info);
09527 $   assert (icon);
09528 
09529 $   _txBuffer_Delete (&dcMask)  asserted;
09530 $   _txBuffer_Delete (&dcColor) asserted;
09531 
09532 $   return icon;
09533     }
09534 
09535 #endif // TX_COMPILED
09536 
09537 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
09538 
09539 inline bool _txCanvas_OK()
09540     {
09541     return _txCanvas_ThreadId   &&
09542            _txCanvas_Window     &&
09543            _txCanvas_BackBuf[0] &&
09544            _txCanvas_BackBuf[1] &&
09545            _txCanvas_Pixels;
09546     }
09547 
09548 //}
09549 //=================================================================================================================
09550 
09551 //=================================================================================================================
09552 //{          Main window event handlers          (_txCanvas_On...)
09554 //=================================================================================================================
09556 
09557 #ifndef TX_COMPILED
09558 
09559 LRESULT CALLBACK _txCanvas_WndProc (HWND wnd, UINT msg, WPARAM wpar, LPARAM lpar)
09560     {
09561 #if defined (_TX_ALLOW_TRACE)
09562 
09563     int inTX = _txLoc::Cur.inTX++;
09564 
09565     if (_txLoc::Cur.trace) _txTrace (__FILE__, __LINE__, __TX_FUNCTION__, "%*s" "0x%X <- 0x%03X (0x%08X, 0x%08lX)",
09566                                      2 * (_txLoc::Cur.inTX - 1), "", wnd, msg, wpar, lpar);
09567     _txLoc::Cur.inTX = inTX;
09568 
09569 #endif
09570 
09571 $8  if (msg == WM_KEYDOWN && wpar == VK_F12 &&
09572         GetKeyState (VK_SHIFT) && GetKeyState (VK_CONTROL) && GetKeyState (VK_MENU))
09573         {
09574 $       _txCanvas_OnCmdABOUT (wnd,      wpar);
09575 $       return DefWindowProc (wnd, msg, wpar, lpar);
09576         }
09577 
09578     WNDPROC altWndProc = _txAltWndProc;  // Cache to prevent change from main thread
09579     if (altWndProc)
09580         {
09581 $       LRESULT res = altWndProc (wnd, msg, wpar, lpar);
09582 $       if (res) return res;
09583         }
09584 
09585     static bool bkErased = false;
09586 
09587     switch (msg)
09588         {
09589         case WM_CREATE:         {$     _txCanvas_OnCREATE     (wnd);                return 0; }
09590 
09591         case WM_CLOSE:          {$ if (_txCanvas_OnCLOSE      (wnd))  break;   else return 0; }
09592         case WM_DESTROY:        {$     _txCanvas_OnDESTROY    (wnd);                return 0; }
09593 
09594         case WM_ERASEBKGND:     {$ if (!bkErased) { bkErased = true;  break; } else return 1; }
09595         case WM_SIZE:           {$                  bkErased = false; break;                  }
09596 
09597         case WM_PAINT:          {$     _txCanvas_OnPAINT      (wnd);                return 0; }
09598 
09599         case WM_TIMER:          {$     _txCanvas_OnTIMER      (wnd, wpar);          return 0; }
09600 
09601         case WM_KEYDOWN:        {$     _txCanvas_OnKEYDOWN    (wnd, wpar, lpar);    return 0; }
09602         case WM_CHAR:           {$     _txCanvas_OnCHAR       (wnd, wpar, lpar);    return 0; }
09603 
09604         case WM_LBUTTONUP:
09605         case WM_LBUTTONDOWN:
09606         case WM_RBUTTONUP:
09607         case WM_RBUTTONDOWN:
09608         case WM_MBUTTONUP:
09609         case WM_MBUTTONDOWN:
09610         case WM_MOUSEMOVE:      {$     _txCanvas_OnMOUSEMOVE  (wnd, wpar, lpar);    return 0; }
09611 
09612         case WM_MOUSELEAVE:     {$     _txCanvas_OnMOUSELEAVE (wnd);                return 0; }
09613 
09614         case _TX_WM_CREATEWND:  {$     _txCanvas_OnCREATEWND  (wnd, wpar, lpar);    return 0; }
09615         case _TX_WM_DESTROYWND: {$     _txCanvas_OnDESTROYWND (wnd, wpar, lpar);    return 0; }
09616 
09617         default: break;  //-V2522
09618         }
09619 
09620     if (msg == WM_SYSCOMMAND) switch (wpar)
09621         {
09622         case _TX_IDM_ABOUT:     {$       _txCanvas_OnCmdABOUT   (wnd, wpar);        return 0; }
09623         case _TX_IDM_CONSOLE:   {$       _txCanvas_OnCmdCONSOLE (wnd, wpar);        return 0; }
09624 
09625         default: break;  //-V2522
09626         }
09627 
09628 $   return DefWindowProc (wnd, msg, wpar, lpar);
09629     }
09630 
09631 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
09632 
09633 bool _txCanvas_OnCREATE (HWND wnd)
09634     {
09635 $8  if (_TX_ARGUMENT_FAILED (wnd)) return false;
09636 
09637 $   _txCanvas_BackBuf[0] = _txBuffer_Create (wnd, NULL, NULL, &_txCanvas_Pixels); assert (_txCanvas_BackBuf[0]);
09638 $   _txCanvas_BackBuf[1] = _txBuffer_Create (wnd, NULL, NULL, NULL);              assert (_txCanvas_BackBuf[1]);
09639 
09640 $   if (!SetTimer (wnd, _txCanvas_RefreshTimer, _txWindowUpdateInterval, NULL)) _txCanvas_RefreshTimer = 0;
09641 $   assert (_txCanvas_RefreshTimer);
09642 
09643 $   _txCanvas_UserDCs = new ::std::vector <HDC>;
09644 
09645 $   _txCanvas_Window = wnd;
09646 
09647 $   txSetDefaults();
09648 
09649 $   return true;
09650     }
09651 
09652 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
09653 
09654 bool _txCanvas_OnDESTROY (HWND wnd)
09655     {
09656 $8  if (_TX_ARGUMENT_FAILED (wnd)) return false;
09657 
09658     // Инициируем остановку цикла сообщений
09659 
09660 $   PostQuitMessage (_txRunning? WM_DESTROY : EXIT_SUCCESS);
09661 
09662 $   if (!_txCanvas_Window) return false;
09663 
09664     // Indicate that we are about to manually terminate
09665 
09666 $   _txExit = true;
09667 
09668     // Lock GDI resources
09669 
09670 $   bool locked = false;
09671 $   _txWaitFor ((locked = txLock (false), locked), _TX_TIMEOUT);
09672 $   if (!locked) TX_DEBUG_ERROR ("Cannot lock GDI to free resources");
09673 
09674     // Освобождаем пользовательские ресурсы
09675 
09676 $   if (_txCanvas_UserDCs && !_txCanvas_UserDCs->empty())
09677         {
09678 $       txNotifyIcon (NIIF_ERROR, NULL, "Вы забыли освободить %d HDC.", (int) _txCanvas_UserDCs->size());  //-V202
09679 $       Sleep (_TX_TIMEOUT);
09680 
09681 $       for (size_t i = 0; i < _txCanvas_UserDCs->size(); i++) _txBuffer_Delete (&_txCanvas_UserDCs->at (i));
09682 $       _txCanvas_UserDCs->clear();
09683         }
09684 
09685 $   delete _txCanvas_UserDCs; _txCanvas_UserDCs = NULL;
09686 
09687     // Освобождаем ресурсы, связанные с окном
09688 
09689 $   if (_txCanvas_RefreshTimer) KillTimer (wnd, _txCanvas_RefreshTimer) asserted;
09690 
09691 $   if (_txCanvas_BackBuf[1]) _txBuffer_Delete (&_txCanvas_BackBuf[1])  asserted;
09692 $   if (_txCanvas_BackBuf[0]) _txBuffer_Delete (&_txCanvas_BackBuf[0])  asserted;
09693 $   _txCanvas_Pixels = NULL;
09694 
09695 $   txUnlock();
09696 
09697     // Indicate that we are destroyed
09698 
09699 $   _txCanvas_Window = NULL;
09700 
09701 $   return true;
09702     }
09703 
09704 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
09705 
09706 bool _txCanvas_OnCLOSE (HWND wnd)  //-V2009 //-V2558
09707     {
09708 $8  if (_TX_ARGUMENT_FAILED (wnd)) return false;
09709 $   if (!_txCanvas_OK())           return false;
09710 
09711 $   if (_txMain && _txRunning &&
09712         txMessageBox ("Функция main() не завершена. Программа все еще работает. Прервать аварийно?\n\n"
09713                       "Лучше подождать, когда main() завершится - это отображается в заголовке окна.",
09714                       txGetModuleFileName (false), MB_YESNOCANCEL | MB_ICONSTOP) != IDYES) return false;
09715 $   return true;
09716     }
09717 
09718 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
09719 
09720 bool _txCanvas_OnTIMER (HWND wnd, WPARAM)
09721     {
09722 $8  if (_TX_ARGUMENT_FAILED (wnd)) return false;
09723 
09724 $   if (_txCanvas_RefreshLock > 0 || !_txRunning) return false;
09725 
09726 $   InvalidateRect (wnd, NULL, false) asserted;
09727 $   UpdateWindow   (wnd)              asserted;
09728 
09729 $   return true;
09730     }
09731 
09732 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
09733 
09734 bool _txCanvas_OnPAINT (HWND wnd)
09735     {
09736 $8  if (_TX_ARGUMENT_FAILED (wnd)) return false;
09737 $   if (!_txCanvas_OK())           return false;
09738 
09739 $   bool forceRedraw = GetAsyncKeyState (VK_MENU)  && GetAsyncKeyState (VK_CONTROL) &&
09740                        GetAsyncKeyState (VK_SHIFT) && GetAsyncKeyState (VK_SNAPSHOT);
09741 
09742 $   PAINTSTRUCT ps = {};
09743 $   HDC wndDc = BeginPaint (wnd, &ps);
09744 $   if (!wndDc) return false;
09745 
09746 $   HDC dc0 = _txCanvas_BackBuf[0],
09747         dc1 = _txCanvas_BackBuf[1];
09748 
09749 $   RECT r = {};
09750 $   GetClientRect (wnd, &r) asserted;
09751 $   POINT wndSize = { r.right - r.left, r.bottom - r.top };
09752 
09753 $   POINT dcSize = txGetExtent (dc1);
09754 
09755 $   if ((_txCanvas_RefreshLock <= 0 || forceRedraw) &&
09756         txLock (false))
09757         {
09758 $       Win32::BitBlt   (dc1, 0, 0, dcSize.x, dcSize.y, dc0, 0, 0, SRCCOPY);
09759 
09760 $       _txConsole_Draw (dc1);
09761 
09762 $       txUnlock();
09763         }
09764 
09765     // Magic 100500 value is used to completely block screen refresh.
09766     // Since no value can be 100500 or above, this condition is always true and the refresh cannot be blocked IRL.
09767     // Do not use 100501 because it may lead to errors on some compilers and possible may crash the compilers
09768     // themselves.
09769     // Yes guys, with all your software installed. :(
09770 
09771 $   if (_txCanvas_RefreshLock != 100500)
09772         {
09773         if (_txSwapBuffers)
09774             {
09775 $           _txSwapBuffers    (wndDc, 0, 0, wndSize.x, wndSize.y, dc1, 0, 0, dcSize.x, dcSize.y, SRCCOPY);
09776             }
09777         else if (dcSize.x == wndSize.x && dcSize.y == wndSize.y)
09778             {
09779 $           Win32::BitBlt     (wndDc, 0, 0, wndSize.x, wndSize.y, dc1, 0, 0,                     SRCCOPY);
09780             }
09781         else
09782             {
09783 $           Win32::SetStretchBltMode (wndDc, HALFTONE);
09784 $           Win32::StretchBlt (wndDc, 0, 0, wndSize.x, wndSize.y, dc1, 0, 0, dcSize.x, dcSize.y, SRCCOPY);
09785             }
09786         }
09787 
09788 $   EndPaint (wnd, &ps) asserted;
09789 
09790 $   return true;
09791     }
09792 
09793 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
09794 
09795 bool _txCanvas_OnKEYDOWN (HWND, WPARAM vk, LPARAM info)
09796     {
09797 $8  INPUT_RECORD evt = {};
09798 
09799 $   evt.EventType                        = KEY_EVENT;
09800 $   evt.Event.KeyEvent.bKeyDown          = true;
09801 $   evt.Event.KeyEvent.wRepeatCount      = 1;
09802 $   evt.Event.KeyEvent.uChar.AsciiChar   = (char)  MapVirtualKey ((WORD) vk, 2);   // 2 == MAPVK_VK_TO_CHAR
09803 $   evt.Event.KeyEvent.wVirtualScanCode  = (WORD)  (info >> 16);
09804 $   evt.Event.KeyEvent.wVirtualKeyCode   = (WORD)  vk;
09805 $   evt.Event.KeyEvent.dwControlKeyState = (DWORD) (info & (1 << 24))? ENHANCED_KEY : 0;
09806 
09807 $   if (evt.Event.KeyEvent.uChar.AsciiChar) return false;  // Let TranslateMessage() and WM_CHAR do the job
09808 
09809 $   DWORD written = 0;
09810 $   WriteConsoleInput (GetStdHandle (STD_INPUT_HANDLE), &evt, 1, &written);
09811 
09812 $   return false;
09813     }
09814 
09815 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
09816 
09817 bool _txCanvas_OnCHAR (HWND, WPARAM ch, LPARAM info)
09818     {
09819 $8  INPUT_RECORD evt = {};
09820 
09821 $   evt.EventType                        = KEY_EVENT;
09822 $   evt.Event.KeyEvent.bKeyDown          = true;
09823 $   evt.Event.KeyEvent.wRepeatCount      = 1;
09824 $   evt.Event.KeyEvent.uChar.AsciiChar   = (char) (ch);
09825 $   evt.Event.KeyEvent.wVirtualScanCode  = (WORD) (info >> 16);
09826 $   evt.Event.KeyEvent.wVirtualKeyCode   = (WORD) MapVirtualKey ((WORD) (info >> 16), 3);  // 3 == MAPVK_VSC_TO_VK_EX
09827 $   evt.Event.KeyEvent.dwControlKeyState = 0;
09828 
09829 $   DWORD written = 0;
09830 $   WriteConsoleInput (GetStdHandle (STD_INPUT_HANDLE), &evt, 1, &written);
09831 
09832 $   return true;
09833     }
09834 
09835 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
09836 
09837 bool _txCanvas_OnMOUSEMOVE (HWND wnd, WPARAM buttons, LPARAM coords)
09838     {
09839 $8  if (_TX_ARGUMENT_FAILED (wnd)) return false;
09840 $   if (!_txCanvas_OK())           return false;
09841 
09842 $   if (_txMousePos.x == -1 && _txMousePos.y == -1)
09843         {
09844 $       TRACKMOUSEEVENT track = { sizeof (track), TME_HOVER | TME_LEAVE, wnd, HOVER_DEFAULT };
09845 $       TrackMouseEvent (&track);
09846         }
09847 
09848 $   _txMousePos.x   = LOWORD (coords);
09849 $   _txMousePos.y   = HIWORD (coords);
09850 $   _txMouseButtons = (unsigned) buttons;  //-V202
09851 
09852 $   return true;
09853     }
09854 
09855 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
09856 
09857 bool _txCanvas_OnMOUSELEAVE (HWND)
09858     {
09859 $8  _txMousePos.x   = -1;
09860 $   _txMousePos.y   = -1;
09861 $   _txMouseButtons = 0;
09862 
09863 $   return true;
09864     }
09865

09868 bool _txCanvas_OnCREATEWND (HWND, WPARAM, LPARAM lpar)
09869     {
09870 $8  if (_TX_ARGUMENT_FAILED (lpar)) return false;
09871 
09872 $   const CREATESTRUCT* create = (CREATESTRUCT*) lpar;
09873 
09874 $   HWND wnd = CreateWindowEx (create->dwExStyle, create->lpszClass, create->lpszName, create->style,
09875                                create->x, create->y, create->cx, create->cy,
09876                                create->hwndParent, create->hMenu, NULL, create->lpCreateParams);
09877 
09878 $   *(HWND*) create->hInstance = wnd;
09879 
09880 $   return true;
09881     }
09882

09886     {

09889 $   DestroyWindow ((HWND) lpar);
09890 
09891 $   return false;
09892     }

09894 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
09895 
09896 bool _txCanvas_OnCmdCONSOLE (HWND wnd, WPARAM cmd)
09897     {
09898 $8  if (_TX_ARGUMENT_FAILED (wnd)) return false;
09899 
09900 $   HWND console = Win32::GetConsoleWindow();
09901 $   if (!console) return false;
09902 
09903 $   bool visible = !!IsWindowVisible (console);
09904 
09905 $   ShowWindow (console, visible? SW_HIDE : SW_SHOW);
09906 
09907 $   visible = !!IsWindowVisible (console);
09908 $   CheckMenuItem (GetSystemMenu (wnd, false), (int) cmd, visible? MF_CHECKED : MF_UNCHECKED);  //-V202
09909 
09910 $   return true;
09911     }
09912 
09913 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
09914 
09915 bool _txCanvas_OnCmdABOUT (HWND, WPARAM)
09916     {
09917 $8  //{ Overriding the missing names, if the set is uncomplete
09918 
09919     #if defined (__MODULE)
09920         #define ABOUT_NAME_    __MODULE
09921     #else
09922         #define ABOUT_NAME_    "TXLib"
09923     #endif
09924 
09925     #if defined (__MODULE) || defined (__VERSION) || defined (__DESCRIPTION) || defined (__AUTHOR)
09926 
09927         #ifndef __MODULE
09928         #define __MODULE       "TXLib"                           "\n"  "#define __MODULE to set the name.\n"
09929         #endif
09930 
09931         #ifndef __VERSION
09932         #define __VERSION      "(0.000000000)."                  "\n" "#define __VERSION to set the string value.\n"
09933         #endif
09934 
09935         #ifndef __DESCRIPTION
09936         #define __DESCRIPTION  "(Да, мне лень задать описание)." "\n" "#define __DESCRIPTION to override project role.\n"
09937         #endif
09938 
09939         #ifndef __AUTHOR
09940         #define __AUTHOR       "(Непонятно кто)."                "\n" "#define __AUTHOR to override this name."
09941         #endif
09942 
09943     #endif
09944     //}
09945 
09946 $   static char text[_TX_BUFSIZE] = "";
09947 
09948 $   _tx_snprintf_s (text, sizeof (text) - 1,
09949 
09950                     "Application:\n\n"
09951 
09952                     #if defined (__MODULE) || defined (__VERSION) || defined (__DESCRIPTION) || defined (__AUTHOR)
09953                         __MODULE " version " __VERSION "\n" __DESCRIPTION "\n" "Copyright (c) " __AUTHOR "\n"
09954                     #else
09955                         "Здесь могла бы быть Ваша реклама :)\n"
09956                         "#define __MODULE to \"your program name\" before including TXLib.h to use this billboard...\n"
09957                     #endif
09958 
09959                     "\n" "%s", _txAppInfo());
09960 
09961 $   txMessageBox (text, "About " ABOUT_NAME_, MB_ICONINFORMATION);
09962 
09963     // And a bit of HTTP-code in C++ function:
09964 
09965     goto http;
09966     http://sizeof.livejournal.com
09967 
09968 $   return true;
09969 
09970     #undef ABOUT_NAME_
09971     }
09972 
09973 #endif // TX_COMPILED
09974 
09976 //}
09977 //=================================================================================================================
09978 
09979 //=================================================================================================================
09980 //{          Console-support functions           (_txConsole...)
09982 //=================================================================================================================
09984 
09985 #ifndef TX_COMPILED
09986 
09987 HWND _txConsole_Attach()
09988     {
09989 $1  HWND console = Win32::GetConsoleWindow();
09990 
09991 $   if (!console)
09992         {
09993 $       FreeConsole();
09994 $       AllocConsole();
09995         }
09996 
09997 $   console = Win32::GetConsoleWindow();
09998 $   if (!console) return NULL;
09999 
10000 $   txSetLocale();                                // Устанавливаем русскую кодовую страницу для консоли Windows
10001 
10002 $   static bool done = false;
10003 $   if (done) return console;
10004 
10005 $   _txConsole_SetUnicodeFont();                  // Впечатлительным лучше сюда не смотреть.
10006 
10007 $   if (!_txIsConsoleSubsystem())
10008         {$ txReopenStdio(); }                     // Переоткрываем потоки ввода-вывода, если subsystem != console
10009 
10010     // That's all, folks
10011 
10012 $   done = true;
10013 $   return console;
10014     }
10015 
10016 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
10017 
10018 int txSetLocale (int codepage /*= _TX_CODEPAGE*/,
10019                  const char locale[] /*= _TX_LOCALE*/, const wchar_t wLocale[] /*= _TX_WLOCALE*/)
10020     {
10021 $1  int oldPage = GetConsoleOutputCP();
10022 
10023     // Устанавливаем нужную кодовую страницу для консоли Windows
10024 
10025 $   if (codepage)
10026         {
10027 $       SetConsoleCP       (codepage);
10028 $       SetConsoleOutputCP (codepage);
10029         }
10030 
10031     // Устанавливаем нужную кодовую страницу для стандартной библиотеки, иначе не будут работать Unicode-версии
10032     // функций (wprintf, ...). Если компилите с помощью gcc и собираетесь использовать L"unicode-строки" с определенным
10033     // языком, укажите опции в командной строке компилятора g++: -finput-charset=NNNN -fexec-charset=NNNN, где NNNN -
10034     // обозначение кодовой страницы (например, для русского языка - CP1251).
10035 
10036 $   if (locale)
10037         {
10038 $       setlocale (LC_ALL,     locale);
10039 $       setlocale (LC_NUMERIC, "C");              // Return to decimal point (3.14) instead of comma (3,14) in floating numbers
10040         }
10041 
10042     #ifndef __CYGWIN__
10043 
10044 $   const bool wine = !!Win32::wine_get_version;  // Linux::Wine v1.2.2+ compatibility.
10045 
10046 $   if (wLocale && !wine)
10047         {
10048 $       _wsetlocale (LC_ALL,     wLocale);
10049 $       _wsetlocale (LC_NUMERIC, L"C");           // L"C" (see above)
10050         }
10051 
10052     #endif
10053 
10054     (void) wLocale;
10055 
10056 $   return oldPage;
10057     }
10058 
10059 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
10060 
10061 void txReopenStdio()
10062     {
10063 $1  // Переоткрываем заново <s>Америку</s> потоки ввода-вывода
10064 
10065     #ifndef __CYGWIN__
10066 
10067 $   *stdin  =                  *_fdopen (_open_osfhandle ((intptr_t) GetStdHandle (STD_INPUT_HANDLE),  _O_TEXT), "r");
10068 $   fflush (stdout); *stdout = *_fdopen (_open_osfhandle ((intptr_t) GetStdHandle (STD_OUTPUT_HANDLE), _O_TEXT), "w");
10069 $   fflush (stderr); *stderr = *_fdopen (_open_osfhandle ((intptr_t) GetStdHandle (STD_ERROR_HANDLE),  _O_TEXT), "w");
10070 
10071     #else
10072 $                    *stdin  = *_fdopen (STDIN_FILENO,  "r");
10073 $   fflush (stdout); *stdout = *_fdopen (STDOUT_FILENO, "w");
10074 $   fflush (stderr); *stderr = *_fdopen (STDERR_FILENO, "w");
10075 
10076     #endif
10077 
10078 $   setvbuf (stdin,  NULL, _IONBF, 0);
10079 $   setvbuf (stdout, NULL, _IONBF, 0);
10080 $   setvbuf (stderr, NULL, _IONBF, 0);
10081 
10082 $   ::std::ios::sync_with_stdio();
10083     }
10084 
10085 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
10086 
10087 inline bool _txConsole_OK()
10088     {
10089     return Win32::GetConsoleWindow() != NULL;
10090     }
10091 
10092 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
10093 
10094 bool _txConsole_Detach (bool activate)
10095     {
10096 $1  HWND console = Win32::GetConsoleWindow();
10097 $   if (!console) return false;
10098 
10099 $   EnableWindow (console, true);
10100 $   ShowWindow   (console, SW_SHOW);
10101 
10102 $   if (activate)
10103         {
10104 $       SetForegroundWindow (console);
10105 $       BringWindowToTop    (console);
10106         }
10107 
10108 $   return true;
10109     }
10110 
10111 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
10112 
10113 bool _txConsole_Draw (HDC dc)
10114     {
10115 $8  if (_TX_HDC_FAILED (dc)) return false;
10116 
10117 $   HANDLE out = GetStdHandle (STD_OUTPUT_HANDLE);
10118 
10119 $   CONSOLE_SCREEN_BUFFER_INFO con = {};
10120 $   BOOL ok = GetConsoleScreenBufferInfo (out, &con);
10121 $   if (!ok) return false;
10122 
10123 $   POINT size = { con.srWindow.Right  - con.srWindow.Left + 1,
10124                    con.srWindow.Bottom - con.srWindow.Top  + 1 };
10125 
10126 $   SIZE fontSz = { 12, 16 };
10127 $   Win32::GetTextExtentPoint32 (dc, "W", 1, &fontSz) asserted;
10128 
10129 $   COLORREF pal [16] = { 0x000000, 0x800000, 0x008000, 0x808000, 0x000080, 0x800080, 0x008080, 0xC0C0C0,
10130                           0x808080, 0xFF0000, 0x00FF00, 0xFFFF00, 0x0000FF, 0xFF00FF, 0x00FFFF, 0xFFFFFF };
10131 
10132 $   for (short y = 0; y < size.y; y++)
10133         {
10134         static char chr [_TX_BUFSIZE + 1] = "";  // [con.dwSize.X + 1]; maybe will be truncated
10135         static WORD atr [_TX_BUFSIZE + 1] = {}; // [con.dwSize.X + 1]; maybe will be truncated
10136         COORD coord = { (short) (con.srWindow.Left), (short) (y + con.srWindow.Top) };
10137         DWORD read  = 0;
10138 
10139         if (!ReadConsoleOutputCharacter (out, chr, sizearr (chr) - 1, coord, &read)) continue;
10140         if (!ReadConsoleOutputAttribute (out, atr, sizearr (atr) - 1, coord, &read)) continue;
10141 
10142         for (int x = 0, xEnd = size.x; x < size.x; x = xEnd)
10143             {
10144             Win32::SetTextColor (dc, pal [ atr[x]       & 0x0F]);
10145             Win32::SetBkColor   (dc, pal [(atr[x] >> 4) & 0x0F]);
10146             Win32::SetBkMode    (dc,      (atr[x]       & 0xF0)? OPAQUE : TRANSPARENT);
10147 
10148             for (xEnd = x+1; xEnd < size.x && atr[xEnd] == atr[x]; xEnd++) {;}
10149 
10150             Win32::TextOut (dc, ROUND (fontSz.cx * (x + con.srWindow.Left)),
10151                                 ROUND (fontSz.cy *  y), chr + x, xEnd - x) asserted;
10152             }
10153         }
10154 
10155 $   Win32::SetTextColor (dc, pal [ con.wAttributes       & 0x0F]);
10156 $   Win32::SetBkColor   (dc, pal [(con.wAttributes >> 4) & 0x0F]);
10157 $   Win32::SetBkMode    (dc, TRANSPARENT);
10158 
10159 $   if (_txConsole_IsBlinking &&
10160         In (con.dwCursorPosition, con.srWindow) &&
10161         GetTickCount() % _txCursorBlinkInterval*2 > _txCursorBlinkInterval &&
10162         GetForegroundWindow() == txWindow())
10163         {
10164 $       Win32::TextOut (dc, ROUND (fontSz.cx * (con.dwCursorPosition.X - con.srWindow.Left)),
10165                             ROUND (fontSz.cy * (con.dwCursorPosition.Y - con.srWindow.Top)) + 1,
10166                             "_", 1) asserted;
10167         }
10168 
10169 $   return true;
10170     }
10171 
10172 #endif // TX_COMPILED
10173 
10174 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
10175 //{          Welcome to the Duck Side! Together we will rule the Bathroom!
10176 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
10177 
10178 #ifndef TX_COMPILED
10179 
10180 bool _txConsole_SetUnicodeFont()
10181     {
10182 $   const bool wine = !!Win32::wine_get_version;  // Linux::Wine v1.2.2+ compatibility.
10183                                                   // Beer compatibility may be added in future versions...
10184 $   if (wine)                                     // Минздрав РФ предупреждает: чрезмерное употребление wine
10185         {                                         // вредит Вашему здоровью.
10186 $       Win32::GetNumberOfConsoleFonts = NULL;
10187 $       Win32::GetCurrentConsoleFont   = NULL;
10188 $       Win32::SetConsoleFont          = NULL;
10189 
10190 $       return false;
10191         }
10192 
10193     // Начиная с Висты все хорошо...
10194 
10195 $1  if (Win32::GetCurrentConsoleFontEx && Win32::SetCurrentConsoleFontEx)
10196         {
10197 $       HANDLE out = GetStdHandle (STD_OUTPUT_HANDLE);
10198 
10199 $       Win32::CONSOLE_FONT_INFOEX info = { sizeof (info) };
10200 $       if (!Win32::GetCurrentConsoleFontEx (out, false, &info)) return false;
10201 
10202 $       info.FontFamily = 0x36;                                                    // Unicode fixed-pitch
10203 $       if (!*info.FaceName) info.dwFontSize.Y = (SHORT) (info.dwFontSize.Y + 2);  // Terminal font is too small
10204 
10205 $       if (wcsncmp (info.FaceName, L"Consolas", sizearr (info.FaceName)) != 0)    // Consolas is allowed too
10206             {$ wcsncpy_s (info.FaceName, sizearr (info.FaceName), L"Lucida Console", sizearr (info.FaceName)); }
10207 
10208 $       return !!Win32::SetCurrentConsoleFontEx (out, false, &info);
10209         }
10210 
10211     // ...а до этого все не так сладко
10212 
10213 $   const unsigned uniFont = 10;                  // The Internet and W2K sources know this magic number
10214 $   const unsigned uniSize = 20;                  // Size of the font desired, should be > max # of Raster Fonts  //-V2551
10215 $   bool ok = true;
10216 
10217     // Force Windows to use Unicode font by creating and run the console shortcut tuned to use that font.
10218 
10219 $   HANDLE out = GetStdHandle (STD_OUTPUT_HANDLE);
10220 
10221 $   unsigned fonts = _TX_CALL (Win32::GetNumberOfConsoleFonts, ());
10222 $   if (fonts && fonts <= uniFont)
10223         {
10224 $       HRESULT init = Win32::CoInitialize (NULL);
10225 $       size_t sz = 0;
10226 
10227 $       char link [MAX_PATH] = "";
10228 $       getenv_s (&sz, link, sizeof (link) - 1, "TEMP");
10229 $       strncat_s (link, sizeof (link), "\\~txLink.lnk", sizeof (link) - 1);
10230 
10231 $       char comspec [MAX_PATH] = "";
10232 $       getenv_s (&sz, comspec, sizeof (comspec), "COMSPEC");
10233 
10234 $       (void) _unlink (link);
10235 
10236 $       _txCreateShortcut (link, comspec, "/c exit", NULL, NULL, SW_SHOWMINNOACTIVE, NULL, 0, uniSize) asserted;
10237 
10238 $       ok = (Win32::ShellExecuteA (NULL, NULL, link, NULL, NULL, SW_SHOWMINNOACTIVE) > (void*)32);  // Sic!  //-V112 //-V566
10239         if (ok) {$ _txWaitFor (FindWindow (NULL, "~txLink"), _TX_TIMEOUT); }
10240 
10241 $       (void) _unlink (link);
10242 
10243 $       if (init == S_OK) Win32::CoUninitialize();
10244         }
10245 
10246     // If Unicode font is not already set, do set it.
10247 
10248 $   Win32::CONSOLE_FONT_INFO cur = {};
10249 $   _TX_CALL (Win32::GetCurrentConsoleFont, (out, false, &cur));
10250 
10251 $   ok &= (cur.nFont >= uniFont);
10252     if (!ok) {$ ok &= _TX_CALL (Win32::SetConsoleFont, (out, uniFont)); }
10253 
10254 $   HWND console = Win32::GetConsoleWindow();
10255 $   InvalidateRect (console, NULL, false);
10256 $   UpdateWindow   (console);
10257 
10258 $   return ok;
10259     }
10260 
10261 #endif // TX_COMPILED
10262 
10263 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
10264 //{          The assistants to the nightmare. You can use it freely to make your own nightmare sweet.
10265 
10266 #define      _TX_TRY                { goto __tx_try; } __tx_try: { int __tx_error = S_OK; (void)__tx_error;
10267 #define      _TX_CHECKED( cmd )     { if (FAILED (__tx_error = (cmd))) goto __tx_catch; }
10268 #define      _TX_FAIL               { __tx_error = E_FAIL; goto __tx_catch; }
10269 #define      _TX_RETRY              { __tx_error = S_OK;   goto __tx_try;   }
10270 #define      _TX_OK                 ( SUCCEEDED (__tx_error) )
10271 #define      _TX_CATCH              goto __tx_finally; __tx_catch:
10272 #define      _TX_RETURN             goto __tx_finally;
10273 #define      _TX_FINALLY            __tx_finally:
10274 #define      _TX_ENDTRY             }
10275 
10276 //}
10277 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
10278 
10279 // Мало не покажется
10280 
10281 #ifndef TX_COMPILED
10282 
10283 bool _txCreateShortcut (const char shortcutName[],
10284                         const char fileToLink[], const char args[] /*= NULL*/, const char workDir[] /*= NULL*/,
10285                         const char description[] /*= NULL*/, int cmdShow /*= SW_SHOWNORMAL*/, const char iconFile[] /*= NULL*/, int iconIndex /*= 0*/,
10286                         int fontSize /*= 0*/, COORD bufSize /*= ZERO (COORD)*/, COORD wndSize /*= ZERO (COORD)*/, COORD wndOrg /*=ZERO (COORD)*/)
10287     {
10288 $1  if (_TX_ARGUMENT_FAILED (shortcutName && *shortcutName)) return false;
10289 $   if (_TX_ARGUMENT_FAILED (fileToLink   && *fileToLink))   return false;
10290 
10291 $   IShellLink* shellLink = NULL;
10292 $   Win32::IShellLinkDataList* dataList = NULL;
10293 $   IPersistFile* file = NULL;
10294 
10295 $   HRESULT init = Win32::CoInitialize (NULL);
10296 
10297     _TX_TRY
10298         {
10299 $       _TX_CHECKED (Win32::CoCreateInstance (CLSID_ShellLink, NULL, CLSCTX_INPROC_SERVER, Win32::IID_IShellLink, (void**) &shellLink));
10300 $       if (!shellLink) _TX_FAIL;
10301 
10302 $       shellLink->SetPath (fileToLink);
10303 $       shellLink->SetArguments (args);
10304 $       shellLink->SetWorkingDirectory (workDir);
10305 $       shellLink->SetDescription (description);
10306 $       shellLink->SetShowCmd (cmdShow);
10307 $       shellLink->SetIconLocation (iconFile, iconIndex);
10308 
10309 $       _TX_CHECKED (shellLink->QueryInterface (Win32::IID_IShellLinkDataList, (void**) &dataList));
10310 $       if (!dataList) _TX_FAIL;
10311 
10312 $       Win32::NT_CONSOLE_PROPS props =
10313           {{sizeof (props), NT_CONSOLE_PROPS_SIG},
10314 
10315             FOREGROUND_LIGHTGRAY,                       // wFillAttribute
10316             FOREGROUND_MAGENTA | BACKGROUND_WHITE,      // wPopupFillAttribute
10317            {bufSize.X, bufSize.Y},                      // dwScreenBufferSize
10318            {wndSize.X, wndSize.Y},                      // dwWindowSize
10319            {wndOrg.X,  wndOrg.Y},                       // dwWindowOrigin
10320             0,                                          // nFont
10321             0,                                          // nInputBufferSize
10322            {0, (short) fontSize},                       // dwFontSize
10323             0x36, 400, L"Lucida Console",               // uFontFamily, uFontWeight, FaceName. We're dancing for this!
10324             15,                                         // uCursorSize
10325             0,  1, 1, 0,                                // bFullScreen, bQuickEdit, bInsertMode, bAutoPosition
10326             50, 4, 0,                                   // uHistoryBufferSize, uNumberOfHistoryBuffers, bHistoryNoDup
10327 
10328            {0x000000, 0x800000, 0x008000, 0x808000, 0x000080, 0x800080, 0x008080, 0xC0C0C0,  // Palette
10329             0x808080, 0xFF0000, 0x00FF00, 0xFFFF00, 0x0000FF, 0xFF00FF, 0x00FFFF, 0xFFFFFF}
10330             };
10331 
10332 $       _TX_CHECKED (dataList->AddDataBlock (&props));
10333 
10334 $       _TX_CHECKED (shellLink->QueryInterface (Win32::IID_IPersistFile, (void**) &file));
10335 $       if (!file) _TX_FAIL;
10336 
10337 $       wchar_t wName[MAX_PATH] = L"";
10338 $       MultiByteToWideChar (_TX_CODEPAGE, 0, shortcutName, -1, wName, MAX_PATH) || ZeroMemory (wName, sizeof (wName));
10339 
10340 $       _TX_CHECKED (file->Save (wName, true));
10341         }
10342 
10343 $   _TX_CATCH
10344 $   _TX_FINALLY
10345 
10346 $   if (file)      file     ->Release();
10347 $   if (dataList)  dataList ->Release();
10348 $   if (shellLink) shellLink->Release();
10349 
10350 $   if (init == S_OK) Win32::CoUninitialize();
10351 
10352 $   return _TX_OK;
10353     _TX_ENDTRY
10354     }
10355 
10356 #endif // TX_COMPILED
10357 
10358 //}
10359 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
10360 
10362 //}
10363 //=================================================================================================================
10364 
10365 //=================================================================================================================
10366 //{          Memory DC functions                 (_txBuffer...)
10368 //=================================================================================================================
10370 
10371 #ifndef TX_COMPILED
10372 
10373 HDC _txBuffer_Create (HWND wnd, const POINT* size /*= NULL*/, HBITMAP bitmap /*= NULL*/, RGBQUAD** pixels /*= NULL*/)
10374     {
10375 $1  txAutoLock _lock;
10376 
10377 $   HDC wndDC = GetDC (wnd);
10378 $   if (!wndDC) return NULL;
10379 
10380 $   POINT sz = { 1, 1 };
10381 $   if (size) sz = *size;
10382 
10383 $   if (!size && wnd)
10384         {
10385 $       RECT r = {};
10386 $       GetClientRect (wnd, &r) asserted;
10387 
10388 $       sz.x = r.right  - r.left;
10389 $       sz.y = r.bottom - r.top;
10390         }
10391 
10392 $   if (bitmap)
10393         {
10394 $       BITMAP bmap = {};
10395 $       Win32::GetObject (bitmap, sizeof (bmap), &bmap) asserted;
10396 
10397 $       sz.x = bmap.bmWidth;
10398 $       sz.y = bmap.bmHeight;
10399         }
10400 
10401 $   RGBQUAD* buf = NULL;
10402 $   if (!pixels) pixels = &buf;
10403 
10404 $   HDC dc = Win32::CreateCompatibleDC (wndDC);
10405 $   if (!dc) TX_DEBUG_ERROR ("Cannot create buffer: CreateCompatibleDC() failed");
10406 
10407 $   BITMAPINFO info = {{ sizeof (info), sz.x, sz.y, 1, WORD (sizeof (RGBQUAD) * 8), BI_RGB }};
10408 
10409 $   HBITMAP bmap = bitmap? bitmap : Win32::CreateDIBSection (NULL, &info, DIB_RGB_COLORS, (void**) pixels, NULL, 0);
10410 $   if (!bmap) TX_DEBUG_ERROR ("Cannot create buffer: CreateCompatibleBitmap() failed");
10411 
10412 $   Win32::SelectObject (dc, bmap) asserted;
10413 
10414 $   if (!bitmap) Win32::PatBlt (dc, 0, 0, sz.x, sz.y, BLACKNESS) asserted;
10415 
10416 $   ReleaseDC (wnd, wndDC) asserted;
10417 
10418 $   return dc;
10419     }
10420 
10421 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
10422 
10423 bool _txBuffer_Delete (HDC* dc)
10424     {
10425 $1  if (_TX_ARGUMENT_FAILED (dc)) return false;
10426 $   if (!*dc) return false;
10427 
10428 $   if (_TX_HDC_FAILED (*dc)) return false;
10429 
10430 $   if (!Win32::GetObjectType (Win32::GetCurrentObject (*dc, OBJ_BITMAP))) return false;
10431 
10432 $   txAutoLock _lock;
10433 
10434 $   _txBuffer_Select (Win32::GetStockObject (NULL_PEN),    *dc) asserted;
10435 $   _txBuffer_Select (Win32::GetStockObject (NULL_BRUSH),  *dc) asserted;
10436 $   _txBuffer_Select (Win32::GetStockObject (SYSTEM_FONT), *dc) asserted;
10437 $   _txBuffer_Select (_txStockBitmap,                      *dc);
10438 
10439 $   Win32::DeleteObject (Win32::GetCurrentObject (*dc, OBJ_BITMAP)) asserted;
10440 
10441 $   Win32::DeleteDC (*dc) asserted;
10442 
10443 $   *dc = NULL;
10444 
10445 $   return true;
10446     }
10447 
10448 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
10449 
10450 bool _txBuffer_Select (HGDIOBJ obj, HDC dc /*= txDC()*/)
10451     {
10452 $1  if (_TX_ARGUMENT_FAILED (obj)) return false;
10453 $   if (_TX_HDC_FAILED      (dc))  return false;
10454 
10455 $   if (!Win32::GetObjectType (obj)) TX_DEBUG_ERROR ("Invalid GDI object type");
10456 
10457 $   txAutoLock _lock;
10458 
10459 $   obj = Win32::SelectObject (dc, obj);
10460 $   if (obj) Win32::DeleteObject (obj);
10461 
10462 $   return obj != NULL;
10463     }
10464 
10465 #endif // TX_COMPILED
10466 
10468 //}
10469 //=================================================================================================================
10470 
10471 //=================================================================================================================
10472 //{          Diagnostics
10474 //=================================================================================================================
10476 
10477 #ifndef TX_COMPILED
10478 
10479 const char* _txError (const char* file /*= NULL*/, int line /*= 0*/, const char* func /*= NULL*/, unsigned color /*= 0*/,
10480                       const char* msg  /*= NULL*/, ...)
10481     {                                                                        //---/\---/\-------Это ASCII KOT!--//
10482 $1  va_list arg; va_start (arg, msg);                                        //  {  '-'  }                      //
10483 $$  const char* what = _txProcessError (file, line, func, color, msg, arg);  //  {  0 0  }     Добавь его себе  //
10484     va_end (arg);                                                            //  --> V <--  в исходник, и тебе  //
10485                                                                              //   \ \|/ /      будет, наверно,  //
10486     if (!(msg && msg[0] == '\a')) return what;                               //    \___/  приятно отлаживаться  //
10487                                                                              //---------------долгими ночами:)--//
10488 //  vvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvv
10489     DebugBreak();   // >>> Котики, вы в отладчике. Не пугайтесь. Есть шанс посмотреть переменные и разобраться.
10490 //  ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^
10491 
10492     return what;    // >>> Уходите из функции пошаговой отладкой (F10/F11). Следите за стеком вызовов (Alt+7).
10493     }
10494 
10495 #endif // TX_COMPILED
10496 
10497 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
10498 //{          General runtime check hooks
10499 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
10500 
10501 #ifndef TX_COMPILED
10502 
10503 void _txOnSignal (int sig /*= 0*/, int fpe /*= 0*/)
10504     {
10505 $1  if (!sig && !fpe)
10506         {
10507 $       signal (SIGSEGV, (void(*)(int))(uintptr_t)_txOnSignal) != SIG_ERR asserted;
10508 $       signal (SIGFPE,  (void(*)(int))(uintptr_t)_txOnSignal) != SIG_ERR asserted;
10509 $       signal (SIGABRT, (void(*)(int))(uintptr_t)_txOnSignal) != SIG_ERR asserted;
10510 $       signal (SIGILL,  (void(*)(int))(uintptr_t)_txOnSignal) != SIG_ERR asserted;
10511 $       signal (SIGTERM, (void(*)(int))(uintptr_t)_txOnSignal) != SIG_ERR asserted;
10512 $       return;
10513         }
10514 
10515     txOutputDebugPrintf ("%s - WARNING: %s (%d, %d) called\n", _TX_VERSION, __func__, sig, fpe);
10516 
10517     #define GET_DESCR_(str, code, descr)  case (code): {$ (str) = " " #code ": " descr; break; }
10518 
10519 $   const char* sSig = "Неизвестный тип сигнала";
10520 
10521 $   switch (sig)
10522         {
10523         GET_DESCR_ (sSig, SIGSEGV, "Доступ по неверному указателю. Ставьте ассерты!")
10524         GET_DESCR_ (sSig, SIGILL,  "Попытка выполнить недопустимую операцию. Проверьте указатели на функции.")
10525         GET_DESCR_ (sSig, SIGABRT, "Аварийное завершение программы, вызвана функция abort().")
10526         GET_DESCR_ (sSig, SIGTERM, "Получен сигнал принудительного завершения программы.")
10527         GET_DESCR_ (sSig, SIGFPE,  "Грубая ошибка в вычислениях.")
10528         default:   break;  //-V2522
10529         }
10530 
10531 $   const char* sFPE = "";
10532 
10533     #if defined (_MSC_VER)
10534 
10535     // MSVC provides the FPE code as a MS extension.
10536     // See: https://msdn.microsoft.com/ru-ru/library/xdkz3x12.aspx
10537 
10538 $   if (sig == SIGFPE) switch (fpe)
10539         {
10540         GET_DESCR_ (sFPE, _FPE_INVALID,        "Результат неверен.")
10541         GET_DESCR_ (sFPE, _FPE_DENORMAL,       "Денормализация.")
10542         GET_DESCR_ (sFPE, _FPE_ZERODIVIDE,     "Деление на ноль.")
10543         GET_DESCR_ (sFPE, _FPE_OVERFLOW,       "Результат слишком большой.")
10544         GET_DESCR_ (sFPE, _FPE_UNDERFLOW,      "Результат слишком маленький.")
10545         GET_DESCR_ (sFPE, _FPE_INEXACT,        "Результат неточен.")
10546         GET_DESCR_ (sFPE, _FPE_UNEMULATED,     "Операция не поддерживается.")
10547         GET_DESCR_ (sFPE, _FPE_SQRTNEG,        "Квадратный корень из отрицательного числа.")
10548         GET_DESCR_ (sFPE, _FPE_STACKOVERFLOW,  "Переполнение стека сопроцессора.")
10549         GET_DESCR_ (sFPE, _FPE_STACKUNDERFLOW, "В стеке сопроцессора не хватает данных.")
10550         GET_DESCR_ (sFPE, _FPE_EXPLICITGEN,    "Явный вызов исключения.")
10551         default:   break;  //-V2522
10552         }
10553 
10554     #else
10555 $   fpe = 0;
10556     #endif
10557 
10558     #undef GET_DESCR_
10559 
10560 $   signal (sig, (void(*)(int))(uintptr_t)_txOnSignal);
10561 
10562 $   Win32::_fpreset();
10563 
10564 $   _TX_UNEXPECTED ("\a\t"
10565                     "signal (%d, 0x%02X):%s%s "
10566                     "%s%s"
10567                     "С помощью функции signal() вы можете сами обработать эту ошибку.",
10568                     sig, (unsigned) fpe, sSig, sFPE,
10569                     ((_txDumpSE[1] == '\n')? "" : "\n\n"), _txDumpSE + 1);
10570     }
10571 
10572 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
10573 
10574 void _txOnTerminate()
10575     {
10576     txOutputDebugPrintf ("%s - WARNING: %s() called\n", _TX_VERSION, __func__);
10577 
10578     // From: http://github.com/gcc-mirror/gcc/blob/master/libstdc%2B%2B-v3/libsupc%2B%2B/vterminate.cc
10579 
10580 $1  static int terminating = 0;
10581     if (terminating++) {$ _TX_UNEXPECTED ("\a" "std::terminate() вызвана рекурсивно."); return; }
10582 
10583 $   if (!*_txDumpSE)
10584         {$ _txDumpExceptionCPP (_txDumpSE + 1, sizeof (_txDumpSE) - 2); }
10585 
10586 $   _TX_UNEXPECTED ("\t\a"
10587                     "std::terminate(): Неперехваченное исключение в функции main() или в деструкторе, "
10588                     "или другая фатальная ошибка C++. "
10589                     "%s"
10590                     "Используйте try/catch блоки, перехватывайте catch (...), проверяйте вызовы виртуальных функций, "
10591                     "разбирайтесь, в чем дело.\n\n"
10592                     "С помощью std::set_terminate() вы можете сами обработать эту ошибку." + !*_txDumpSE,
10593                     _txDumpSE + 1);
10594     }
10595 
10596 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
10597 
10598 void _txOnUnexpected()
10599     {
10600     txOutputDebugPrintf ("%s - WARNING: %s() called\n", _TX_VERSION, __func__);
10601 
10602 $1  if (!*_txDumpSE)
10603         {$ _txDumpExceptionCPP (_txDumpSE + 1, sizeof (_txDumpSE) - 2); }
10604 
10605 $   _TX_UNEXPECTED ("std::unexpected(): Необработанное исключение.\n\n"
10606                     "Проверьте свои catch-блоки. Перехватите catch (...). Если вы (зря) используете "
10607                     "спецификацию исключений для функций, проверьте, не нарушена ли она."
10608                     "%s"
10609                     "С помощью catch (...) в main() вы можете сами обработать эту ошибку.",
10610                     _txDumpSE + 1);
10611     }
10612 
10613 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
10614 
10615 int _txOnMatherr (_exception* exc)
10616     {
10617     txOutputDebugPrintf ("%s - WARNING: %s (0x%p) called\n", _TX_VERSION, __func__, exc);
10618 
10619 $1  assert (exc);
10620 
10621     const char* sType = "Неизвестный тип исключения";
10622 
10623     #if !defined (__CYGWIN__)
10624 
10625     #define GET_DESCR_(code, descr)  case (code): {$ sType = "(" #code "): " descr; break; }
10626 
10627 $   switch (exc->type)
10628         {
10629         GET_DESCR_ (_DOMAIN,    "Нарушение области определения");
10630         GET_DESCR_ (_SING,      "Сингулярность аргумента");
10631         GET_DESCR_ (_PLOSS,     "Частичная потеря значимости");
10632         GET_DESCR_ (_TLOSS,     "Полная потеря значимости");
10633         GET_DESCR_ (_OVERFLOW,  "Результат слишком большой");
10634         GET_DESCR_ (_UNDERFLOW, "Результат слишком маленький");
10635         default:   break;  //-V2522
10636         }
10637 
10638     #undef GET_DESCR_
10639 
10640 $   _TX_UNEXPECTED ("_matherr(): Математическая ошибка %d %s в функции %s (%lg, [%lg]). Она вернет значение %lg.\n\n"
10641                     "С помощью __setusermatherr() вы можете сами обработать эту ошибку.",
10642                     exc->type, sType, exc->name, exc->arg1, exc->arg2, exc->retval);
10643     #else
10644 
10645 $   _TX_UNEXPECTED ("_matherr(): Математическая ошибка: %s.", sType);
10646 
10647     #endif
10648 
10649     return 0;
10650     }
10651 
10652 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
10653 
10654 tx_noreturn void _txOnNewHandlerAnsi()
10655     {
10656     txOutputDebugPrintf ("%s - WARNING: %s() called\n", _TX_VERSION, __func__);
10657 $1
10658 $   _TX_UNEXPECTED ("operator new: Ошибка выделения памяти.\n\n"
10659                     "С помощью std::set_new_handler() вы можете сами обработать эту ошибку "
10660                     "и где-нибудь найти недостающую память.");
10661 
10662 $   throw std::bad_alloc();
10663     }
10664 
10665 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
10666 
10667 void _txOnSecurityErrorAnsi (const char* msg, void* ptr, int code)
10668     {
10669     txOutputDebugPrintf ("%s - WARNING: %s (%s, 0x%p, %d) called\n", _TX_VERSION, __func__, msg, ptr, code);
10670 
10671 $1  if (code)
10672         {$ errno = code; }
10673 
10674 $   _TX_UNEXPECTED ("\a"
10675                     "Ошибка переполнения буфера %d: %s в %.20s (0x%p). Ставьте ассерты!\n\n"
10676                     "С помощью std::set_constraint_handler_s() вы можете сами обработать эту ошибку "
10677                     "и постараться не выходить за границы массивов.",
10678                     code, msg, (char*) ptr, ptr);
10679     }
10680 
10681 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
10682 
10683 int tx_glGetError (int setError /*= INT_MIN*/)
10684     {
10685 $1  return _txOGLError = (setError == INT_MIN)? _TX_CALL (Win32::glGetError, ()) : setError;
10686     }
10687 
10688 #endif // TX_COMPILED

10690 //}
10691 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
10692 
10693 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
10694 //{          MSC Runtime check hooks
10695 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
10696 
10697 #if defined (_MSC_VER)
10698 
10699 #ifndef TX_COMPILED
10700 
10701 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
10702 
10703 int _txOnNewHandler (size_t size)
10704     {
10705     txOutputDebugPrintf ("%s - WARNING: %s (0x%p) called\n", _TX_VERSION, __func__, (void*)(uintptr_t) size);
10706 $5
10707 $   _TX_UNEXPECTED ("operator new: Ошибка выделения %llu байт памяти.\n\n"
10708                     "С помощью _set_new_handler() вы можете сами обработать эту ошибку "
10709                     "и где-нибудь найти недостающую память.", (unsigned long long) size);
10710 
10711 $   throw std::bad_alloc();
10712     }
10713 
10714 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
10715 
10716 void _txOnSecurityError (int code, void* addr)
10717     {
10718     txOutputDebugPrintf ("%s - WARNING: %s (%d, 0x%p) called\n", _TX_VERSION, __func__, code, addr);
10719 $5
10720 $   _TX_UNEXPECTED ("\a"
10721                     "Ошибка переполнения буфера %d (_SECERR_BUFFER_OVERRUN). Ставьте ассерты!\n\n"
10722                     "С помощью _set_security_error_handler() вы можете сами обработать эту ошибку "
10723                     "и более торжественно завершить программу. Ставьте же ассерты.", code);
10724     }
10725 
10726 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
10727 
10728 void _txOnPureCall()
10729     {
10730     txOutputDebugPrintf ("%s - WARNING: %s() called\n", _TX_VERSION, __func__);
10731 $5
10732 $   _TX_UNEXPECTED ("\a"
10733                     "Вызвана чисто виртуальная функция. Такое бывает, например, в конструкторах "
10734                     "или деструкторах базовых классов - не вызывайте там таких функций.\n\n"
10735                     "С помощью _set_purecall_handler() вы можете сами обработать эту ошибку "
10736                     "и проверить свое знание С++ :)");
10737     }
10738 
10739 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
10740 
10741 void _txOnInvalidParam (const wchar_t* wExpr, const wchar_t* wFunc, const wchar_t* wFile, unsigned int line, uintptr_t addr)
10742     {
10743     txOutputDebugPrintf ("%s - WARNING: %s (%S, %S, %S, %d, 0x%p) called\n", _TX_VERSION, __func__, wExpr, wFunc, wFile, line, addr);
10744 
10745 $5  assert (wExpr);
10746     assert (wFunc);
10747     assert (wFile);
10748 
10749     char expr [_TX_BUFSIZE/2] = "[Unknowm expr]",
10750          func [_TX_BUFSIZE/2] = "[Unknowm func]",
10751          file [MAX_PATH]      = "[Unknowm file]";
10752 
10753 $   WideCharToMultiByte (_TX_CODEPAGE, 0, wExpr, -1, expr, sizeof (expr) - 1, NULL, NULL);
10754 $   WideCharToMultiByte (_TX_CODEPAGE, 0, wFunc, -1, func, sizeof (func) - 1, NULL, NULL);
10755 $   WideCharToMultiByte (_TX_CODEPAGE, 0, wFile, -1, file, sizeof (file) - 1, NULL, NULL);
10756 
10757 $$  _txError (file, (int) line, func, 0, "\a"
10758               "В функцию %s передан неверный параметр: неверно, что %s. Не надо так.\n\n"
10759               "С помощью _set_invalid_parameter_handler() вы можете сами обработать эту ошибку.", func, expr);
10760     }
10761 
10762 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
10763 
10764 #if defined (_CLANG_VER) && !defined (_MSC_VER)
10765 
10766 void _txLibCppDebugFunction (std::__libcpp_debug_info const& info)
10767     {
10768 $5  assert (&info);
10769 
10770 $$  _txError (info.__file_, info.__line_, NULL, 0, "\a"
10771               "Оказалось неверно, что %s (%s). Не надо так.\n\n"
10772               "С помощью std::__libcpp_debug_function вы можете сами обработать эту ошибку.", info.__pred_, info.__msg_);
10773     }
10774 
10775 #endif
10776 
10777 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
10778 
10779 #pragma runtime_checks ("", off)
10780 
10781 int _txOnRTCFailure (int type, const char* file, int line, const char* module, const char* format, ...)
10782     {
10783     txOutputDebugPrintf ("%s - WARNING: %s (%d, %s, %d, %s, %s) called\n", _TX_VERSION, __func__, type, file, line, module, format);
10784 
10785 $5  static long running = 0;
10786 $   while (InterlockedExchange (&running, 1)) Sleep (0);
10787 
10788 $   assert (format);
10789 
10790     // Disable all RTC failures
10791 
10792 $   int nErrors = _RTC_NumErrors();
10793 $   int* errors = NULL;
10794 $   try { errors = (int*) _alloca (nErrors * sizeof (*errors)); } catch (...) {;}  //-V104
10795 
10796 $   int err = 0;
10797 $   for (int i = 0; i < nErrors; i++) *(errors? &errors[i] : &err) = _RTC_SetErrorType ((_RTC_ErrorNumber) i, _RTC_ERRTYPE_IGNORE);  //-V108
10798 
10799 $   char text [_TX_BUFSIZE] = "";
10800 
10801 $   va_list arg; va_start (arg, format);
10802 $   _tx_vsnprintf_s (text, sizeof (text) - 1, format, arg);                  // Get message from the vararg list
10803 $   auto error = (_RTC_ErrorNumber) va_arg (arg, int /*_RTC_ErrorNumber*/);  // Get the RTC error number
10804 $   va_end (arg);
10805 
10806 $   const char* sType = "type";
10807 
10808 $   switch (type)
10809        {
10810        case _CRT_ERROR:  $ sType = "ошибка";            break;
10811        case _CRT_ASSERT: $ sType = "логическая ошибка"; break;
10812        case _CRT_WARN:   $ sType = "возможная ошибка";  break;
10813        default:          $                              break;
10814        }
10815 
10816 $   const char* sError = _RTC_GetErrDesc (error);
10817 
10818 $$  _txError (file, line, NULL, 0, "\a"
10819               "Сбой проверки выполнения машинного кода: %s %d (%s): %s в модуле %s.", sType, error, sError, text, module);
10820 
10821     // The code below will be never executed until the error above will stay fatal:
10822 
10823     // Restore the RTC error types
10824 
10825     #if defined (_MSC_VER)
10826     #pragma warning (push)
10827     #pragma warning (disable: 6385)  // Reading invalid data from 'errors': the readable size is 'n' bytes, but 'm' bytes may be read.
10828     #endif
10829
