10830 $   for (int i = 0; i < nErrors; i++) _RTC_SetErrorType ((_RTC_ErrorNumber) i, (errors? errors[i] : _CRT_ERROR));  //-V108
10831 
10832     #if defined (_MSC_VER)
10833     #pragma warning (pop)            // Reading invalid data from 'errors': the readable size is 'n' bytes, but 'm' bytes may be read.
10834     #endif
10835 
10836 $   InterlockedExchange (&running, 0);
10837 $   return 1;
10838     }
10839 
10840 #pragma runtime_checks ("", restore)
10841 
10842 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
10843 
10844 int _txOnAllocHook (int type, void* data, size_t size, int use, long request, const unsigned char* file, int line)
10845     {
10846     #if (_TX_ALLOW_TRACE +0 >= 4)
10847 
10848     static _tx_thread int recursive = 0;
10849     if (recursive) return true;
10850     recursive++;
10851 
10852     #if (_TX_ALLOW_TRACE +0 <= 10)
10853     if (!size) return true;
10854     #endif
10855 
10856     #define GET_DESCR_(str, type)  case (type): { str = #type; break; }
10857 
10858     const char* sType = "Unknown type";
10859     const char* sUse  = "Unknown use";
10860 
10861     switch (_BLOCK_TYPE (type))
10862         {
10863         GET_DESCR_ (sType, _HOOK_ALLOC);
10864         GET_DESCR_ (sType, _HOOK_REALLOC);
10865         GET_DESCR_ (sType, _HOOK_FREE);
10866         default:   break;
10867         }
10868 
10869     switch (use)
10870         {
10871         GET_DESCR_ (sUse,  _NORMAL_BLOCK);
10872         GET_DESCR_ (sUse,  _CRT_BLOCK);
10873         GET_DESCR_ (sUse,  _CLIENT_BLOCK);
10874         GET_DESCR_ (sUse,  _FREE_BLOCK);
10875         GET_DESCR_ (sUse,  _IGNORE_BLOCK);
10876         default:   break;
10877         }
10878 
10879     #undef  GET_DESCR_
10880 
10881     _txTrace ((const char*) file, line, NULL, "%*s"
10882               "_txOnAllocHook (type = 0x%02X (%-*s), subtype =0x%X, data = 0x%p, size = 0x%p, use = 0x%02X (%-*s), request = %ld)",
10883               2 * _txLoc::Cur.inTX, "",
10884               type, 13, sType, _BLOCK_SUBTYPE (type), data, (void*) size, use, 13, sUse, request);
10885 
10886     recursive--;
10887 
10888     #else
10889 
10890     UNREFERENCED_PARAMETER (type);
10891     UNREFERENCED_PARAMETER (data);
10892     UNREFERENCED_PARAMETER (size);
10893     UNREFERENCED_PARAMETER (use);
10894     UNREFERENCED_PARAMETER (request);
10895     UNREFERENCED_PARAMETER (file);
10896     UNREFERENCED_PARAMETER (line);
10897 
10898     #endif
10899 
10900     return true;  //-V601
10901     }
10902 
10903 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
10904 
10905 #endif // TX_COMPILED
10906 
10907 #endif
10908 
10909 //}
10910 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
10911 
10912 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
10913 //{          SEH staff
10914 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
10915 
10916 #ifndef TX_COMPILED
10917 
10918 long WINAPI _txVectoredExceptionHandler (EXCEPTION_POINTERS* exc)
10919     {
10920     int inTX = _txLoc::Cur.inTX++;
10921 
10922     long ret = _txOnExceptionSEH (exc, "_txVectoredExceptionHandler");
10923 
10924     _txLoc::Cur.inTX = inTX;
10925     return ret;
10926     }
10927 
10928 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
10929 
10930 long WINAPI _txUnhandledExceptionFilter (EXCEPTION_POINTERS* exc)
10931     {
10932     int inTX = _txLoc::Cur.inTX++;
10933 
10934     long ret = _txOnExceptionSEH (exc, "_txUnhandledExceptionFilter");
10935 
10936     if (_txPrevUEFilter)
10937         {
10938         if (_txSetJmp())
10939             {
10940             int inTX2 = _txLoc::Cur.inTX++;
10941 
10942             ret = _txPrevUEFilter (exc);
10943 
10944             _txLoc::Cur.inTX = inTX2;
10945             }
10946         else
10947             {
10948 $6          _txClearJmp();
10949 
10950             _TX_UNEXPECTED ("\t\a" "%s"
10951                             "С помощью функции _set_se_translator() вы можете сами обработать эту ошибку.\n\n"
10952                             "Дополнительно: Сбой вызова стандартного обработчика неперехваченнных исключений SEH." + !*_txDumpSE,
10953                             _txDumpSE + 1);
10954             }
10955         }
10956 
10957     _txLoc::Cur.inTX = inTX;
10958     return ret;
10959     }
10960 
10961 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
10962 
10963 LPTOP_LEVEL_EXCEPTION_FILTER WINAPI _txOnSetUnhandledExceptionFilter (LPTOP_LEVEL_EXCEPTION_FILTER filter)
10964     {
10965 $6  _txPrevUEFilter = filter;
10966 
10967     return (LPTOP_LEVEL_EXCEPTION_FILTER) _txUnhandledExceptionFilter;
10968     }
10969 
10970 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
10971 
10972 long _txOnExceptionSEH (EXCEPTION_POINTERS* exc, const char func[])
10973     {
10974     assert (exc); if (!exc) {$ return EXCEPTION_CONTINUE_SEARCH; }  //-V547
10975 
10976     assert (exc->ExceptionRecord);
10977 
10978     assert (func);
10979     assert (func[3] == 'V' || func[3] == 'U');
10980 
10981     bool  unhExc = (func[3] == 'U');
10982     DWORD code   = (exc && exc->ExceptionRecord)? exc->ExceptionRecord->ExceptionCode    : 0;     //-V560
10983     void* addr   = (exc && exc->ExceptionRecord)? exc->ExceptionRecord->ExceptionAddress : NULL;  //-V560
10984 
10985     if (code == DBG_PRINTEXCEPTION_C                  ||
10986         code == DBG_PRINTEXCEPTION_WIDE_C             ||
10987         code == DBG_THREAD_NAME                       ||
10988        (code == RPC_S_SERVER_UNAVAILABLE  && !unhExc) ||
10989        (code == RPC_S_CALL_CANCELLED      && !unhExc) ||
10990        (code == EXCEPTION_BREAKPOINT && IsDebuggerPresent()))
10991         return EXCEPTION_CONTINUE_SEARCH;
10992 
10993     _txSENumber++;
10994     if (HIBYTE (HIWORD (code)) == 0xC0) _txSEFatalNumber++;
10995 
10996     OutputDebugString ("\n");
10997     txOutputDebugPrintf ("%s - WARNING: #%ld: %s (code 0x%08lX, addr 0x%p) called\n",
10998                          _TX_VERSION, _txSENumber, func, (unsigned long) code, addr);
10999 
11000 $6  if (*(unsigned long long*) _txDumpExceptionObjJmp)
11001         {
11002 $       longjmp (_txDumpExceptionObjJmp, 1);  //-V2512
11003         }
11004 
11005     tx_fpreset();
11006 
11007     #if defined (_MSC_VER)
11008     if (code == EXCEPTION_STACK_OVERFLOW) {$ _resetstkoflw(); }
11009     #endif
11010 
11011 $   bool primaryException = !(func && exc) || !((unhExc && *_txDumpSE) || _TX_MSC__CXX_DETECT_RETHROW (exc->ExceptionRecord));  //-V560
11012 
11013 $   if (primaryException && exc)  //-V560
11014         {
11015 $       unsigned err = GetLastError();
11016 
11017 $       const char* stackTrace = _txCaptureStackBackTrace (0, true, exc->ContextRecord, exc);
11018 
11019 $       _txDumpExceptionSEH (_txDumpSE,  (intptr_t) sizeof (_txDumpSE)  - 1, exc->ExceptionRecord, func);
11020 $       _tx_snprintf_s      (_txTraceSE, (intptr_t) sizeof (_txTraceSE) - 1, "%s", stackTrace);
11021 
11022 $       static _tx_thread DWORD prevCode = 0;
11023 $       static _tx_thread void* prevAddr = NULL;
11024 
11025 $       if (code != prevCode && addr != prevAddr &&
11026             !strstr (_txDumpSE, "Объект исключения C++:"))
11027             {
11028 $           SetLastError (err);
11029 $           _TX_UNEXPECTED ("\v\b\t" "%s", _txDumpSE + 1);
11030 
11031 $           prevCode = code;
11032 $           prevAddr = addr;
11033             }
11034 
11035 $       SetLastError (err);
11036         }
11037 
11038 $   if (_txDumpSE[0]     == '\a'                   ||
11039         _txSENumber      >= _TX_EXCEPTIONS_LIMIT+0 ||
11040         _txSEFatalNumber >= _TX_FATAL_EXCEPTIONS_LIMIT+0)
11041         {
11042 $       _TX_UNEXPECTED ("\a\t" "%s"
11043                         "С помощью функции _set_se_translator() вы можете сами обработать эту ошибку.",
11044                         _txDumpSE + 1);
11045         }
11046 
11047 $   return EXCEPTION_CONTINUE_SEARCH;
11048     }
11049 
11050 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
11051 
11052 intptr_t _txDumpExceptionSEH (char what[], intptr_t size, const EXCEPTION_RECORD* exc, const char func[])  //-V2008
11053     {
11054 $6  assert (what);
11055 $   assert (size >= 0);                     //-V547
11056     assert (exc); if (!exc) {$ return 0; }  //-V547
11057 $   assert (func);
11058 
11059 $   unsigned         code   = exc->ExceptionCode;
11060 $   void*            addr   = exc->ExceptionAddress;
11061 $   unsigned         params = exc->NumberParameters;
11062 $   const ULONG_PTR* info   = exc->ExceptionInformation;
11063 $   void*            object = (params >= 2)? (void*) info[1] : NULL;
11064 
11065 $   char* s = what;
11066 
11067     #define PRINT_(...)  s += _tx_snprintf_s (s, size-2 - (s-what), ##__VA_ARGS__)
11068 
11069 $   const char* sCode  = NULL;
11070 $   const char* sDescr = NULL;
11071 
11072     #define GET_DESCR_(code, descr)  case ((unsigned long) (code)): {$ sCode = #code; sDescr = descr; break; }
11073 
11074 $   switch (code)
11075         {
11076         GET_DESCR_ (EXCEPTION_ACCESS_VIOLATION,         " "  "Нарушение доступа к памяти.")
11077         GET_DESCR_ (EXCEPTION_ILLEGAL_INSTRUCTION,      " "  "Недопустимая операция.")
11078         GET_DESCR_ (EXCEPTION_PRIV_INSTRUCTION,         " "  "Привилегированная операция.")
11079         GET_DESCR_ (EXCEPTION_ARRAY_BOUNDS_EXCEEDED,    "\a" "Выход за границы массива. Ставьте ассерты!")
11080         GET_DESCR_ (EXCEPTION_BREAKPOINT,               "\a" "Достигнута точка останова. Удачи в отладке!")
11081         GET_DESCR_ (EXCEPTION_DATATYPE_MISALIGNMENT,    "\a" "Нарушение выравнивания данных.")
11082         GET_DESCR_ (EXCEPTION_INVALID_DISPOSITION,      "\a" "Обработчик исключения возвратил неверное значение.")
11083         GET_DESCR_ (EXCEPTION_IN_PAGE_ERROR,            "\a" "Невозможно загрузить нужную страницу памяти.")
11084         GET_DESCR_ (EXCEPTION_NONCONTINUABLE_EXCEPTION, "\a" "Продолжение выполнения невозможно.")
11085         GET_DESCR_ (EXCEPTION_SINGLE_STEP,              "\a" "Выполнена инструкция машинного кода. Одна штука.")
11086         GET_DESCR_ (EXCEPTION_STACK_OVERFLOW,           "\a" "Ю-ху! Переполнение стека!")
11087         GET_DESCR_ (EXCEPTION_GUARD_PAGE,               "\a" "Попытка доступа к защищенной странице памяти.")
11088         GET_DESCR_ (EXCEPTION_INVALID_HANDLE,           "\a" "Неверный или уже закрытый дескриптор.")
11089         GET_DESCR_ (STATUS_POSSIBLE_DEADLOCK,           "\a" "Возможно, взаимная блокировка ресурсов.")
11090 
11091         GET_DESCR_ (EXCEPTION_FLT_STACK_CHECK,          "\a" "Ошибка стека при операции с плавающей точкой.")
11092         GET_DESCR_ (EXCEPTION_FLT_DENORMAL_OPERAND,     " "  "Денормализация числа с плавающей точкой.")
11093         GET_DESCR_ (EXCEPTION_FLT_DIVIDE_BY_ZERO,       " "  "Деление на ноль при операции с плавающей точкой.")
11094         GET_DESCR_ (EXCEPTION_FLT_INEXACT_RESULT,       " "  "Неточный результат при операции с плавающей точкой.")
11095         GET_DESCR_ (EXCEPTION_FLT_INVALID_OPERATION,    " "  "Недопустимая операция с плавающей точкой.")
11096         GET_DESCR_ (EXCEPTION_FLT_OVERFLOW,             " "  "Переполнение при операции с плавающей точкой.")
11097         GET_DESCR_ (EXCEPTION_FLT_UNDERFLOW,            " "  "Потеря значимости при операции с плавающей точкой.")
11098         GET_DESCR_ (STATUS_FLOAT_MULTIPLE_FAULTS,       " "  "Множественные ошибки с плавающей точкой.")
11099 
11100         GET_DESCR_ (EXCEPTION_INT_DIVIDE_BY_ZERO,       "\a" "Целочисленное деление на ноль.")
11101         GET_DESCR_ (EXCEPTION_INT_OVERFLOW,             "\a" "Переполнение при целочисленной операции.")
11102 
11103         GET_DESCR_ (EXCEPTION_CLR_FAILURE,              "\a" "Сбой среды исполнения (CLR).")
11104         GET_DESCR_ (STATUS_STACK_BUFFER_OVERRUN,        "\a" "Переполнение стекового буфера!")
11105         GET_DESCR_ (STATUS_ASSERTION_FAILURE,           "\a" "Сработал assert. На этот раз из ядра.")
11106         GET_DESCR_ (STATUS_WX86_BREAKPOINT,             "\a" "Точка останова подсистемы эмуляции x86.")
11107         GET_DESCR_ (RPC_S_UNKNOWN_IF,                   "\a" "Неизвестный интерфейс удаленного вызова процедур (RPC).")
11108         GET_DESCR_ (RPC_S_SERVER_UNAVAILABLE,           "\a" "Сервер удаленного вызова процедур (RPC) недоступен.")
11109         GET_DESCR_ (DBG_TERMINATE_THREAD,               "\a" "Отладчик завершил поток сознания.")
11110         GET_DESCR_ (DBG_TERMINATE_PROCESS,              "\a" "Отладчик завершил процесс.")
11111         GET_DESCR_ (DBG_CONTROL_C,                      "\a" "Отладчик получил сигнал прерывания Control+C.")
11112         GET_DESCR_ (DBG_CONTROL_BREAK,                  "\a" "Отладчик получил сигнал прерывания Control+Break.")
11113         GET_DESCR_ (DBG_THREAD_NAME,                    " "  "Отладчик получил указание дать потоку имя.")
11114         GET_DESCR_ (DBG_PRINTEXCEPTION_C,               " "  "Отладчик вывел исключение по CTRL+C (OutputDebugStringA).")
11115         GET_DESCR_ (DBG_PRINTEXCEPTION_WIDE_C,          " "  "Отладчик вывел исключение по CTRL+C (OutputDebugStringW).")
11116 
11117         GET_DESCR_ (EXCEPTION_CPP_MSC,                  " "  "Исключение С++, вызванное оператором throw.")
11118         GET_DESCR_ (EXCEPTION_CPP_GCC,                  " "  "Исключение С++, вызванное оператором throw.")
11119         GET_DESCR_ (EXCEPTION_CPP_GCC_UNWIND,           " "  "Исключение С++, вызванное во время раскрутки стека (rethrow?).")
11120         GET_DESCR_ (EXCEPTION_CPP_GCC_FORCED,           " "  "Исключение С++, вызванное нарушением магии.")
11121         GET_DESCR_ (EXCEPTION_CPP_BORLAND_BUILDER,      "\a" "Это скомпилилось под Билдер? O_O")
11122         GET_DESCR_ (EXCEPTION_CPP_BORLAND_DELPHI,       "\a" "Это же С++. Как это вышло?")
11123 
11124         default: $ break;
11125         }
11126 
11127     #undef GET_DESCR_
11128 
11129 $   if (sDescr)
11130         {
11131 $       PRINT_ ("%s\n\n" "#%ld: Исключение %s", sDescr, _txSENumber, sCode);
11132         }
11133     else
11134         {
11135 $       PRINT_ ("\a#%ld: ", _txSENumber);
11136 $       s += FormatMessage (FORMAT_MESSAGE_FROM_HMODULE | FORMAT_MESSAGE_IGNORE_INSERTS,  //-V102
11137                             GetModuleHandle ("NTDLL.DLL"), code, MAKELANGID (LANG_NEUTRAL, SUBLANG_DEFAULT),
11138                             s, (DWORD) (size - (s-what)), NULL) - 2;  //-V202
11139 $       PRINT_ ("\r\r");
11140         }
11141 
11142 $   PRINT_ (" (0x%X) при выполнении кода по адресу", code);
11143 $   PRINT_ ((addr? " 0x%p" : " NULL"), addr);
11144 
11145 $   Win32::SYMBOL_INFO*     sym  = NULL;
11146 $   Win32::IMAGEHLP_LINE64* line = NULL;
11147 
11148     if (addr) {$ _txSymGetFromAddr (addr, &sym, &line); }
11149 
11150 $   if (sym  &&                   *sym->Name)      PRINT_ (" в функции %s()", sym->Name);
11151 $   if (line && line->FileName && *line->FileName) PRINT_ (" в файле %s на строке %u", line->FileName, (unsigned) line->LineNumber);
11152 
11153 $   if (code == EXCEPTION_ACCESS_VIOLATION ||
11154         code == EXCEPTION_IN_PAGE_ERROR)
11155         {
11156 $       PRINT_ (". Попытка ");
11157 
11158 $       unsigned long op = 0xBADC0DE;
11159 $       const char*  sOp = "(действие не указано)";
11160 
11161 $       if (params >= 1)
11162             {
11163 $           switch (op = (unsigned long) info[0])  //-V202
11164                 {
11165                 case 0:  $ sOp = "прочесть данные";          break;
11166                 case 1:  $ sOp = "записать данные";          break;
11167                 case 8:  $ sOp = "исполнить код";            break;
11168                 default: $ sOp = "совершить операцию 0x%lX"; break;
11169                 }
11170             }
11171 
11172 $       PRINT_ (sOp, op);
11173 
11174 $       if (params >= 2) {$ PRINT_ ((object? " по адресу 0x%p" : " по адресу NULL"), object); }   //-V1048
11175         else             {$ PRINT_ (" (адрес не указан)"); }
11176 
11177 $       if (code == EXCEPTION_IN_PAGE_ERROR)
11178             {
11179 $           PRINT_ (", ошибка ввода-вывода:");
11180 
11181 $           if (params >= 3)
11182                 {
11183 $               unsigned long ntstatus = (unsigned long) info[2];                                 //-V202
11184 
11185 $               PRINT_ (" 0x%lX (", ntstatus);
11186 
11187 $               s += FormatMessage (FORMAT_MESSAGE_FROM_HMODULE | FORMAT_MESSAGE_IGNORE_INSERTS,  //-V102
11188                                     GetModuleHandle ("NTDLL.DLL"), ntstatus, MAKELANGID (LANG_NEUTRAL, SUBLANG_DEFAULT),
11189                                     s, (DWORD) (size - (s-what)), NULL) - 2;                      //-V202
11190 $               PRINT_ (")");
11191                 }
11192             else
11193                 {$ PRINT_ (" (не указана)"); }
11194             }
11195         }
11196 
11197 $   HMODULE module = NULL;
11198 $   _TX_CALL (Win32::GetModuleHandleEx, (GET_MODULE_HANDLE_EX_FLAG_FROM_ADDRESS, (const char*) addr, &module));
11199 
11200 $   if (module)
11201         {
11202 $       static char sModule [MAX_PATH] = "";
11203 $       int ok = GetModuleFileName (module, sModule, sizeof (sModule));
11204 
11205 $       char* ext = (ok? strrchr (sModule, '.') : NULL);
11206 $       if (ext) _strlwr_s (ext, sizeof (sModule) - 1 - (ext - sModule));
11207 
11208         if (ok) {$ PRINT_ (" в модуле %s",  sModule); }
11209         else    {$ PRINT_ (" в модуле 0x%p", module); }
11210         }
11211 
11212 $   PRINT_ (".");
11213 
11214 $   if (_txSENumber >= _TX_EXCEPTIONS_LIMIT+0)
11215         {$ PRINT_ (" Дополнительно, превышен лимит исключений _TX_EXCEPTIONS_LIMIT (%d).",        _TX_EXCEPTIONS_LIMIT+0); }
11216 
11217 $   if (_txSEFatalNumber >= _TX_FATAL_EXCEPTIONS_LIMIT+0)
11218         {$ PRINT_ (" Также превышен лимит фатальных исключений _TX_FATAL_EXCEPTIONS_LIMIT (%d).", _TX_FATAL_EXCEPTIONS_LIMIT+0); }
11219 
11220 $   PRINT_ (" Спасибо %s(), что сообщил. Люблю его <3", func);
11221 
11222 $   if (exc->ExceptionFlags & EXCEPTION_NONCONTINUABLE)
11223         {$ PRINT_ ("\n\n" "Ой, всё (EXCEPTION_NONCONTINUABLE)."); }
11224 
11225 $   if (exc->ExceptionRecord)
11226         {
11227 $       PRINT_ ("\n\n" "Причина:" "\n\n");
11228 $       s += _txDumpExceptionSEH (s, size - (s-what), exc->ExceptionRecord, func);
11229         }
11230 
11231 $   if (code == EXCEPTION_CPP_GCC        ||
11232         code == EXCEPTION_CPP_GCC_UNWIND ||
11233         code == EXCEPTION_CPP_GCC_FORCED ||
11234         code == EXCEPTION_CPP_MSC)
11235         {
11236 $       s += _txDumpExceptionCPP (s,    size - (s-what), code, params, info);
11237         }
11238 
11239     #undef PRINT_
11240 
11241 $   while (s > what && s[-1] == '\n') s--;
11242 $   if (s > what) s += _tx_snprintf_s (s, size - (s-what), "\n\n");
11243 
11244 $   return s - what;
11245     }
11246 
11247 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
11248 
11249 intptr_t _txDumpExceptionCPP (char what[], intptr_t size,
11250                               unsigned code /*= 0*/, unsigned params /*= 0*/, const ULONG_PTR info[] /*= NULL*/)
11251     {
11252 $6  assert (what);
11253 $   assert (size >= 0);  //-V547
11254 
11255 $   char* s = what;
11256 
11257 $   switch (code)
11258         {
11259         #if defined (_GCC_VER)
11260 
11261         case EXCEPTION_CPP_GCC:
11262         case EXCEPTION_CPP_GCC_UNWIND:
11263         case EXCEPTION_CPP_GCC_FORCED:
11264             {
11265             // See: [1] http://llvm.org/svn/llvm-project/libcxxabi/trunk/src/cxa_exception.cpp
11266             //      [2] http://github.com/gcc-mirror/gcc/blob/master/libgcc/unwind-seh.c, lines 51-55 and below
11267             //      [3] http://github.com/gcc-mirror/gcc/blob/master/libstdc++-v3/libsupc++/eh_throw.cc, __cxa_throw, line 59 and below
11268             //      [4] http://github.com/gcc-mirror/gcc/blob/master/libstdc++-v3/libsupc++/unwind-cxx.h, __cxa_exception, line 58 and below
11269             //      and figure above near ABI::__cxa_exception definition in this file
11270 
11271 $           const std::type_info* type   = NULL;
11272 $           void*                 object = NULL;
11273 
11274 $           if (params >= 1)
11275                 {
11276 $               _Unwind_Exception*    unwind_exception = (_Unwind_Exception*) info[0];
11277 $               ABI::__cxa_exception* cxa_exception    = (ABI::__cxa_exception*) (unwind_exception + 1) - 1;
11278 
11279 $               type   = cxa_exception->exceptionType;
11280 $               object = cxa_exception + 1;
11281                 }
11282 
11283 $           s += _txDumpExceptionObj (s, size - (s-what), object, 0, type);
11284             }
11285 $           break;
11286 
11287         case 0:  // Not called within SEH chain
11288             {
11289             // From: [1] http://github.com/gcc-mirror/gcc/blob/master/libstdc++-v3/libsupc++/eh_type.cc
11290             //       [2] http://github.com/gcc-mirror/gcc/blob/master/libstdc++-v3/libsupc++/vterminate.cc
11291 
11292             using namespace abi;
11293 
11294 $           ABI::__cxa_exception* cxa_exception = __cxa_get_globals() -> caughtExceptions;
11295 
11296 $           if (cxa_exception && (cxa_exception->unwindHeader.exception_class & 1))  // Dependent exception, case B, see pic above
11297                 {
11298 $               cxa_exception = (((ABI::__cxa_exception*) (&cxa_exception->unwindHeader + 1) - 1) -> primaryException) - 1;
11299                 }
11300 
11301 $           if (cxa_exception)
11302                 {
11303 $               verify (cxa_exception->exceptionType == abi::__cxa_current_exception_type());
11304 
11305 $               s += _txDumpExceptionObj (s, size, cxa_exception + 1, 0, cxa_exception->exceptionType);
11306                 }
11307             }
11308 $           break;
11309 
11310         #elif defined (_MSC_VER)
11311 
11312         case EXCEPTION_CPP_MSC:
11313             {
11314             // See [1] http://blogs.msdn.microsoft.com/oldnewthing/20100730-00/?p=13273
11315             //     [2] http://www.openrce.org/articles/full_view/21
11316             //     [3] http://www.openrce.org/articles/full_view/23
11317             //     [4] http://yurichev.com/mirrors/RE/Recon-2012-Skochinsky-Compiler-Internals.pdf
11318 
11319 $           const std::type_info* type   = NULL;
11320 $           void*                 object = (params >= 2)? (void*) info[1] : NULL;
11321 $           size_t                szObj  = 0;
11322 
11323 $           if (params >= 3 &&
11324                (info[0] == EXCEPTION_CPP_MSC_EH_MAGIC_NUMBER1 ||
11325                 info[0] == EXCEPTION_CPP_MSC_EH_MAGIC_NUMBER2 ||
11326                 info[0] == EXCEPTION_CPP_MSC_EH_MAGIC_NUMBER3 ||
11327                 info[0] == EXCEPTION_CPP_MSC_EH_PURE_MAGIC_NUMBER1))
11328                 {
11329 $               auto throwInfo = (const Win32::ThrowInfo*) info[2];
11330 
11331 $               if (throwInfo && throwInfo->pCatchableTypeArray)
11332                     {
11333 $                   HMODULE module = (params >= 4)? (HMODULE) info[3] : NULL;  //-V112
11334 
11335                     #define RVA_(type, addr)  ( (type) ((uintptr_t) module + (uintptr_t) (addr)) )
11336 
11337 $                   const Win32::CatchableTypeArray* cArray = RVA_(const Win32::CatchableTypeArray*, throwInfo->pCatchableTypeArray);
11338 $                   const Win32::CatchableType*      cType  = RVA_(const Win32::CatchableType*,      cArray->arrayOfCatchableTypes[0]);
11339 
11340 $                   type  = RVA_(const std::type_info*, cType->pType);
11341 $                   szObj = cType->sizeOrOffset;  //-V101
11342 
11343                     #undef  RVA_
11344                     }
11345                 }
11346 
11347 $           s += _txDumpExceptionObj (s, size - (s-what), object, szObj, type);
11348             }
11349             break;
11350 
11351         case 0:  // Not called within SEH chain
11352 
11353             // signal() handlers or unexpected()/terminate() are called after Vectored Exception in MSC:
11354             //
11355             // terminate() is called by __scrt_unhandled_exception_filter() in case of MSC exception.
11356             // See C:\Bin\Microsoft Visual Studio 14.0\VC\crt\src\vcruntime\utility_desktop.cpp
11357             //
11358             // signal() handlers are called by _seh_filter_exe(), which is called by _mainCRTStartup() in case of exception.
11359             // See C:\Bin\Microsoft Visual Studio 14.0\VC\crt\src\vcruntime\mcrtexe.cpp
11360             // and C:\Bin\Windows Kits\10\Source\10.0.10240.0\ucrt\misc\exception_filter.cpp
11361             // and http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/ff730818.aspx.
11362             //
11363             // So _txDumpSE information should have been recorded during previous call. Now do nothing.
11364 
11365 $           break;
11366 
11367         #endif
11368 
11369         default:
11370 $           txOutputDebugPrintf ("ERROR: Wrong call to %s: Unknown exception code 0x%08X\n", __TX_FUNCTION__, code);
11371 $           break;
11372         }
11373 
11374 $   while (s > what && s[-1] == '\n') s--;
11375 $   if (s > what) s += _tx_snprintf_s (s, size - (s - what), "\n\n");
11376 
11377 $   return (s - what);
11378     }
11379 
11380 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
11381 
11382 intptr_t _txDumpExceptionObj (char what[], intptr_t size, void* object, size_t sizeObj, const std::type_info* type)  //-V2008
11383     {
11384 $6  assert (what);
11385 $   assert (size > 0);  //-V547
11386 
11387 $   static char*  s     = NULL; s     = what;
11388 $   static size_t szObj = 0;    szObj = sizeObj;
11389 
11390     #define PRINT_(...)  s += _tx_snprintf_s (s, size - (s - what), ##__VA_ARGS__)
11391 
11392 $   PRINT_ ("\n\n" "Объект исключения C++:");
11393 
11394 $   const char* mangledName = (type)? type->name() : NULL;
11395 
11396 $   char* typeName = NULL;
11397 $   int err = 1;
11398 
11399     #if defined (_GCC_VER)
11400 $   typeName = ::abi::__cxa_demangle (mangledName, 0, 0, &err);
11401     #endif
11402 
11403 $   const char* name = (!err && typeName)? typeName : mangledName;  //-V560
11404 
11405 $   if (name &&
11406        (strcmp (name, "class std::basic_string<char,struct std::char_traits<char>,class std::allocator<char> >")           == 0 ||
11407         strcmp (name, "std::__cxx11::basic_string<char, std::char_traits<char>, std::allocator<char> >")                   == 0))
11408         {$ name = "std::string"; }
11409 
11410 $   if (name &&
11411        (strcmp (name, "class std::basic_string<char,struct std::char_traits<char>,class std::allocator<char> > *")         == 0 ||
11412         strcmp (name, "class std::basic_string<char,struct std::char_traits<char>,class std::allocator<char> > * __ptr64") == 0 ||
11413         strcmp (name, "std::__cxx11::basic_string<char, std::char_traits<char>, std::allocator<char> >*")                  == 0))
11414         {$ name = "std::string*"; }
11415 
11416     if (name) {$ PRINT_ (" %s", name); }
11417 
11418     #if defined (_GCC_VER)
11419 $   free (typeName);
11420     #endif
11421 
11422 $   err = 0;
11423 $   if (mangledName)
11424         {
11425         if (_txSetJmp())
11426             {
11427             #define PRINT_VAL_(fmt, typ, ...)                                                                          \
11428                 else if (*type == typeid (      typ       )) {$ PRINT_ (" = " #fmt, (* (typ* ) object) __VA_ARGS__); } \
11429                 else if (*type == typeid (const typ       )) {$ PRINT_ (" = " #fmt, (* (typ* ) object) __VA_ARGS__); } \
11430                 else if (*type == typeid (      typ*      )) {$ PRINT_ (" = " #fmt, (**(typ**) object) __VA_ARGS__); } \
11431                 else if (*type == typeid (const typ*      )) {$ PRINT_ (" = " #fmt, (**(typ**) object) __VA_ARGS__); } \
11432                 else if (*type == typeid (      typ* const)) {$ PRINT_ (" = " #fmt, (**(typ**) object) __VA_ARGS__); } \
11433                 else if (*type == typeid (const typ* const)) {$ PRINT_ (" = " #fmt, (**(typ**) object) __VA_ARGS__); }
11434 
11435             if (false) ;
11436             PRINT_VAL_ ("%s", char*)   PRINT_VAL_ ('%c', unsigned char)    PRINT_VAL_ (%s,   bool, ? "true" : "false")  //-V206 //-V517
11437             PRINT_VAL_ ( %d,  int)     PRINT_VAL_ ( %u,  unsigned int)     PRINT_VAL_ (%g,   float)                     //-V206
11438             PRINT_VAL_ ( %hd, short)   PRINT_VAL_ ( %hu, unsigned short)   PRINT_VAL_ (%lg,  double)                    //-V206
11439             PRINT_VAL_ ( %ld, long)    PRINT_VAL_ ( %lu, unsigned long)    PRINT_VAL_ ('%c', char)                      //-V206
11440             PRINT_VAL_ ("%s", std::string, .c_str())                                                                    //-V206
11441 
11442             else if (std::exception* e = dynamic_cast <std::exception*> ( (std::exception* ) object))
11443                 {
11444 $               PRINT_ (", what(): \"%s\"", e->what());
11445                 }
11446             else
11447                 {$ err = 1; }
11448             }
11449         else
11450             {$ err = 2; }
11451         }
11452 
11453 $   _txClearJmp();
11454 
11455 $   if (err && object && szObj)
11456         {
11457 $       const unsigned char* buf = (const unsigned char*) object;
11458 
11459 $       if (szObj >= 64) szObj = 64;
11460 
11461 $       PRINT_ (", дамп: [");
11462 $       for (size_t i = 0; i < szObj; i++) PRINT_ ("%c", (isprint (buf[i]) && !iscntrl (buf[i]))? buf[i] : '.' );
11463 
11464 $       PRINT_ ("]");
11465 $       for (size_t i = 0; i < szObj; i++) PRINT_ (" %02X", buf[i]);
11466 
11467 $       err = 0;
11468         }
11469 
11470 $   if (err)
11471         {$ PRINT_ (" = ???"); }
11472 
11473 $   PRINT_ ((object? "%sего адрес 0x%p." : "%sего адрес NULL."), ((typeName || mangledName)? ", " : ""), object);  //-V560
11474 
11475     #undef PRINT_VAL_
11476     #undef PRINT_
11477 
11478 $   return s - what;
11479     }
11480 
11481 #endif // TX_COMPILED
11482 
11483 //}
11484 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
11485 
11486 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
11487 //{          Stack trace and debug info access
11488 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
11489 
11490 #ifndef TX_COMPILED
11491 
11492 const char* _txCaptureStackBackTrace (int framesToSkip /*= 0*/, bool readSource /*= true*/,
11493                                       CONTEXT* context /*= NULL*/, EXCEPTION_POINTERS* exc /*= NULL*/,
11494                                       HANDLE thread /*= GetCurrentThread()*/)
11495     {
11496 $6  const int maxFrames = 62;  // MS says: < 63
11497 $   static char trace [(MAX_PATH + 1024+1) * maxFrames] = "";
11498 
11499     if (framesToSkip == -1) {$ return trace; }
11500 
11501 $   static void* capture [maxFrames] = {};
11502 $   int frames = _txStackWalk (framesToSkip + !context, sizearr (capture), capture, context, thread);
11503 
11504 $   memset (trace, 0, sizeof (trace));
11505 $   char* s = trace;
11506 
11507     #define PRINT_(...)  s += _tx_snprintf_s (s, sizeof (trace) - 1 - 3 - (s-trace), ##__VA_ARGS__)
11508 
11509 $   for (int i = 0, n = 0; i < frames; i++)  //-V2530
11510         {
11511 $       void* addr = capture[i];
11512 
11513 $       Win32::SYMBOL_INFO*     sym    = NULL;
11514 $       Win32::IMAGEHLP_LINE64* line   = NULL;
11515 $       const char*             module = NULL;
11516 $       const char*             source = NULL;
11517 $       bool                    inTX   = false;
11518 
11519         if (addr)                {$ inTX = _txSymGetFromAddr ((char*) addr - 1, &sym, &line, &module);          }
11520         if (readSource && !inTX) {$        _txSymGetFromAddr ((void*) 1,        NULL, NULL,  NULL, &source, 2); }  //-V566
11521 
11522 $       int nl = 0;
11523 $       while (s > trace && s[-1] == '\n') { s--; nl++; }
11524 
11525         #if !defined (_TX_FULL_STACKTRACE)
11526 
11527 $       if (! ((sym && *sym->Name) || (line && ((line->FileName && *line->FileName) || line->LineNumber))))
11528             {$ continue; }
11529 
11530         #endif
11531 
11532 $       PRINT_ ("%s#%2d 0x%p", ((n)? ((source || nl)? "\n\n" : "\n") : ""), i, addr);
11533 $       n++;
11534 
11535         if (addr ==                    0)          {$ PRINT_ (" [Неверный фрейм]");        break; }
11536         if (addr == (void*)           -1)          {$ PRINT_ (" [Странный фрейм]");        break; }
11537         if (addr == (void*)(uintptr_t) 0xBAADF00D) {$ PRINT_ (" [Мусор от LocalAlloc()]"); break; }  //-V566
11538 
11539         if (module)                                {$ PRINT_ (" in %s%s",     module, ((sym && *sym->Name)? ": " : "")); }
11540         if (sym  && *sym->Name)                    {$ PRINT_ ("%s()",         sym->Name);                                }
11541         if (line && line->FileName)                {$ PRINT_ (" at %s",       line->FileName);                           }
11542         if (line && line->LineNumber)              {$ PRINT_ (" (%d)",  (int) line->LineNumber);                         }
11543         if (source)                                {$ PRINT_ (":\n\n" "%s\n", source);                                   }
11544 
11545         if (sym && strcmp (sym->Name , "main") == 0) {$ break; }
11546         }
11547 
11548     #if defined (_MSC_VER)
11549     #pragma warning (push)
11550     #pragma warning (disable: 28199)  // Using possibly uninitialized memory '*s'
11551     #endif
11552 
11553 $   while (s > trace && s[-1] == '\n') s--;
11554 $   *s = 0;
11555 
11556     #if defined (_MSC_VER)
11557     #pragma warning (pop)             // Using possibly uninitialized memory '*s'
11558     #endif
11559 
11560     #undef PRINT_
11561 
11562 $   s += _tx_snprintf_s (s, sizeof (trace) - 1 - (s-trace), "");
11563 
11564     #if !defined (_TX_NO_MINIDUMP)
11565 $   _txCreateMiniDump (exc);
11566     #endif
11567 
11568 $   return trace;
11569     }
11570 
11571 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
11572 
11573 // Stack WALKING if the program is DEAD. Dead, Carl!
11574 
11575 int _txStackWalk (int framesToSkip, size_t szCapture, void* capture[], CONTEXT* context /*= NULL*/,
11576                   HANDLE thread /* = GetCurrentThread()*/)
11577     {
11578 $6  namespace MinGW = Win32::MinGW;
11579 
11580 $   assert (capture);
11581 
11582 $   HANDLE process  = GetCurrentProcess();
11583 $   bool thisThread = (Win32::GetThreadId (thread) == GetCurrentThreadId());
11584 
11585 $   CONTEXT ctx = {};
11586 $   ctx.ContextFlags |= CONTEXT_FULL;
11587 
11588 $   int isWow64 = 0;
11589 $   if (Win32::IsWow64Process) Win32::IsWow64Process (process, &isWow64);
11590     else {$ return -1; }
11591 
11592 $   if (context)
11593         {
11594 $       ctx = *context;
11595         }
11596     else
11597         {
11598 $       if (thisThread)
11599             {
11600 $           _TX_CALLv (Win32::RtlCaptureContext, (&ctx));
11601             }
11602         else
11603             {
11604 $           SuspendThread (thread);  //-V720
11605 
11606 $           ctx.ContextFlags = CONTEXT_ALL;
11607 $           bool ok = !!GetThreadContext (thread, &ctx);
11608 
11609 $           if (!ok)
11610                 {
11611 $               ResumeThread (thread);
11612 $               return -1;
11613                 }
11614             }
11615         }
11616 
11617 $   Win32::STACKFRAME64 frame = {};
11618 $   frame.AddrPC.Mode = frame.AddrStack.Mode = frame.AddrFrame.Mode = Win32::AddrModeFlat;
11619 
11620 $   int cpu = 0;
11621 
11622     #if defined (_WIN64)
11623 
11624 $   if (isWow64)
11625         {
11626 $       Win32::WOW64_CONTEXT wow64ctx = {};
11627 $       wow64ctx.ContextFlags |= WOW64_CONTEXT_FULL;
11628 
11629 $       if (!_TX_CALL (Win32::Wow64GetThreadContext, (thread, &wow64ctx)))  // This call fails in WINE,
11630             {                                                               // while EXIT_PROCESS_DEBUG_EVENT
11631             if (!thisThread) {$ ResumeThread (thread); }
11632 $           return 0;
11633             }
11634 
11635 $       cpu = IMAGE_FILE_MACHINE_I386;
11636 
11637 $       frame.AddrPC   .Offset = wow64ctx.Eip;
11638 $       frame.AddrStack.Offset = wow64ctx.Esp;
11639 $       frame.AddrFrame.Offset = wow64ctx.Ebp;
11640         }
11641     else
11642         {
11643 $       cpu = IMAGE_FILE_MACHINE_AMD64;
11644 
11645 $       frame.AddrPC   .Offset = ctx.Rip;
11646 $       frame.AddrStack.Offset = ctx.Rbp;
11647 $       frame.AddrFrame.Offset = ctx.Rsp;
11648         }
11649 
11650     #else
11651 
11652         {
11653 $       cpu = IMAGE_FILE_MACHINE_I386;
11654 
11655 $       frame.AddrPC   .Offset = ctx.Eip;
11656 $       frame.AddrStack.Offset = ctx.Ebp;
11657 $       frame.AddrFrame.Offset = ctx.Esp;
11658         }
11659 
11660     #endif
11661 
11662 $   assert (cpu);
11663 
11664     if (_txSetJmp())
11665         {
11666 $       _txSymGetFromAddr ((void*) 1);  //-V566
11667         }
11668 $   _txClearJmp();
11669 
11670 $   int  frames = -1;
11671 
11672 $   for (frames = -framesToSkip; frames < (int) szCapture; frames++)  //-V202 //-V2530
11673         {
11674 $       DWORD64 prev = frame.AddrStack.Offset;
11675 
11676         // Я злой и страшный серый walk. Я в поросятах знаю talk.
11677 
11678         if (!_txSetJmp()) {$ break; }
11679 
11680 #if   defined (_GCC_VER)
11681 
11682         if (!_TX_CALL (MinGW::StackWalk64, (cpu, process, thread, &frame, &ctx, NULL,
11683                                             MinGW::SymFunctionTableAccess64, MinGW::SymGetModuleBase64, NULL))) {$ break; }
11684 #elif defined (_MSC_VER)
11685 
11686 $       if (!_TX_CALL (Win32::StackWalk64, (cpu, process, thread, &frame, &ctx, NULL,
11687                                             Win32::SymFunctionTableAccess64, Win32::SymGetModuleBase64, NULL))) {$ break; }
11688 #else
11689         #error _GCC_VER / _MSC_VER not defined
11690 #endif
11691         if (frames < 0) {$ continue; }
11692 
11693 $       void* addr = (void*) frame.AddrPC.Offset;
11694 
11695         if (frame.AddrFrame.Offset == 0)   {$ addr =          0; }  // Bad frame
11696         if (frame.AddrStack.Offset < prev) {$ addr = (void*) -1; }  // Strange frame
11697 
11698 $       assert (0 <= frames && frames < (int) szCapture);  //-V202
11699 
11700 $       capture[frames] = addr;                            //-V108
11701         }
11702 
11703 $   _txClearJmp();
11704 
11705     if (!thisThread) {$ ResumeThread (thread); }
11706 
11707 $   return frames;
11708     }
11709 
11710 // Note that Rick and Carl are speaking near the C language block. "C block", Carl. See: http://knowyourmeme.com/memes/carl
11711 
11712 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
11713 
11714 bool _txSymGetFromAddr (void* addr, Win32::SYMBOL_INFO** symbol /*= NULL*/,
11715                         Win32::IMAGEHLP_LINE64** line /*= NULL*/, const char** module /*= NULL*/,
11716                         const char** source /*= NULL*/, int context /*= 2*/)
11717     {
11718 $7  static HANDLE process = NULL;
11719 
11720 #if   defined (_GCC_VER)
11721     #define LIB_  Win32::MinGW
11722 
11723 #elif defined (_MSC_VER)
11724     #define LIB_  Win32
11725 
11726 #else
11727     #error _GCC_VER / _MSC_VER not defined
11728 #endif
11729 
11730 $   if (!process && addr)
11731         {
11732 $       process = GetCurrentProcess();
11733 
11734 $       DWORD options = SYMOPT_UNDNAME | SYMOPT_LOAD_LINES | SYMOPT_LOAD_ANYTHING | SYMOPT_INCLUDE_32BIT_MODULES |
11735                         SYMOPT_DEFERRED_LOADS | SYMOPT_FAVOR_COMPRESSED | SYMOPT_FAIL_CRITICAL_ERRORS | SYMOPT_NO_PROMPTS;
11736 
11737 $        _TX_CALL (LIB_::SymSetOptions, (options));
11738 $        _TX_CALL (LIB_::SymInitialize, (process, NULL, true));
11739         }
11740 
11741 $   static DWORD64 mod = 0;
11742 
11743 $   if (module)
11744         {
11745 $       static char sMod [MAX_PATH] = "";
11746 $       memset (sMod, 0, sizeof (sMod));
11747 
11748 $       mod = _TX_CALL (LIB_::SymGetModuleBase64, (process, (uintptr_t) addr));
11749 
11750 $       GetModuleFileName ((HMODULE)(intptr_t) mod, sMod, MAX_PATH);
11751 
11752 $       char* ext = strrchr (sMod, '.');
11753         if (ext) {$ _strlwr_s (ext, sizeof (sMod) - (ext-sMod)); }
11754 
11755 $       *module = sMod;
11756         }
11757 
11758 $   static char buffer [_TX_BUFSIZE] = "";
11759 $   static Win32::SYMBOL_INFO* sym = (Win32::SYMBOL_INFO*) buffer;  //-V1032
11760 
11761 $   if (symbol)
11762         {
11763 $       memset (buffer, 0, sizeof (buffer));
11764 
11765 $       sym->MaxNameLen   = sizeof (buffer) - sizeof (Win32::SYMBOL_INFO) - 1;
11766 $       sym->SizeOfStruct = sizeof (Win32::SYMBOL_INFO);
11767 $       unsigned long long ofs = 0;
11768 
11769 $       _TX_CALL (LIB_::SymFromAddr, (process, (uintptr_t) addr, &ofs, sym));
11770 
11771         if (strcmp (sym->Name, "??") == 0) {$ *sym->Name = 0; }
11772 
11773 $       *symbol = sym;
11774         }
11775 
11776 $   static Win32::IMAGEHLP_LINE64 line64 = { sizeof (line) };
11777 
11778 $   if (line)
11779         {
11780 $       memset (&line64, 0, sizeof (line64));
11781 
11782 $       DWORD ofs = 0;
11783 $       _TX_CALL (LIB_::SymGetLineFromAddr64, (process, (uintptr_t) addr, &ofs, &line64));
11784 
11785 $       *line = &line64;
11786         }
11787 
11788 $   if (source)
11789         {
11790 $       static char buf [_TX_BUFSIZE] = "";
11791 $       memset (buf, 0, sizeof (buf));
11792 
11793 $       if (line64.FileName && line64.LineNumber)
11794             {
11795 $           _txReadSource (buf, sizeof (buf) - 1, line64.FileName,
11796                           (int) line64.LineNumber - context, (int) line64.LineNumber + context, (int) line64.LineNumber);
11797 
11798 $           *source = buf;
11799             }
11800 
11801         if (!*source || !**source) {$ *source = NULL; }
11802         }
11803 
11804 $   if (!addr && process)
11805         {
11806 $       _TX_CALL (LIB_::SymCleanup, (process));
11807 
11808 $       process = NULL;
11809         }
11810 
11811 $   if (symbol)
11812         {
11813 $       if (strstr  (sym->Name, "::TX::")                                                  ||
11814            (strncmp (sym->Name, "_tx",  3) == 0 && isupper ((unsigned char) sym->Name[3])) ||
11815            (strncmp (sym->Name,  "tx",  2) == 0 && isupper ((unsigned char) sym->Name[2])) ||
11816             strncmp (sym->Name, "_tx_", 4) == 0                                            ||  //-V112
11817             strncmp (sym->Name,  "tx_", 3) == 0)
11818             {
11819 $           return true;
11820             }
11821 
11822 $       if (!line || !line64.FileName) return false;
11823 
11824 $       intptr_t len = strlen (line64.FileName) - (sizeof (__FILE__) - 1);
11825 
11826 $       return (len >= 0 && _stricmp (line64.FileName + len, __FILE__) == 0) &&
11827                (len == 0 || line64.FileName[len-1] == '/' || line64.FileName[len-1] == '\\');
11828         }
11829 
11830     #undef LIB_
11831 
11832 $   return false;
11833     }
11834 
11835 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
11836 
11837 intptr_t _txReadSource (char buf[], intptr_t size, const char file[],
11838                         int linStart /*= 0*/, int linEnd /*= INT_MIN*/, int linMark /*= INT_MIN*/)
11839     {
11840 $7  assert (buf);
11841 
11842     if (!file || !*file) {$ return 0; }
11843 
11844     if (linStart < 1) {$ linStart = 1;       }
11845     if (linEnd == -1) {$ linEnd   = INT_MAX; }
11846 
11847 $   FILE* f = NULL;
11848 $   fopen_s (&f, file, "r");
11849     if (!f) {$ return 0; }
11850 
11851 $   int n = 1;
11852     while (!feof (f))
11853         {
11854         if (n >= linStart) {$ break; }
11855         while (!feof (f) && fgetc (f) != '\n')
11856             ;
11857         n++;
11858         }
11859 
11860 $   char* s = buf;
11861 
11862     #define SZ_  ( size - 3 - (s - buf) )
11863 
11864 $   while (!feof (f) && SZ_ > 0)
11865         {
11866         if (n > linEnd || _txNOP (SZ_) < 0) {$ break; }
11867 
11868         if (linMark != INT_MIN)
11869             {$ s += _tx_snprintf_s (s, SZ_, "%s%5d: ", ((n == linMark)? "=>" : "  "), n); }
11870 
11871 $       int c = 0;
11872 $       while (!feof (f) && SZ_ > 0 && (c = fgetc (f)) != '\n') *s++ = (char) c;
11873         if (c == EOF) {$ s--; }
11874 
11875         if (SZ_ > 0) {$ *s++ = '\n'; }
11876 $       n++;
11877         }
11878 
11879     if (n <= linEnd && SZ_ <= 0)
11880         {$ s += _tx_snprintf_s (s, size - (s - buf), "..."); }
11881 
11882     #undef SZ_
11883 
11884 $   fclose (f);
11885 
11886     if (s > buf && s[-1] == '\n') {$ s--; }
11887 $   *s = 0;
11888 
11889 $   return (s - buf);
11890     }
11891 
11892 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
11893 
11894 const char* _txCaptureStackBackTraceTX (int framesToSkip /*= 0*/, bool readSource /*= false*/)
11895     {
11896 $6  const int maxFrames = 62;  // TX says too: < 63
11897 $   static char trace [(MAX_PATH + 1024+1) * maxFrames] = "";
11898 
11899     if (framesToSkip == -1) {$ return trace; }
11900 
11901 $   memset (trace, 0, sizeof (trace));
11902 $   char* s = trace;
11903 
11904     #define SZ_  ( sizeof (trace) - 1 - 3 - (s-trace) )
11905 
11906 $   const _txLoc* loc = &_txLoc::Cur;
11907 
11908     for (int i = 0; loc && i < framesToSkip + 1; i++, loc = loc->prev) { $; }
11909 
11910 $   for (int i = -framesToSkip; loc && i < maxFrames; i++, loc = loc->prev)
11911         {
11912         if (i < 0) {$ continue; }
11913 
11914         if (loc->func || loc->file || loc->line)
11915             {
11916 $           s += _tx_snprintf_s     (s, SZ_, "%s#%2d in %s at %s (%d)", (i? readSource? "\n\n" : "\n" : ""),
11917                                      i, loc->func, loc->file, loc->line);
11918 
11919 $           if (readSource)
11920                 {
11921 $               s += _tx_snprintf_s (s, SZ_, ":\n\n");
11922 $               s += _txReadSource  (s, SZ_, loc->file, loc->line - 2, loc->line + 2, loc->line);
11923                 }
11924             }
11925         }
11926 
11927     #undef SZ_
11928 
11929 $   s += _tx_snprintf_s (s, sizeof (trace) - 1 - (s-trace), "");
11930 
11931 $   return trace;
11932     }
11933 
11934 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
11935 
11936 bool _txCreateMiniDump (EXCEPTION_POINTERS* exc /*= NULL*/)
11937     {
11938 $6  static char dumpName[MAX_PATH] = "";
11939     if (!*dumpName) {$ _tx_snprintf_s (dumpName, sizeof (dumpName) - 1, "%s.dmp", _txLogName); }
11940 
11941 $   HANDLE file = CreateFile (dumpName, GENERIC_WRITE, 0, NULL, CREATE_ALWAYS, FILE_ATTRIBUTE_NORMAL, NULL);
11942 
11943     if (!file || file == INVALID_HANDLE_VALUE) {$ return false; }
11944 
11945 $   Win32::MINIDUMP_EXCEPTION_INFORMATION excInfo = { GetCurrentThreadId(), exc, false };
11946 $   Win32::MINIDUMP_TYPE type = (Win32::MINIDUMP_TYPE) (Win32::MiniDumpWithIndirectlyReferencedMemory | Win32::MiniDumpScanMemory);
11947 
11948 $   bool ok = _TX_CALL (Win32::MiniDumpWriteDump, (GetCurrentProcess(), GetCurrentProcessId(), file, type,
11949                                                    ((exc)? &excInfo : NULL), NULL, NULL));
11950 $   CloseHandle (file);
11951 
11952     if (ok) {$ return true;  }
11953     else    {$ return false; }
11954     }
11955 
11956 #endif // TX_COMPILED
11957 
11958 //}
11959 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
11960 
11961 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
11962 //{          Errors reporting
11963 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
11964 
11965 #ifndef TX_COMPILED
11966 
11967 const char* _txProcessError (const char file[], int line, const char func[], unsigned color, const char msg[], va_list args)  //-V2008
11968     {
11969     _txErrors++;
11970 
11971     DWORD           winErr   = GetLastError();
11972 
11973     int             crtErr   = errno;
11974 
11975     #if !defined (__CYGWIN__)
11976     unsigned long   dosErr   = _doserrno;
11977     #else
11978     unsigned long   dosErr   = 0;
11979     #endif
11980 
11981     unsigned        oglErr   = _TX_CALL (Win32::wglGetCurrentDC, ())? _TX_CALL (Win32::glGetError, ()) : _txOGLError;
11982 
11983     unsigned        threadId = GetCurrentThreadId();
11984 
11985     enum { isFatal = 0x01, isWarning = 0x02, noMsgBox = 0x04, fmtOnly = 0x08, traceSE = 0x10 };
11986     unsigned options = 0;
11987 
11988     for (; msg && *msg; msg++)
11989         {
11990         if      (*msg == '\a') options |= isFatal;
11991         else if (*msg == '\v') options |= isWarning;
11992         else if (*msg == '\b') options |= noMsgBox;
11993         else if (*msg == '\f') options |= fmtOnly;
11994         else if (*msg == '\t') options |= traceSE;
11995         else break;
11996         }
11997 
11998     const char* stkTrace = NULL;
11999     const char*  txTrace = NULL; (void) txTrace;
12000 
12001     if (!(options & fmtOnly))
12002         {
12003         stkTrace = ((options & traceSE) && *_txTraceSE)? _txTraceSE : _txCaptureStackBackTrace   (2, true);
12004         txTrace  =                                                    _txCaptureStackBackTraceTX (0, true);
12005         }
12006 
12007     static char what[_TX_BIGBUFSIZE*10] = "";
12008     static char str [_TX_BIGBUFSIZE]    = "";
12009     char *s = what;
12010 
12011     #define     PRINT_(...)  s += _tx_snprintf_s  (s, sizeof (what) - 1 - (s - what), ##__VA_ARGS__)
12012     #define    VPRINT_(...)  s += _tx_vsnprintf_s (s, sizeof (what) - 1 - (s - what), ##__VA_ARGS__)
12013 
12014                 PRINT_ ("TXLib %s\n\n", ((options & isWarning)? "предупреждает:" :
12015                                          (options & isFatal)?   "соболезнует..." :
12016                                                                 "сообщает:"));
12017                 PRINT_ ("Программа: %s", txGetModuleFileName());
12018     if (file)   PRINT_ (", файл: %s",    file);
12019     if (line)   PRINT_ (", строка: %d",  line);
12020     if (func)   PRINT_ (", функция: %s", func);
12021                 PRINT_ (",\n\n");
12022 
12023     if (msg)    PRINT_ ("%s: ", (file || line || func)? "Сообщение" : "ВНЕЗАПНО"),
12024                VPRINT_ (msg, args);
12025 
12026     while (s > what && s[-1] == '\n') s--;
12027 
12028                 PRINT_ ("\n\n" "#%d: %s, Instance: 0x%p (%d-bit), Flags: %c%c%c%c%c%d, Thread: 0x%X%s",
12029 
12030                         _txErrors, _TX_VERSION, &_txInitialized, (sizeof (void*) == 4)? 32 : 64,
12031 
12032                         "cC"[_txConsole], "mM"[_txMain], "dD"[_txIsDll], "rR"[_txRunning], "eE"[_txExit], _txLoc::Cur.trace,
12033 
12034                         threadId, (threadId == _txMainThreadId)?    " (Main)"   :
12035                                   (threadId == _txCanvas_ThreadId)? " (Canvas)" : "");
12036 
12037     if (winErr) PRINT_ (", GetLastError(): %lu (", (unsigned long) winErr),
12038                 s += FormatMessage (FORMAT_MESSAGE_FROM_SYSTEM | FORMAT_MESSAGE_IGNORE_INSERTS,  //-V102
12039                                     NULL, winErr, MAKELANGID (LANG_NEUTRAL, SUBLANG_DEFAULT),
12040                                     s, (DWORD) (sizeof (what) - (s-what)), NULL) - 2,            //-V202
12041                 s -=  (s[-1] == '.')? 1 : 0,
12042                 PRINT_ (")");
12043 
12044     if (crtErr) PRINT_ (", errno: %d (%s)",        crtErr, (strerror_s (str, sizeof (str), crtErr), str));
12045     if (dosErr) PRINT_ (", _doserrno: %lu (%s)",   dosErr, (strerror_s (str, sizeof (str), dosErr), str));
12046     if (oglErr) PRINT_ (", glGetError(): %u (0x%04X, %s)", oglErr, oglErr, _TX_CALL (Win32::gluErrorString, (oglErr)));
12047 
12048     #if (__cplusplus >= 201703L) || (defined (_MSVC_LANG) && _MSVC_LANG >= 201703L)
12049                 PRINT_ (". %s\n", ::std::uncaught_exceptions()? "std::uncaught_exceptions(): true." : "");
12050     #else
12051                 PRINT_ (". %s\n", ::std::uncaught_exception ()? "std::uncaught_exception(): true."  : "");
12052     #endif
12053 
12054     if (_txLoc::Cur.inTX > 0 && file && !(_txLoc::Cur.line == line && _stricmp (_txLoc::Cur.file, file) == 0) &&
12055        (_txLoc::Cur.file || _txLoc::Cur.line || _txLoc::Cur.func))
12056                 PRINT_ ("From: %s (%d) %s.\n", _txLoc::Cur.file, _txLoc::Cur.line, _txLoc::Cur.func);
12057 
12058     txOutputDebugPrintf ("\r" "%s - ERROR: %s\n", _TX_VERSION, what);
12059 
12060     if (options & fmtOnly)
12061         {
12062         SetLastError (winErr);
12063 
12064         errno = crtErr;
12065 
12066         #if !defined (__CYGWIN__)
12067         _doserrno = dosErr;
12068         #endif
12069 
12070         return what;
12071         }
12072 
12073     unsigned restore = txGetConsoleAttr();
12074     txSetConsoleAttr ((options & isFatal)? FOREGROUND_LIGHTMAGENTA : FOREGROUND_LIGHTRED);
12075     if (color) {$ txSetConsoleAttr (color); }
12076 
12077     int oldCodePage = txSetLocale();
12078 
12079     fprintf (stderr,      "\n" "--------------------------------------------------\n"
12080                                "%s\n"
12081                                "--------------------------------------------------\n",
12082                                what);
12083 
12084     if (stkTrace && strstr (stkTrace, ".exe: "))
12085         {$ fprintf (stderr,    "Стек вызовов:\n\n"
12086                                "%s\n\n"
12087                                "--------------------------------------------------\n",
12088                                stkTrace); }
12089 
12090     SetConsoleOutputCP (oldCodePage);
12091     txSetConsoleAttr (restore);
12092 
12093     if (*_txLogName) do  //-V2530
12094         {
12095         FILE* log = NULL; fopen_s (&log, _txLogName, "a");
12096         if (!log) {$ break; }
12097 
12098         fprintf (log,     "\n" "--------------------------------------------------\n"
12099                                "%s\n"
12100                                "--------------------------------------------------\n",
12101                                what);
12102 
12103         fprintf (log,          "Стек вызовов:\n\n"  //-V576
12104                                "%s\n",
12105                                (*_txTraceSE)? _txTraceSE : stkTrace);
12106 
12107         #if defined (_TX_ALLOW_TRACE) || defined (_DEBUG)
12108 
12109         if (_txLoc::Cur.inTX > 0 && txTrace && *txTrace)
12110             {
12111             fprintf (log, "\n" "--------------------------------------------------\n"
12112                                "Стек вызовов TX:\n\n"
12113                                "%s\n",
12114                                txTrace);
12115             }
12116 
12117         #endif
12118 
12119         fprintf (log,     "\n" "--------------------------------------------------\n"
12120                                "%s\n\n"
12121                                "--------------------------------------------------\n",
12122                                _txAppInfo());
12123         fclose (log);
12124         break;
12125         }
12126         while (false);
12127 
12128     int ret = 0;
12129 
12130     if (!(options & noMsgBox))
12131         {
12132         txSleep (_txWindowUpdateInterval);
12133 
12134         PRINT_ ("\n" "Прервать программу?");
12135 
12136         ret = txMessageBox (what, ((options & isWarning)? "Предупреждение"   :
12137                                    (options & isFatal)?   "Фатальная ошибка" :
12138                                                           "Ошибка в программе"), MB_ICONSTOP | MB_SYSTEMMODAL | MB_YESNOCANCEL);
12139         }
12140 
12141     SetLastError (winErr);
12142 
12143     errno = crtErr;
12144 
12145     #if !defined (__CYGWIN__)
12146     _doserrno = dosErr;
12147     #endif
12148 
12149     if (((options & isFatal) && !IsDebuggerPresent()) || ret == IDYES)
12150         {
12151         txUnlock();
12152         _txCleanup();
12153         Win32::TerminateProcess (GetCurrentProcess(), EXIT_FAILURE);
12154         }
12155 
12156     #undef  PRINT_
12157     #undef VPRINT_
12158 
12159     return what;
12160     }
12161 
12162 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
12163 
12164 #if defined (_MSC_VER)
12165 
12166 int _txOnErrorReport (int type, const char* text, int* ret)
12167     {
12168     assert (text);
12169     assert (ret);
12170 
12171     _txErrors++;
12172 
12173     unsigned restore = txGetConsoleAttr();
12174 
12175     switch (type)
12176        {
12177        case _CRT_WARN:   txSetConsoleAttr (FOREGROUND_LIGHTRED);     break;
12178        case _CRT_ERROR:  txSetConsoleAttr (FOREGROUND_LIGHTMAGENTA); break;
12179        case _CRT_ASSERT: txSetConsoleAttr (FOREGROUND_YELLOW);       break;
12180        default:                                                      break;  //-V2522
12181        }
12182 
12183     const char startReport[] = "Detected memory leaks!\n",
12184                  endReport[] = "Object dump complete.\n";
12185 
12186     if (strcmp (text, startReport) == 0)  // Dirty, dirty hack. А что делать?
12187         {
12188         _txOnErrorReport (type, "\n",                                                                              NULL);
12189         _txOnErrorReport (type, _TX_VERSION " - ERROR: ",                                                          NULL);
12190         _txOnErrorReport (type, "Внимание: Обнаружены утечки памяти! (Для поиска используйте _TX_ALLOC_BREAK.)\n", NULL);
12191         _txOnErrorReport (type, "\n",                                                                              NULL);
12192         }
12193 
12194     size_t len = strlen (text);
12195     if (text [len-1] != '\n')               txOutputDebugPrintf ("%s",                text);
12196     else if (strcmp (text, endReport) != 0) txOutputDebugPrintf ("%s" "%s - ERROR: ", text, _TX_VERSION);
12197     else                                    txOutputDebugPrintf ("%s\n",              text);
12198 
12199     DWORD n = 0;
12200     HANDLE err = GetStdHandle (STD_ERROR_HANDLE);
12201     WriteFile (err, text, (DWORD) strlen (text), &n, NULL);      //-V202
12202 
12203     txSetConsoleAttr (restore);
12204 
12205     if (*_txLogName) do                                          //-V2530
12206         {
12207         HANDLE log = CreateFile (_txLogName, GENERIC_WRITE, FILE_SHARE_READ, NULL, OPEN_ALWAYS, FILE_ATTRIBUTE_NORMAL, NULL);
12208         if (log == INVALID_HANDLE_VALUE) break;
12209 
12210         SetFilePointer (log, 0, NULL, FILE_END);
12211         WriteFile (log, text, (DWORD) strlen (text), &n, NULL);  //-V202
12212 
12213         CloseHandle (log);
12214         break;
12215         }
12216         while (false);
12217 
12218     if (ret) *ret = 0;
12219 
12220     return (type == _CRT_WARN);
12221     }
12222 
12223 #endif
12224 
12225 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
12226 
12227 int txMessageBox (const char text[], const char header[], unsigned flags /*= MB_ICONINFORMATION | MB_OKCANCEL*/)
12228     {
12229 $5  static wchar_t textW   [_TX_BIGBUFSIZE * sizeof (wchar_t)] = L"[NULL text]";
12230 $   static wchar_t headerW [_TX_BUFSIZE    * sizeof (wchar_t)] = L"[NULL header]";
12231 
12232     if (text)   {$ MultiByteToWideChar (_TX_CODEPAGE, 0, text,   -1, textW,   sizearr (textW))   || memset (textW,   0, sizeof (textW));   }
12233     if (header) {$ MultiByteToWideChar (_TX_CODEPAGE, 0, header, -1, headerW, sizearr (headerW)) || memset (headerW, 0, sizeof (headerW)); }
12234 
12235 $   HWND wnd = _txCanvas_Window;
12236 $   int  ret = MessageBoxW ((wnd && IsWindowVisible (wnd))? wnd : _TX_CALL (Win32::GetConsoleWindow,()),
12237                             textW, headerW, flags | MB_SETFOREGROUND | MB_TOPMOST | MB_OKCANCEL );
12238 $   if (ret == IDCANCEL)
12239         {
12240 $       SendNotifyMessage (txWindow(), (_txMain? WM_CLOSE : WM_DESTROY), 0, 0);
12241 $       _txWaitFor (!_txCanvas_Window, _TX_TIMEOUT);
12242         }
12243 
12244 $   return ret;
12245     }
12246 
12247 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
12248 
12249 bool txGetAsyncKeyState (int key)
12250     {
12251 $1  HWND wnd = GetForegroundWindow();
12252 
12253     return (GetAsyncKeyState (key) & 0x8000) &&
12254            (wnd == txWindow() || wnd == Win32::GetConsoleWindow());
12255     }
12256 
12257 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
12258 
12259 bool txNotifyIcon (unsigned flags, const char* title, const char* format, ...)
12260     {
12261 $5  if (_TX_ARGUMENT_FAILED (format)) return false;
12262 
12263 $   va_list arg; va_start (arg, format);
12264 $   bool ok = true;
12265 
12266     #if defined (_WIN32_IE) && (_WIN32_IE >= 0x0500)
12267 
12268 $   NOTIFYICONDATA nid = { sizeof (nid) };
12269 
12270 $   nid.uFlags      = NIF_ICON | NIF_TIP | NIF_INFO;
12271 $   nid.hWnd        = NULL;
12272 $   nid.uID         = 1;
12273 $   nid.hIcon       = _txCreateTXIcon (16); assert (nid.hIcon);
12274 $   strncpy_s       (nid.szTip,       sizeof (nid.szTip),       "TXLib Information", sizeof (nid.szTip));
12275 $   strncpy_s       (nid.szInfoTitle, sizeof (nid.szInfoTitle), (title? title : "TXLib сообщает"), sizeof (nid.szInfoTitle) - 1);
12276 $   _tx_vsnprintf_s (nid.szInfo, sizeof (nid.szInfo), format, arg);
12277 $   nid.dwInfoFlags = flags;
12278 
12279 $   txOutputDebugPrintf ("\r" _TX_VERSION " - %s: %s (Icon notification)\n", nid.szInfoTitle, nid.szInfo);
12280 
12281 $   ok &= !!Shell_NotifyIcon (NIM_ADD,    (::NOTIFYICONDATA*) &nid);
12282 $   ok &= !!Shell_NotifyIcon (NIM_MODIFY, (::NOTIFYICONDATA*) &nid);
12283 
12284 $   if (nid.hIcon) DestroyIcon (nid.hIcon) asserted;
12285 
12286     #else
12287 
12288 $   char nid_szInfo[_TX_BUFSIZE] = "";
12289 $   _tx_vsnprintf_s (nid_szInfo, sizeof (nid_szInfo), format, arg);
12290 $   txOutputDebugPrintf ("\r" _TX_VERSION " - %s: %s (Icon notification - NOT displayed)\n", title, nid_szInfo);
12291 $   ok = false;
12292 
12293 $   (void)flags; (void)title;
12294 
12295     #endif
12296 
12297 $   va_end (arg);
12298     return ok;
12299     }
12300 
12301 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
12302 
12303 void _txTrace (const char* file, int line, const char* func, const char* msg /*= NULL*/, ...)
12304     {
12305     unsigned id = GetCurrentThreadId();
12306 
12307     const char marks[2][2][3] = {{"uU", "cC"}, {"mM", "??"}};
12308 
12309     char mark = marks [id == _txMainThreadId] [id == _txCanvas_ThreadId] [(_txLoc::Cur.inTX > 0)];
12310 
12311     char msgStr[_TX_BUFSIZE] = "";
12312     if (msg)
12313         {
12314         va_list arg; va_start (arg, msg);
12315         _tx_vsnprintf_s (msgStr, sizeof (msgStr) - 1, msg, arg);
12316         va_end (arg);
12317         }
12318 
12319     txOutputDebugPrintf ("%s - 0x%p %c%c%c%c%c%d [%c] - %-*s (%5d)  " "|%*s%s" "%s%s\n",
12320 
12321                          _TX_VERSION, &_txInitialized,
12322 
12323                          "cC"[_txConsole], "mM"[_txMain], "dD"[_txIsDll], "rR"[_txRunning], "eE"[_txExit],
12324                          _txLoc::Cur.trace, mark,
12325 
12326                          (int) sizeof (__FILE__) - 1, (file? file : "(NULL file)"), line,
12327                          2 * (_txLoc::Cur.inTX - 1) * !!func, "", (func? func : ""),
12328 
12329                          ((*msgStr && func)? ": " : ""), msgStr);
12330     }
12331 
12332 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
12333 
12334 int txOutputDebugPrintf (const char* format, ...)
12335     {
12336     if (!format) return 0;
12337 
12338     enum { msgbox = 1, print = 2, compr = 4 };
12339     int options = 0;
12340 
12341     for (; format && *format; format++)
12342         {
12343         if      (*format == '\a') options |= msgbox;
12344         else if (*format == '\f') options |= print;
12345         else if (*format == '\r') options |= compr;
12346         else break;
12347         }
12348 
12349     char text[_TX_BIGBUFSIZE] = "";
12350 
12351     va_list arg; va_start (arg, format);
12352     int n = (int) _tx_vsnprintf_s (text, sizeof (text) - 1-1, format, arg);  //-V202
12353     va_end (arg);
12354 
12355     struct __ { static int trimSpaces (char str[])
12356         {
12357         char *dst = str, *src = str;
12358 
12359         for (char d = ' '; d; src++)
12360             if (isspace ((unsigned char)(*src))) { if (d != ' ') *dst++ = d = ' '; }
12361             else                                                 *dst++ = d = *src;
12362 
12363         return (int) (dst - str - 1);  //-V202
12364         }};
12365 
12366     if (options & compr)  n = __::trimSpaces (text);
12367 
12368     OutputDebugString (text);
12369 
12370     if (options & print)  fprintf (stderr, "%s", text);
12371 
12372     if (options & msgbox) txMessageBox (text, "Оказывается, что", MB_ICONEXCLAMATION);
12373 
12374     return n;
12375     }
12376 
12377 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
12378 
12379 intptr_t _tx_snprintf_s (char* stream, intptr_t size, const char* format, ...)
12380     {
12381     if (!format) return 0;
12382 
12383     va_list arg; va_start (arg, format);
12384     intptr_t ret = _tx_vsnprintf_s (stream, size, format, arg);
12385     va_end (arg);
12386 
12387     return ret;
12388     }
12389 
12390 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
12391 
12392 intptr_t _tx_vsnprintf_s (char stream[], intptr_t size, const char format[], va_list arg)
12393     {
12394     if (!stream || !format) return 0;
12395 
12396     #if defined (_TRUNCATE)
12397     intptr_t ret = _vsnprintf_s (stream, size, _TRUNCATE, format, arg);
12398     #else
12399     intptr_t ret = _vsnprintf   (stream, size,            format, arg);
12400     #endif
12401 
12402     if (ret < 0 && size >= 4)  //-V112
12403         {
12404         const char ellipsis[] = "...";
12405         size_t     szEllipsis = sizeof (ellipsis) - 1;
12406 
12407         strncpy_s (stream + size - szEllipsis, szEllipsis+1, ellipsis, szEllipsis);
12408         }
12409 
12410     return (ret >= 0)? ret : size;
12411     }
12412 
12413 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
12414 
12415 #if defined (__CYGWIN__)
12416 
12417 int _getch()
12418     {
12419     termios oldattr = {}; tcgetattr (STDIN_FILENO, &oldattr);
12420 
12421     termios newattr = oldattr;
12422     newattr.c_lflag &= ~(ICANON | ECHO);
12423     tcsetattr (STDIN_FILENO, TCSANOW, &newattr);
12424 
12425     int ch = getchar();
12426 
12427     tcsetattr (STDIN_FILENO, TCSANOW, &oldattr);
12428 
12429     return ch;
12430     }
12431 
12432 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
12433 
12434 int _putch (int ch)
12435     {
12436     termios old = {}; tcgetattr (STDOUT_FILENO, &old);
12437 
12438     termios cur = old;
12439     cur.c_lflag &= ~ICANON;
12440     cur.c_lflag |=  ECHO;
12441     tcsetattr (STDOUT_FILENO, TCSANOW, &cur);
12442 
12443     putchar (ch);
12444 
12445     tcsetattr (STDOUT_FILENO, TCSANOW, &old);
12446 
12447     return ch;
12448     }
12449 
12450 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
12451 
12452 int _kbhit()
12453     {
12454     termios old = {}; tcgetattr (STDIN_FILENO, &old);
12455 
12456     termios cur = old;
12457     cur.c_lflag &= ~(ICANON | ECHO);
12458     cur.c_cc[VMIN]  = 1;
12459     cur.c_cc[VTIME] = 0;
12460 
12461     tcsetattr (STDIN_FILENO, TCSAFLUSH, &cur);
12462 
12463     fd_set  fd = {}; FD_SET (STDIN_FILENO, &fd);
12464     timeval tv = {};
12465 
12466     int res = select (STDIN_FILENO + 1, &fd, NULL, NULL, &tv) && FD_ISSET (STDIN_FILENO, &fd);
12467 
12468     tcsetattr (STDIN_FILENO, TCSAFLUSH, &old);
12469 
12470     return res;
12471     }
12472 
12473 #endif
12474 
12475 #endif // TX_COMPILED
12476 
12477 //}
12478 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
12479 
12480 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
12481 //{          Information
12482 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
12483 
12484 #ifndef TX_COMPILED
12485 
12486 const char* txGetModuleFileName (bool fileNameOnly /*= true*/)
12487     {
12488     static char name[MAX_PATH] = "";
12489 
12490     if (!*name)
12491         {
12492         if (!GetModuleFileName (NULL, name, sizeof (name) - 1)) *name = 0;
12493 
12494         char* ext = strrchr (name, '.');
12495         if (ext) _strlwr_s (ext, sizeof (name) - 1 - (ext - name));
12496         }
12497 
12498     assert (*name);
12499 
12500     if (fileNameOnly) return name;
12501 
12502     static char fullName[MAX_PATH] = "";
12503     strncpy_s (fullName, sizeof (fullName), name, sizeof (fullName) - 1);
12504 
12505     char* title = strrchr (fullName, '\\'); if (!title) title = fullName;
12506     char* ext   = strrchr (fullName,  '.'); if (!ext)   ext   = fullName + strlen (fullName);
12507 
12508     size_t sz = sizeof (fullName) - (ext - fullName);
12509     strncpy_s (ext, sz-1, " - TXLib", sz);
12510 
12511     return title + 1;
12512     }
12513 
12514 #endif // TX_COMPILED
12515 
12516 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
12517 
12518 inline const char* _txAppInfo()
12519     {
12520 $1  time_t timeT     = time (NULL) - clock()/CLOCKS_PER_SEC;  //-V104
12521     char   timeS[32] = "";
12522     ctime_s (timeS, sizeof (timeS), &timeT);
12523 
12524     static char text[_TX_BUFSIZE] = "";
12525     char cwd [MAX_PATH] = "";
12526 
12527     _tx_snprintf_s (text, sizeof (text) - 1,
12528 
12529                     "Developed with:\n\n"
12530                     "The Dumb Artist Library (TX Library)\n"
12531                     _TX_VERSION "\n" _TX_AUTHOR "\n"
12532                     "See license on: http://txlib.ru\n\n"
12533 
12534                     "TXLib file:" "\t" __FILE__ "\n"
12535                     "Compiled:"   "\t" __DATE__ " " __TIME__ ", " __TX_COMPILER__ ", %s, %d-bit, " _TX_BUILDMODE "\n"
12536                     "Started:"    "\t" "%.6s %.4s %.8s\n\n"
12537 
12538                     "Run file:"   "\t" "%s\n"
12539                     "Directory:"  "\t" "%s",
12540 
12541     #if   defined (_MSC_VER)
12542                     "MSVC Runtime",
12543     #elif defined (__CYGWIN__)
12544                     "Cygwin Runtime",
12545     #elif defined (_GCC_VER) && defined (_WIN64)
12546                     __mingw_get_crt_info(),
12547     #else
12548                     "MinGW Runtime " TX_QUOTE (__MINGW32_MAJOR_VERSION) "." TX_QUOTE (__MINGW32_MINOR_VERSION),
12549     #endif
12550                     (sizeof (void*) == sizeof (DWORD))? 32 : 64,    //-V112
12551 
12552                     timeS + 4, timeS + 20, timeS + 11,              //-V112 These offsets are ANSI standardized
12553                     txGetModuleFileName(),
12554                     _getcwd (cwd, sizeof (cwd) - 1));
12555 
12556     return text;
12557     }
12558 
12559 //}
12560 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
12561 
12563 //}

12572     {
12573     return _TX_VERSION;
12574     }

12578 inline unsigned txVersionNumber()
12579     {
12580     return _TX_VER;  //-V2517
12581     }
