14113 
14114 #ifndef TX_COMPILED
14115 
14116 void _txDump (const void* address, const char name[] /*= "_txDump()"*/, bool pause /*= true*/)
14117     {
14118 $1  assert (!_txIsBadReadPtr (address));
14119 
14120     const unsigned char* p = (const unsigned char*) address;
14121 $   unsigned x = 0;
14122 
14123 $   unsigned attr = txGetConsoleAttr();
14124 
14125 $   txSetConsoleAttr (FOREGROUND_WHITE);
14126 $   printf ("\n%*.*s ", (int) sizeof (address) * 2, (int) sizeof (address) * 2, ((name)? name : ""));
14127 
14128 $   txSetConsoleAttr (FOREGROUND_YELLOW);
14129 $   for (x = 0; x < 16; x++) printf ("%02X ", x);
14130 $   for (x = 0; x < 16; x++) printf ("%X",    x);
14131 
14132 $   const char   isCtrl[] = "\a" "\b" "\n" "\r" "\t" "\0";
14133 $   const char   xlatCh[] =  "·"  "·"  "·"  "·"  "·"  "·";
14134 $   const size_t szCtrl   = sizeof (isCtrl) - 1;
14135 
14136 $   int oldCP = GetConsoleOutputCP();
14137 
14138 $   for (int y = 0; y < 16; y++, p += 16)
14139         {
14140         txSetConsoleAttr (FOREGROUND_YELLOW);
14141 
14142         printf ("\n" "%*p ", (int) sizeof (address) * 2, p);
14143 
14144         int color = FOREGROUND_LIGHTGREEN;
14145 
14146         for (x = 0; x < 16; x++)
14147             {
14148             txSetConsoleAttr (color + x/4%2);     //-V112
14149             printf ("%02X ", p[x]);
14150             }
14151 
14152         for (x = 0; x < 16; x++)
14153             {
14154             txSetConsoleAttr (color + x/4%2);     //-V112
14155 
14156             char c = p[x];
14157             const char* ctrl = (const char*) memchr (isCtrl, c, szCtrl);
14158             if (ctrl) c = xlatCh [ctrl - isCtrl];
14159 
14160             if (ctrl) SetConsoleOutputCP (1251);  //-V581
14161 
14162             printf ("%c", c);
14163 
14164             if (ctrl) SetConsoleOutputCP (oldCP);
14165             }
14166         }
14167 
14168 $   txSetConsoleAttr (attr);
14169 $   printf ("\n");
14170 
14171 $   if (pause)
14172         {
14173 $       SetConsoleOutputCP (_TX_CODEPAGE);
14174 
14175 $       fprintf (stderr, "%-*s CodePage = %5d\n", (int) sizeof (void*) * 2 + 16*3, "[Нажмите любую клавишу для продолжения]", oldCP);
14176 $       (void)_getch();
14177 
14178 $       SetConsoleOutputCP (oldCP);
14179         }
14180     }
14181 
14182 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
14183 
14184 void _txStackBackTrace (const char file[] /*= "?"*/, int line /*= 0*/, const char func[] /*= "?"*/,
14185                         bool readSource /*= true*/)
14186     {
14187 $1  unsigned attr = txGetConsoleAttr();
14188 $   txSetConsoleAttr (FOREGROUND_LIGHTCYAN);
14189 
14190 $   fprintf (stderr, "\n" "--------------------------------------------------\n"
14191                           "Трассировка стека из \"%s\" at %s (%d):\n\n"
14192                           "%s\n\n"
14193                           "--------------------------------------------------\n\n",
14194                           func, file, line, _txCaptureStackBackTrace (1, readSource));
14195 
14196 $   txSetConsoleAttr (attr);
14197     }
14198 
14199 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
14200 
14201 char* txDemangle (const char* mangledName, std::nomeow_t)
14202     {
14203 $1  if (!mangledName) return NULL;
14204 
14205 $   char* typeName = NULL;
14206 
14207     #if defined (_GCC_VER)
14208 
14209 $   int err = 1;
14210 $   typeName = ::abi::__cxa_demangle (mangledName, 0, 0, &err); (void) err;
14211     if (typeName) {$ return typeName; }
14212 
14213     #endif
14214 
14215 $   unsigned short flags = 0;
14216 
14217 $   if (mangledName[0] == '.')
14218         {
14219 $       mangledName++;
14220 $       flags = 0x2800;  // UNDNAME_32_BIT_DECODE | UNDNAME_TYPE_ONLY
14221         }
14222 
14223 $   typeName = _TX_CALL (Win32::__unDName, (NULL, mangledName, 0, malloc, free, flags));
14224     if (typeName) {$ return typeName; }
14225 
14226 $   return _strdup (mangledName);
14227     }
14228 
14229 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
14230 
14231 std::string txDemangle (const char* mangledName)
14232     {
14233 $1  char* typeName = txDemangle (mangledName, std::nomeow);
14234 $   std::string name (typeName? typeName : "");
14235 $   free (typeName);
14236 
14237 $   return name;
14238     }
14239 
14240 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
14241 
14242 double txQueryPerformance()
14243     {
14244 $1  int maxTime    =  500;
14245 $   int maxSamples =  100;
14246 $   POINT size     = {100, 100};
14247 
14248 $   HDC dc = _txBuffer_Create (txWindow(), &size, NULL);
14249 $   assert (dc); if (!dc) return -1;                                     //-V547
14250 
14251 $   DWORD mask = (DWORD) SetThreadAffinityMask (GetCurrentThread(), 1);  //-V202
14252 $   assert (mask);
14253 
14254 $   LARGE_INTEGER freq = {};
14255 $   QueryPerformanceFrequency (&freq) asserted;
14256 
14257 $   LARGE_INTEGER start = {};
14258 $   QueryPerformanceCounter (&start) asserted;
14259 
14260 $   int samples = 0;
14261 $   while (samples++ < maxSamples)
14262         {
14263 $       LARGE_INTEGER cur = {};
14264 $       QueryPerformanceCounter (&cur) asserted;
14265 
14266 $       double t = 1000.0 * (double) (cur.QuadPart - start.QuadPart) / (double) freq.QuadPart;
14267 $       if (t > maxTime) break;
14268 
14269         // Draw test scene
14270 
14271 $       for (int y = 0; y < size.y; y++)
14272         for (int x = 0; x < size.x; x++)     txSetPixel (x, y, TX_BLACK, dc);
14273 
14274 $       for (int y = 0; y < size.y; y += 10)
14275         for (int x = 0; x < size.x; x += 50) txTextOut  (x, y, "*", dc);
14276 
14277 $       txEllipse (0, 0, size.x, size.y, dc);
14278 $       txFloodFill (size.x/2.0, size.y/2.0, TX_TRANSPARENT, FLOODFILLSURFACE, dc);
14279 
14280 $       txBitBlt (dc, size.x/2.0,          0, size.x/2.0, size.y/2.0, dc,          0,          0) asserted;
14281 $       txBitBlt (dc, size.x/2.0, size.y/2.0, size.x/2.0, size.y/2.0, dc,          0, size.y/2.0) asserted;
14282 $       txBitBlt (dc,          0, size.y/2.0, size.x/2.0, size.y/2.0, dc,          0,          0) asserted;
14283 $       txBitBlt (dc, size.x/2.0, size.y/2.0, size.x/2.0, size.y/2.0, dc, size.x/2.0,          0) asserted;
14284         }
14285 
14286 $   mask = (DWORD) SetThreadAffinityMask (GetCurrentThread(), mask);  //-V106 //-V202
14287 $   assert (mask);
14288 
14289 $   _txBuffer_Delete (&dc);
14290 
14291 $   return 3.0 * samples / sqrt (1.0 * size.x * size.y);
14292     }
14293 
14294 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
14295 
14296 unsigned txExtractColor (COLORREF color, COLORREF component)
14297     {
14298 $1  switch (component)
14299         {
14300         case TX_RED:
14301         case TX_HUE:        $ return (color >>  0) & 0xFF;
14302 
14303         case TX_GREEN:
14304         case TX_SATURATION: $ return (color >>  8) & 0xFF;
14305 
14306         case TX_BLUE:
14307         case TX_LIGHTNESS:  $ return (color >> 16) & 0xFF;
14308 
14309         default:            $ return CLR_INVALID;
14310         }
14311     }
14312 
14313 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
14314 
14315 COLORREF txRGB2HSL (COLORREF rgbColor)
14316     {
14317 $1  int r = (int) txExtractColor (rgbColor, TX_RED),
14318         g = (int) txExtractColor (rgbColor, TX_GREEN),
14319         b = (int) txExtractColor (rgbColor, TX_BLUE);
14320 
14321 $   double m1 = MAX (MAX (r, g), b) / 255.0,
14322            m2 = MIN (MIN (r, g), b) / 255.0,
14323            dm = m1 - m2,
14324            sm = m1 + m2,
14325 
14326            ir = r / 255.0,  //-V2551
14327            ig = g / 255.0,  //-V2551
14328            ib = b / 255.0,  //-V2551
14329 
14330            ih = 0,
14331            is = 0,
14332            il = sm / 2;
14333 
14334 $   const double prec = 0.001;
14335 
14336 $   if (fabs (dm) < prec)
14337         {
14338 $       is = dm / ((sm <= 1)? sm : (2-sm));
14339 
14340 $       double cr = (m1 - ir) / dm,
14341                cg = (m1 - ig) / dm,
14342                cb = (m1 - ib) / dm;
14343 
14344 $       if (fabs (ir - m1) < prec) ih =     cb - cg;
14345 $       if (fabs (ig - m1) < prec) ih = 2 + cr - cb;
14346 $       if (fabs (ib - m1) < prec) ih = 4 + cg - cr;
14347         }
14348 
14349 $   ih = (ih >= 0)? ih*60 : ih*60 + 360;
14350 
14351 $   return RGB (ROUND (ih / 360 * 255), ROUND (is * 255), ROUND (il * 255));
14352     }
14353 
14354 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
14355 
14356 COLORREF txHSL2RGB (COLORREF hslColor)
14357     {
14358 $1  struct xRGB
14359         {
14360         static double calc (double h, double m1, double m2)
14361             {
14362 $           if (h < 0)   h += 360;
14363 $           if (h > 360) h -= 360;
14364 
14365 $           return (h <  60)? m1 + (m2-m1) *      h  / 60 :
14366                    (h < 180)? m2 :
14367                    (h < 240)? m1 + (m2-m1) * (240-h) / 60 :
14368                               m1;
14369             }
14370         };
14371 
14372 $   int h = (int) txExtractColor (hslColor, TX_HUE),
14373         s = (int) txExtractColor (hslColor, TX_SATURATION),
14374         l = (int) txExtractColor (hslColor, TX_LIGHTNESS);
14375 
14376 $   double ih = h / 255.0 * 360.0,
14377            il = l / 100.0,
14378            is = s / 100.0,
14379 
14380            m2 = (il <= 0.5)? il * (1 + is) : il + is - il * is,
14381            m1 = 2 * il - m2,
14382 
14383            ir = s? xRGB::calc (ih + 120, m1, m2) : il,
14384            ig = s? xRGB::calc (ih,       m1, m2) : il,
14385            ib = s? xRGB::calc (ih - 120, m1, m2) : il;
14386 
14387 $   return RGB (ROUND (ir * 255), ROUND (ig * 255), ROUND (ib * 255));
14388     }
14389 
14390 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
14391 
14392 void tx_fpreset()
14393     {
14394 $1  txAutoLock _lock;
14395 
14396 $   Win32::_fpreset();
14397 
14398 $   unsigned new87 = 0x0008001C;  // _EM_INVALID | _EM_DENORMAL | _EM_ZERODIVIDE | _EM_OVERFLOW | _EM_UNDERFLOW
14399 
14400     #if !defined (__CYGWIN__)
14401 
14402 $   unsigned old87 = 0;
14403 $   if (_controlfp_s (&old87, 0, 0) == 0)
14404         {$ (void) _controlfp_s (&old87, old87  & ~new87, 0x0008001F); }  // _MCW_EM
14405 
14406     #else
14407 
14408 $   Win32::_controlfp (Win32::_controlfp (0, 0) & ~new87, 0x0008001F);    // _MCW_EM
14409 
14410     #endif
14411     }
14412 
14413 #endif // TX_COMPILED
14414 
14415 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
14416 
14417 #if defined (_TX_CPP11)
14418 template <int txFramesToAverage>
14419 #endif
14420 
14421 double txGetFPS (int minFrames)
14422     {
14423 $1  static _tx_thread LARGE_INTEGER time0 = {}; if (!time0.QuadPart) QueryPerformanceCounter (&time0);
14424 $                     LARGE_INTEGER time  = {};                      QueryPerformanceCounter (&time);
14425 
14426 $   if (time.QuadPart - time0.QuadPart == 0)
14427         {$ return 0; }
14428 
14429 $   LARGE_INTEGER freq = {}; QueryPerformanceFrequency (&freq);
14430 
14431 $   double fps = (double) freq.QuadPart / (double) (time.QuadPart - time0.QuadPart);
14432 $   time0 = time;
14433 
14434 $   if (txFramesToAverage == 0) return fps;
14435 
14436 $   static _tx_thread double average [txFramesToAverage] = {};
14437 $   static _tx_thread unsigned n = 0;
14438 
14439 $   average [n++ % txFramesToAverage] = fps;
14440 
14441 $   unsigned nn = MIN (n, (unsigned) sizearr (average));
14442 
14443 $   fps = 0;
14444 $   for (unsigned i = 0; i < nn; i++) fps += average[i];
14445 $   fps /= nn;
14446 
14447 $   return ((int)n >= MIN (minFrames, txFramesToAverage))? fps : 0;
14448     }
14449 
14450 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
14451 
14452 inline double random (std::nomeow_t, double left, double right)
14453     {
14454     return left + (right - left) * ((double) rand() / RAND_MAX);
14455     }
14456 
14457 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
14458 
14459 inline int random (int range)
14460     {
14461     if (rand() % 100 == 0) fprintf (stderr, "%.4s ", (const volatile char*) ((rand() & 0x0F)? &_txCanaryFirst : &_txCanaryLast));  //-V206
14462 
14463     return rand() % range;
14464     }
14465 
14466 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
14467 
14468 inline double random (double left, double right)
14469     {
14470     if (rand() % 100 == 0) fprintf (stderr, "%.4s ", (const volatile char*) ((rand() & 0x0F)? &_txCanaryFirst : &_txCanaryLast));  //-V206
14471 
14472     return random (std::nomeow, left, right);
14473     }
14474 
14475 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
14476 
14477 template <typename T>
14478 inline T zero() { T __zero = {}; return __zero; }
14479 
14480 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
14481 
14482 template <typename Tx, typename Ta, typename Tb>
14483 inline bool In (std::nomeow_t, Tx x, Ta a, Tb b)
14484     {
14485     return a <= x && x <= b;
14486     }
14487 
14488 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
14489 
14490 template <typename Tx, typename Ta, typename Tb>
14491 inline bool In (Tx x, Ta a, Tb b)
14492     {
14493     if (rand() % 100 == 0) fprintf (stderr, "%.4s ", (const volatile char*) ((rand() & 0x0F)? &_txCanaryFirst : &_txCanaryLast));  //-V206
14494 
14495     return In (std::nomeow, x, a, b);
14496     }
14497 
14498 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
14499 
14500 inline bool In (const POINT& pt, const RECT& rect)
14501     {
14502     if (_TX_ARGUMENT_FAILED (&pt))   return false;
14503     if (_TX_ARGUMENT_FAILED (&rect)) return false;
14504 
14505     return In (std::nomeow, pt.x, rect.left, rect.right) &&
14506            In (std::nomeow, pt.y, rect.top,  rect.bottom);
14507     }
14508 
14509 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
14510 
14511 inline bool In (const COORD& pt, const SMALL_RECT& rect)
14512     {
14513     if (_TX_ARGUMENT_FAILED (&pt))   return false;
14514     if (_TX_ARGUMENT_FAILED (&rect)) return false;
14515 
14516     return In (std::nomeow, pt.X, rect.Left, rect.Right) &&
14517            In (std::nomeow, pt.Y, rect.Top,  rect.Bottom);
14518     }
14519 
14520 //}
14521 //=================================================================================================================
14522 
14523 //=================================================================================================================
14524 //{          txPrintf() implementation
14525 //           Реализация txPrintf()
14526 //=================================================================================================================
14527 
14528 #if defined (_TX_CPP11)
14529 
14530 template <typename T, typename... ArgsT> void _txPrintF (std::ostringstream& stream, const char* format, int n, const char*& fmt,                                  const T& arg, ArgsT... args);
14531 template <typename T, typename... ArgsT> void _txPrintF (std::ostringstream& stream, const char* format, int n, const char*& fmt, width_t width,                   const T& arg, ArgsT... args);
14532 template <typename T, typename... ArgsT> void _txPrintF (std::ostringstream& stream, const char* format, int n, const char*& fmt,                precision_t prec, const T& arg, ArgsT... args);
14533 template <typename T, typename... ArgsT> void _txPrintF (std::ostringstream& stream, const char* format, int n, const char*& fmt, width_t width, precision_t prec, const T& arg, ArgsT... args);
14534                                          void _txPrintF (std::ostringstream& stream, const char* format, int n, const char*& fmt);
14535 
14536 template <typename T>                    void _txPrintV (std::ostringstream& stream, const char* format, int n, const char*& fmt, const T& arg);
14537                                          void _txPrintV (std::ostringstream& stream, const char* format, int n, const char*& fmt, int*     arg);
14538                                          void _txPrintV (std::ostringstream& stream, const char* format, int n, const char*& fmt);
14539 
14540 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
14541 
14542 template <typename T, typename... ArgsT>
14543 void _txPrintF (std::ostringstream& stream, const char* format, int n, const char*& fmt, const T& arg, ArgsT... args)
14544     {
14545 $1  assert (fmt);
14546 
14547 $   _txPrintV (stream, format, n,   fmt);
14548 
14549     if (fmt[0] == '%') {$}
14550     else {$ TX_ERROR ("\"%%$\" required to print an argument in ...\"%s\" while printing %s argument %d in \"%s\"", fmt, txTypename (arg), n, format); }
14551 
14552 $   _txPrintV (stream, format, n,   fmt, arg);
14553 
14554 $   _txPrintF (stream, format, n+1, fmt, args...);
14555     }
14556 
14557 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
14558 
14559 template <typename T, typename... ArgsT>
14560 void _txPrintF (std::ostringstream& stream, const char* format, int n, const char*& fmt, width_t width, const T& arg, ArgsT... args)
14561     {
14562 $1  assert (&stream);
14563 $   assert (fmt);
14564 
14565 $   _txPrintV (stream, format, n,   fmt);
14566 
14567     if (fmt[0] == '%' && fmt[1] == '*') {$ stream << std::setw (width); }  //-V2006
14568     else {$ TX_ERROR ("\"%%*\" required to setwidth (%d) in ...\"%s\" while printing %s argument %d in \"%s\"", width, fmt, txTypename (arg), n, format); }
14569 
14570 $   _txPrintV (stream, format, n,   fmt, arg);
14571 
14572 $   _txPrintF (stream, format, n+1, fmt, args...);
14573     }
14574 
14575 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
14576 
14577 template <typename T, typename... ArgsT>
14578 void _txPrintF (std::ostringstream& stream, const char* format, int n, const char*& fmt, precision_t prec, const T& arg, ArgsT... args)
14579     {
14580 $1  assert (&stream);
14581 $   assert (fmt);
14582 
14583 $   _txPrintV (stream, format, n,   fmt);
14584 
14585     if (fmt[0] == '%' && fmt[1] == '.' && fmt[2] == '*') {$ stream << std::setprecision (prec + 1); }
14586     else {$ TX_ERROR ("\"%%.*\" required to setprecision (%d) in ...\"%s\" while printing %s argument %d in \"%s\"", prec, fmt, txTypename (arg), n, format); }
14587 
14588 $   _txPrintV (stream, format, n,   fmt, arg);
14589 
14590 $   _txPrintF (stream, format, n+1, fmt, args...);
14591     }
14592 
14593 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
14594 
14595 template <typename T, typename... ArgsT>
14596 void _txPrintF (std::ostringstream& stream, const char* format, int n, const char*& fmt, width_t width, precision_t prec, const T& arg, ArgsT... args)
14597     {
14598 $1  assert (&stream);
14599 $   assert (fmt);
14600 
14601 $   _txPrintV (stream, format, n,   fmt);
14602 
14603     if (fmt[0] == '%' && fmt[1] == '*' && fmt[2] == '.' && fmt[3] == '*') {$ stream << std::setw (width) << std::setprecision (prec + 1); }  //-V2006
14604     else {$ TX_ERROR ("\"%%*.*\" required to setwidth (%d) and setprecision (%d) in ...\"%s\" while printing %s argument %d in \"%s\"", width, prec, fmt, txTypename (arg), n, format); }
14605 
14606 $   _txPrintV (stream, format, n,   fmt, arg);
14607 
14608 $   _txPrintF (stream, format, n+1, fmt, args...);
14609     }
14610 
14611 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
14612 
14613 inline void _txPrintF (std::ostringstream& stream, const char* format, int n, const char*& fmt)
14614     {
14615 $1  assert (fmt);
14616 
14617 $   _txPrintV (stream, format, n,   fmt);
14618 
14619     if (!fmt[0]) {$}
14620     else {$ TX_ERROR ("No argument provided for %% in \"%s\" while printing \"%s\"", fmt, format); }
14621     }
14622 
14623 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
14624 
14625 inline void _txPrintV (std::ostringstream& stream, const char*, int, const char*& fmt)
14626     {
14627 $1  assert (&stream);
14628 $   assert (fmt);
14629 
14630 $   while (*fmt)
14631         {
14632         if (fmt[0] == '%')
14633             {
14634             if (fmt[1] == '%') fmt++;
14635             else break;
14636             }
14637 
14638         stream << *fmt++;
14639         }
14640 $   }
14641 
14642 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
14643 
14644 template <typename T>
14645 void _txPrintV (std::ostringstream& stream, const char* format, int n, const char*& fmt, const T& arg)
14646     {
14647 $1  assert (&stream);
14648 $   assert (fmt);
14649 
14650 $   if (_TX_ARGUMENT_FAILED (&arg)) return;
14651 
14652     if (fmt[0] == '%') {$}
14653     else {$ TX_ERROR ("\"%%$\" required to print an argument in ...\"%s\" while printing %s argument %d in \"%s\"", fmt, txTypename (arg), n, format); }
14654 
14655 $   fmt++;
14656 
14657 $   char                    oldFill  = stream.fill (' ');
14658 $   std::ios_base::fmtflags oldFlags = stream.flags();
14659 
14660 $   for (;;) switch (*fmt)
14661         {
14662         case '-': $ stream << std::left;     fmt++; break;
14663         case '+': $ stream << std::showpos;  fmt++; break;
14664         case ' ': $ stream.fill (' ');       fmt++; break;
14665         case '#': $ stream << std::showbase; fmt++; break;
14666         case '0': $ stream.fill ('0');       fmt++; break;
14667 
14668         default:  $ goto end;
14669         }
14670     end:
14671 
14672 $   int width = (*fmt != '*')?                  (int) strtoul (fmt, const_cast <char**> (&fmt), 10) : (fmt++, 0);
14673 $   int prec  = (*fmt == '.')? (*++fmt != '*')? (int) strtoul (fmt, const_cast <char**> (&fmt), 10) : (fmt++, 0) : 0;
14674 
14675     if (width) {$ stream << std::setw (width);        }
14676     if (prec)  {$ stream << std::setprecision (prec); }
14677 
14678 $   fmt += strspn (fmt, "hljztL");
14679 
14680 $   switch (*fmt)
14681         {
14682         case '$':
14683         case '?': $                                              break;
14684 
14685         case 'd':
14686         case 'i':
14687         case 'u': $ stream << std::dec;                          break;
14688 
14689         case 'o': $ stream << std::oct;                          break;
14690 
14691         case 'x': $ stream << std::hex;                          break;
14692         case 'X': $ stream << std::hex        << std::uppercase; break;
14693 
14694         case 'f': $ stream << std::fixed;                        break;
14695         case 'F': $ stream << std::fixed      << std::uppercase; break;
14696 
14697         case 'e': $ stream << std::scientific;                   break;
14698         case 'E': $ stream << std::scientific << std::uppercase; break;
14699 
14700         case 'g': $                                              break;
14701         case 'G': $ stream                    << std::uppercase; break;
14702 
14703         case 'a': $                                              break;
14704         case 'A': $ stream                    << std::uppercase; break;
14705 
14706         case 'c':
14707         case 's':
14708         case 'p': $                                              break;
14709 
14710         default:  $ TX_ERROR ("Invalid format '%.1s' at \"%s\" while printing %s argument %d in \"%s\"", fmt, fmt, txTypename (arg), n, format); break;
14711         }
14712 
14713 $   fmt++;
14714 
14715     if (&arg) {$ stream << arg;      }
14716     else      {$ stream << "(null)"; }
14717 
14718 $   stream.fill  (oldFill);
14719 $   stream.flags (oldFlags);
14720     }
14721 
14722 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
14723 
14724 inline void _txPrintV (std::ostringstream& stream, const char* format, int n, const char*& fmt, int* arg)  //-V2009
14725     {
14726 $1  assert (fmt);
14727 
14728     if (_TX_ARGUMENT_FAILED (arg)) return;
14729 
14730     if (fmt[0] == '%' && fmt[1] == 'n') {$}
14731     else {$ TX_ERROR ("\"%%n\" required to store print length in int* argument %d in \"%s\"", n, format); }
14732 
14733 $   *arg = (int) stream.str().length();  //-V202
14734 
14735 $   fmt += 2;
14736     }
14737 
14738 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
14739 
14740 template <typename T> inline const T&    _txPrintfNormalizeArg (const T&           arg) { if (_TX_ARGUMENT_FAILED (&arg)) {;}          return arg;         }
14741                       inline const char* _txPrintfNormalizeArg (const std::string& arg) { if (_TX_ARGUMENT_FAILED (&arg)) return NULL; return arg.c_str(); }
14742 
14743 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
14744 
14745 template <typename... ArgsT>
14746 inline int txPrintf (std::ostringstream& stream, const char* format, ArgsT... args)
14747     {
14748 $1  if (_TX_ARGUMENT_FAILED (&stream)) return 0;
14749 $   if (_TX_ARGUMENT_FAILED (&format)) return 0;
14750 
14751 $   const char* fmt = format;
14752 $   _txPrintF (stream, format, 2, fmt, _txPrintfNormalizeArg (args)...);
14753 
14754 $   return (int) stream.str().length();  //-V202
14755     }
14756 
14757 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
14758 
14759 template <typename... ArgsT>
14760 inline int txPrintf (char buffer[], size_t size, const char* format, ArgsT... args)
14761     {
14762 $1  if (_TX_ARGUMENT_FAILED (&buffer)) return 0;
14763 $   if (_TX_ARGUMENT_FAILED (&format)) return 0;
14764 
14765 $   if (size > 0) size--;
14766 $   buffer[size] = 0;
14767 
14768 $   if (!size) return 0;
14769 
14770 $   std::ostringstream stream;
14771 $   stream.rdbuf() -> pubsetbuf (buffer, size);
14772 
14773 $   txPrintf (stream, format, args...);
14774 
14775 $   return (int) stream.str().length();  //-V202
14776     }
14777 
14778 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
14779 
14780 template <typename... ArgsT>
14781 inline std::string txFormat (const char* format, ArgsT... args)
14782     {
14783 $1  if (_TX_ARGUMENT_FAILED (&format)) return "";
14784 
14785 $   std::ostringstream stream;
14786 
14787 $   txPrintf (stream, format, args...);
14788 
14789 $   return stream.str();
14790     }
14791 
14792 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
14793 
14794 template <typename... ArgsT>
14795 inline int txPrintf (const char* format, ArgsT... args)
14796     {
14797 $1  if (_TX_ARGUMENT_FAILED (&format)) return 0;
14798 
14799 $   return printf ("%s", txFormat (format, args...) .c_str());
14800     }
14801 
14802 #endif
14803 
14804 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
14805 
14806        int _txPrintfCheck (const char* format, ...) tx_printfy (1);
14807 inline int _txPrintfCheck (const char*,        ...) { return 0; }
14808 
14809 //}
14810 //=================================================================================================================
14811 
14812 //=================================================================================================================
14813 //{          txDialog methods implementation
14814 //           Реализация методов класса txDialog
14815 //
14816 //           See [1] http://msdn.microsoft.com/ru-ru/library/windows/desktop/ms645389%28v=vs.85%29.aspx
14817 //               [2] http://blogs.msdn.microsoft.com/oldnewthing/20050429-00/?p=35743
14818 //               [3] http://blogs.msdn.microsoft.com/oldnewthing/20040623-00/?p=38753
14819 //=================================================================================================================
14820 
14821 #ifndef TX_COMPILED
14822 
14823 txDialog::txDialog () :
14824     layout_ (NULL)
14825     {$1}
14826 
14827 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
14828 
14829 txDialog::txDialog (const Layout* layout) :
14830     layout_ (layout)
14831     {$1}
14832 
14833 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
14834 
14835 const txDialog::Layout* txDialog::setLayout (const Layout* layout)
14836     {
14837 $1  assert (layout);
14838 
14839 $   return ::std::swap (layout_, layout), layout;
14840     }
14841 
14842 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
14843 
14844 intptr_t txDialog::dialogBox (WORD resourceID)
14845     {
14846 $1  const char* resName = (char*)(uintptr_t) resourceID;
14847 
14848 $   if (!FindResource (NULL, resName, RT_DIALOG)) return TX_DEBUG_ERROR ("Не найден ресурс диалога %d", resourceID), 0;
14849 
14850 $   return DialogBoxParam (NULL, resName, NULL, (DLGPROC) DialogProc_, (LPARAM) this);
14851     }
14852 
14853 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
14854 
14855 intptr_t txDialog::dialogBox (const txDialog::Layout* layout /*= NULL*/, size_t bufsize /*= 0*/)
14856     {
14857 $1  if (!layout)  layout = layout_;
14858 $   if (!layout)  return TX_DEBUG_ERROR ("Не установлен динамический шаблон диалога"), 0;
14859 
14860 $   if (!bufsize) bufsize = 1024;
14861 
14862 $   DLGTEMPLATE* tmpl = (DLGTEMPLATE*) GlobalAlloc (GPTR, bufsize);
14863 $   if (!tmpl) return TX_DEBUG_ERROR ("GlobalAlloc(): Нет памяти для шаблона диалога"), 0;
14864 
14865 $   const Layout* dlg = &layout[0];
14866 $   const Layout  def = { DIALOG, NULL, 0, 0,0,0,0, WS_CAPTION | WS_SYSMENU | DS_MODALFRAME | DS_CENTER, "MS Shell Dlg", 8 };
14867 
14868 $   void* ptr = _tx_DLGTEMPLATE_Create (tmpl, bufsize,
14869                                        (dlg->style? dlg->style : def.style) | DS_SETFONT, 0, 0,
14870                                         dlg->x, dlg->y, dlg->sx, dlg->sy,
14871                                         dlg->caption?  dlg->caption  : def.caption,
14872                                         dlg->font?     dlg->font     : def.font,
14873                                         dlg->fontsize? dlg->fontsize : def.fontsize, NULL);
14874 $   WORD i = 0;
14875 $   for (i = 1; layout[i].wndclass != END; ++i)
14876         {
14877 $       const Layout* item = &layout[i];
14878 
14879 $       ptr = _tx_DLGTEMPLATE_Add (ptr, bufsize - ((char*)ptr - (char*)tmpl),
14880                                    item->style | WS_VISIBLE, 0, item->x, item->y, item->sx, item->sy,
14881                                    item->id, (const char*)(uintptr_t) item->wndclass, item->caption);
14882         }
14883 
14884 $   tmpl->cdit = (unsigned short) (i-1);
14885 
14886 $   intptr_t res = DialogBoxIndirectParam (NULL, tmpl, NULL, (DLGPROC) DialogProc_, (LPARAM) this);
14887 
14888 $   GlobalFree (tmpl);
14889 
14890 $   return res;
14891     }
14892 
14893 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
14894 
14895 int txDialog::dialogProc (HWND wnd, UINT msg, WPARAM wParam, LPARAM)
14896     {
14897 $1  switch (msg)
14898         {
14899         case WM_INITDIALOG: $ SetForegroundWindow (wnd);
14900                             $ break;
14901 
14902         case WM_COMMAND:    $ switch (LOWORD (wParam))
14903             {
14904             case IDOK:
14905             case IDCANCEL:  $ SetForegroundWindow (txWindow()? txWindow() : Win32::GetConsoleWindow());
14906                             $ EndDialog (wnd, (uintptr_t) this);
14907                             $ break;
14908 
14909             default:        $ break;
14910             }
14911                             $ break;
14912         default:            $ break;
14913         }
14914 
14915 $   return FALSE;
14916     }
14917 
14918 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
14919 
14920 intptr_t CALLBACK txDialog::DialogProc_ (HWND wnd, UINT msg, WPARAM wParam, LPARAM lParam)
14921     {
14922 $1  static txDialog* this__ = NULL;
14923 $   if (msg == WM_INITDIALOG) this__ = (txDialog*) lParam;
14924 $   if (!this__) return FALSE;
14925 
14926 $   return this__-> dialogProc (wnd, msg, wParam, lParam);  //-V109
14927     }
14928 
14929 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
14930 
14931 void* _tx_DLGTEMPLATE_Create (void* globalMem, size_t bufsize, DWORD style, DWORD exStyle,
14932                               WORD controls, short x, short y, short cx, short cy,
14933                               const char caption[], const char font[], WORD fontsize, const char menu[])
14934     {
14935 $1  if (_TX_ARGUMENT_FAILED (globalMem)) return NULL;
14936 
14937 $   WORD* pw = (WORD*) globalMem;
14938 
14939 $   DLGTEMPLATE* tmpl = ((DLGTEMPLATE*&) pw)++;
14940 
14941 $   tmpl->style = style;
14942 $   tmpl->dwExtendedStyle = exStyle;
14943 $   tmpl->cdit  = controls;
14944 $   tmpl->x     = x;
14945 $   tmpl->y     = y;
14946 $   tmpl->cx    = cx;
14947 $   tmpl->cy    = cy;
14948 
14949 $   if (menu > (const char*) 0xFFFF)
14950         {
14951 $       pw  += MultiByteToWideChar  (_TX_CODEPAGE, 0, (menu?    menu    : ""), -1, (wchar_t*) pw,           //-V547
14952                                     (int) (bufsize? bufsize - ((char*) pw - (char*) globalMem) : 0xFFFF));  //-V202
14953         }
14954     else
14955         {
14956 $       *pw++ = (WORD)(uintptr_t) (menu? 0xFFFF : 0);
14957 $       *pw++ = (WORD)(uintptr_t)  menu;
14958         }
14959 
14960 $   if (caption)
14961         {
14962 $       pw  += MultiByteToWideChar  (_TX_CODEPAGE, 0, (caption? caption : ""), -1, (wchar_t*) pw,           //-V547
14963                                     (int) (bufsize? bufsize - ((char*) pw - (char*) globalMem) : 0xFFFF));  //-V202
14964         }
14965 
14966 $   if (style & DS_SETFONT)
14967         {
14968 $       *pw++ = fontsize;
14969 $        pw  += MultiByteToWideChar (_TX_CODEPAGE, 0, (font?    font    : ""), -1, (wchar_t*) pw,
14970                                     (int) (bufsize? bufsize - ((char*) pw - (char*) globalMem) : 0xFFFF));  //-V202
14971         }
14972 
14973 $   return pw;
14974     }
14975 
14976 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
14977 
14978 void* _tx_DLGTEMPLATE_Add (void* dlgTemplatePtr, size_t bufsize, DWORD style, DWORD exStyle,
14979                            short x, short y, short cx, short cy,
14980                            WORD id, const char wclass[], const char caption[])
14981     {
14982 $1  if (_TX_ARGUMENT_FAILED (dlgTemplatePtr)) return NULL;
14983 
14984 $   WORD* pw = (LPWORD) dlgTemplatePtr;  // Force align at word boundary
14985 $   ((ULONG&) pw)  += 3;  //-V205
14986 $   ((ULONG&) pw) >>= 2;  //-V205
14987 $   ((ULONG&) pw) <<= 2;  //-V205
14988 
14989 $   DLGITEMTEMPLATE* tmpl = ((DLGITEMTEMPLATE*&) pw)++;
14990 
14991 $   tmpl->style = style;
14992 $   tmpl->dwExtendedStyle = exStyle;
14993 $   tmpl->x     = x;
14994 $   tmpl->y     = y;
14995 $   tmpl->cx    = cx;
14996 $   tmpl->cy    = cy;
14997 $   tmpl->id    = id;
14998 
14999 $   if (HIWORD (wclass) == 0xFFFF)
15000         {
15001 $       *pw++ = (WORD) (HIWORD ((uintptr_t) wclass));
15002 $       *pw++ = (WORD) (LOWORD ((uintptr_t) wclass));
15003         }
15004     else if (wclass)
15005         {
15006 $       pw  += MultiByteToWideChar (_TX_CODEPAGE, 0, const_cast <char*> (wclass), -1, (wchar_t*) pw,
15007                                    (int) (bufsize? bufsize - ((char*) pw - (char*) dlgTemplatePtr) : 0xFFFF));   //-V202
15008         }
15009     else
15010         {
15011 $       *pw++ = 0;
15012         }
15013 
15014 $   if (caption)
15015          {
15016 $        pw  += MultiByteToWideChar (_TX_CODEPAGE, 0, caption, -1, (wchar_t*) pw,
15017                                     (int) (bufsize? bufsize - ((char*) pw - (char*) dlgTemplatePtr) : 0xFFFF));  //-V202
15018          }
15019     else
15020         {
15021 $       *pw++ = 0;
15022         }
15023 
15024 $   *pw++ = 0;
15025 
15026 $   return pw;
15027     }
15028 
15029 #endif // TX_COMPILED
15030 
15031 //}

15037 //=================================================================================================================
15038 
15039 #undef       $
15040 #undef       $0
15041 #undef       $1
15042 #undef       $2
15043 #undef       $3
15044 #undef       $4
15045 #undef       $5
15046 #undef       $6
15047 #undef       $7
15048 #undef       $8
15049 #undef       $9
15050 #undef       $$
15051 
15052 //}

15182 //}----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
15183 
15184 #ifndef __TX_DEBUG_MACROS
15185 #define __TX_DEBUG_MACROS  ("Группа отладочных $-макросов")
15186 
15188 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
15189 
15190 #define $H            txSetConsoleAttr (FOREGROUND_BLACK        | BACKGROUND_BLACK);
15191 #define $B            txSetConsoleAttr (FOREGROUND_BLUE         | BACKGROUND_BLACK);
15192 #define $G            txSetConsoleAttr (FOREGROUND_GREEN        | BACKGROUND_BLACK);
15193 #define $C            txSetConsoleAttr (FOREGROUND_CYAN         | BACKGROUND_BLACK);
15194 #define $R            txSetConsoleAttr (FOREGROUND_RED          | BACKGROUND_BLACK);
15195 #define $M            txSetConsoleAttr (FOREGROUND_MAGENTA      | BACKGROUND_BLACK);
15196 #define $Y            txSetConsoleAttr (FOREGROUND_DARKYELLOW   | BACKGROUND_BLACK);
15197 #define $d            txSetConsoleAttr (FOREGROUND_LIGHTGRAY    | BACKGROUND_BLACK);
15198 #define $D            txSetConsoleAttr (FOREGROUND_DARKGRAY     | BACKGROUND_BLACK);
15199 #define $b            txSetConsoleAttr (FOREGROUND_LIGHTBLUE    | BACKGROUND_BLACK);
15200 #define $g            txSetConsoleAttr (FOREGROUND_LIGHTGREEN   | BACKGROUND_BLACK);
15201 #define $c            txSetConsoleAttr (FOREGROUND_LIGHTCYAN    | BACKGROUND_BLACK);
15202 #define $r            txSetConsoleAttr (FOREGROUND_LIGHTRED     | BACKGROUND_BLACK);
15203 #define $m            txSetConsoleAttr (FOREGROUND_LIGHTMAGENTA | BACKGROUND_BLACK);
15204 #define $y            txSetConsoleAttr (FOREGROUND_YELLOW       | BACKGROUND_BLACK);
15205 #define $h            txSetConsoleAttr (FOREGROUND_WHITE        | BACKGROUND_BLACK);
15206 
15207 #define $i            txSetConsoleAttr (FOREGROUND_LIGHTCYAN    | BACKGROUND_BLUE);
15208 #define $I            txSetConsoleAttr (FOREGROUND_YELLOW       | BACKGROUND_BLUE);
15209 #define $o            txSetConsoleAttr (FOREGROUND_LIGHTGREEN   | BACKGROUND_GREEN);
15210 #define $O            txSetConsoleAttr (FOREGROUND_YELLOW       | BACKGROUND_GREEN);
15211 #define $e            txSetConsoleAttr (FOREGROUND_WHITE        | BACKGROUND_RED);
15212 #define $E            txSetConsoleAttr (FOREGROUND_YELLOW       | BACKGROUND_RED);
15213 #define $w            txSetConsoleAttr (FOREGROUND_LIGHTMAGENTA | BACKGROUND_MAGENTA);
15214 #define $W            txSetConsoleAttr (FOREGROUND_YELLOW       | BACKGROUND_MAGENTA);
15215 #define $f            txSetConsoleAttr (FOREGROUND_BLACK        | BACKGROUND_LIGHTRED);
15216 #define $F            txSetConsoleAttr (FOREGROUND_MAGENTA      | BACKGROUND_LIGHTRED);
15217 #define $l            txSetConsoleAttr (FOREGROUND_BLACK        | BACKGROUND_DARKGRAY);
15218 #define $L            txSetConsoleAttr (FOREGROUND_LIGHTGRAY    | BACKGROUND_DARKGRAY);
15219 
15220 #define $T( cond )    txSetConsoleAttr ((cond)? FOREGROUND_LIGHTGREEN : FOREGROUND_LIGHTRED );
15221 
15222 #define $s            _txSaveConsoleAttr TX_JOIN (__txSavedConsoleAttrs, __LINE__);
15223 
15224 #define $sH           $s $H
15225 #define $sB           $s $B
15226 #define $sG           $s $G
15227 #define $sC           $s $C
15228 #define $sR           $s $R
15229 #define $sM           $s $M
15230 #define $sY           $s $Y
15231 #define $sd           $s $d
15232 #define $sD           $s $D
15233 #define $sb           $s $b
15234 #define $sg           $s $g
15235 #define $sc           $s $c
15236 #define $sr           $s $r
15237 #define $sm           $s $m
15238 #define $sy           $s $y
15239 #define $sh           $s $h
15240 
15241 #define $si           $s $i
15242 #define $sI           $s $I
15243 #define $so           $s $o
15244 #define $sO           $s $O
15245 #define $se           $s $e
15246 #define $sE           $s $E
15247 #define $sw           $s $w
15248 #define $sW           $s $W
15249 #define $sf           $s $f
15250 #define $sF           $s $F
15251 #define $sl           $s $l
15252 #define $sL           $s $L
15253 
15254 #define $sT( cond )   $s $T (cond)
15255 
15256 #define $test(cond)   { if (!!(cond)) { $o std::cerr << "[PASSED] " __TX_FILELINE__ ": " #cond; } \
15257                         else          { $e std::cerr << "[FAILED] " __TX_FILELINE__ ": " #cond; } $d; }
15258 
15259 #define $status(cond) $test (cond)
15260 
15261 #define $unittest( code, expected )                                                                                             \
15262     {                                                                                                                           \
15263     const _tx_decltype (code)     & _result   = (code);       /* Should use auto, but g++ 4.7.2 default std is < 2011 */        \
15264     const _tx_decltype (expected) & _expected = (expected);                                                                     \
15265                                                                                                                                 \
15266     if (_result == _expected)                                                                                                   \
15267         { $so std::cerr << "[PASSED] " __TX_FILELINE__ ": " #code; }                                                            \
15268     else                                                                                                                        \
15269         { $se std::cerr << "[FAILED] " __TX_FILELINE__ ": " #code " == (" << _result << "), should be (" << _expected << ")"; } \
15270                                                                                                                                 \
15271     $n;                                                                                                                         \
15272     (_result == _expected);                                                                                                     \
15273     }
15274 
15275 //=================================================================================================================
15276 
15277 #ifdef _GCC_VER
15278 
15279 #define $V(  var, ...)       (               _txDumpVar ((var),  "[",             __VA_ARGS__ "]\n") )
15280 #define $V_( var, ...)       (               _txDumpVar ((var),  "[",             __VA_ARGS__ "] " ) )
15281 #define $V__(var, ...)       (               _txDumpVar ((var),  "[",             __VA_ARGS__ "]"  ) )
15282 
15283 #define $(   var, ...)       (               _txDumpVar ((var),  "[" #var " = ",  __VA_ARGS__ "]\n") )
15284 #define $_(  var, ...)       (               _txDumpVar ((var),  "[" #var " = ",  __VA_ARGS__ "] " ) )
15285 #define $__( var, ...)       (               _txDumpVar ((var),  "[" #var " = ",  __VA_ARGS__ "]"  ) )
15286 
15287 #define $x(  var, ...)       (               _txDumpVar ((var),  "[" #var " = ",  __VA_ARGS__ "]\n", ::std::ios_base::showbase | ::std::ios_base::hex) )
15288 #define $x_( var, ...)       (               _txDumpVar ((var),  "[" #var " = ",  __VA_ARGS__ "] ",  ::std::ios_base::showbase | ::std::ios_base::hex) )
15289 
15290 #define $v(  var, cond, ...) { { $st (cond); _txDumpVar ((var),  "[" #var " = ",  __VA_ARGS__ "]" ); } $n; }
15291 #define $v_( var, cond, ...) {   $st (cond); _txDumpVar ((var),  "[" #var " = ",  __VA_ARGS__ "]" );       }
15292 
15293 #else
15294 
15295 #define $V(  var, ...)       (               _txDumpVar ((var),  "[",            #__VA_ARGS__ "]\n") )
15296 #define $V_( var, ...)       (               _txDumpVar ((var),  "[",            #__VA_ARGS__ "] " ) )
15297 #define $V__(var, ...)       (               _txDumpVar ((var),  "[",            #__VA_ARGS__ "]"  ) )
15298 
15299 #define $(   var, ...)       (               _txDumpVar ((var),  "[" #var " = ", #__VA_ARGS__ "]\n") )
15300 #define $_(  var, ...)       (               _txDumpVar ((var),  "[" #var " = ", #__VA_ARGS__ "] " ) )
15301 #define $__( var, ...)       (               _txDumpVar ((var),  "[" #var " = ", #__VA_ARGS__ "]"  ) )
15302 
15303 #define $x(  var, ...)       (               _txDumpVar ((var),  "[" #var " = ", #__VA_ARGS__ "]\n", ::std::ios_base::showbase | ::std::ios_base::hex) )
15304 #define $x_( var, ...)       (               _txDumpVar ((var),  "[" #var " = ", #__VA_ARGS__ "] ",  ::std::ios_base::showbase | ::std::ios_base::hex) )
15305 
15306 #define $v(  var, cond, ...) { { $st (cond); _txDumpVar ((var),  "[" #var " = ", #__VA_ARGS__ "]" ); } $n; }
15307 #define $v_( var, cond, ...) {   $st (cond); _txDumpVar ((var),  "[" #var " = ", #__VA_ARGS__ "]" );       }
15308 
15309 #endif
15310 
15311 #define $$                   { txOutputDebugPrintf ("\f\n"); { $sC txOutputDebugPrintf ("\f" "[%s (%d) %s]", __FILE__, __LINE__, __TX_FUNCTION__);                                   } txOutputDebugPrintf ("\f\n"); }
15312 #define $$_                  { txOutputDebugPrintf ("\f\n"); { $sC txOutputDebugPrintf ("\f" "[" "(%d) %s]",           __LINE__, __func__);                                          } txOutputDebugPrintf ("\f\n"); }
15313 #define $meow(...)           { txOutputDebugPrintf ("\f\n"); { $sc txOutputDebugPrintf ("\f" "[%s (%d) %s]", __FILE__, __LINE__, __func__); txOutputDebugPrintf ("\f " __VA_ARGS__); } txOutputDebugPrintf ("\f\n"); }
15314 #define $meow_               { txOutputDebugPrintf ("\f\n"); { $sc txOutputDebugPrintf ("\f" "[%s (%d) %s]", __FILE__, __LINE__, __func__); txOutputDebugPrintf ("\f");              } txOutputDebugPrintf ("\f\n"); }
15315 
15316 #define $$$(   ... )         ( ::std::cerr << "\n[" __TX_FILELINE__ ": " #__VA_ARGS__ "]\n", _txDumpVar ((__VA_ARGS__),"\n[" __TX_FILELINE__ ": " #__VA_ARGS__ ": ", ", DONE]\n\n") )
15317 #define $$$_(  ... )         ( ::std::cerr << "\n[" __TX_FILELINE__ ": " #__VA_ARGS__ "]\n", _txDumpVar ((__VA_ARGS__),  "[" __TX_FILELINE__ ": " #__VA_ARGS__ ": ", ", DONE]\n\n") )
15318 
15319 #define $$$$(  ... )         { ::std::cerr << "\n[" __TX_FILELINE__ ": " #__VA_ARGS__ "]\n"; _txDumpVarSuffix         ("\n[" __TX_FILELINE__ ": " #__VA_ARGS__        " DONE]\n\n"); { __VA_ARGS__; } }
15320 #define $$$$_( ... )         { ::std::cerr << "\n[" __TX_FILELINE__ ": " #__VA_ARGS__ "]\n"; _txDumpVarSuffix         (  "[" __TX_FILELINE__ ": " #__VA_ARGS__        " DONE]\n\n"); { __VA_ARGS__; } }
15321 #define $do(   ... )           ::std::cerr << "\n[" __TX_FILELINE__ ": " #__VA_ARGS__ "]\n";                                                                                           __VA_ARGS__
15322 #define $DO(   ... )           ::std::cerr << "\n[" __TX_FILELINE__ ": " #__VA_ARGS__ "]...\n"; $p;                                                                                    __VA_ARGS__
15323 #define $Do(   ... )           ::std::cerr << "\n[" __TX_FILELINE__ ": " #__VA_ARGS__ "]...\n";                                                                                        \
15324                                txMessageBox ( "\n[" __TX_FILELINE__ ": " #__VA_ARGS__ "]...\n", __TX_FUNCTION__);                                                                      __VA_ARGS__
15325 
15326 #define $n                   { ::std::cerr << "\n";   }
15327 #define $nn                  { ::std::cerr << "\n\n"; }
15328 #define $t                   { ::std::cerr << "\t";   }
15329 
15330 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
15331 
15332 // This will never be documented, he-he. Read the source, Luke.
15333 
15334 #if defined (_DEBUG)
15335     #define $debug       if (1)
15336     #define $printf      if (1)
15337     #define $PRINTF      if (1)
15338 #else
15339     #define $debug       if (0)
15340     #define $printf      if (0)
15341     #define $PRINTF      if (0)
15342 #endif
15343 
15344 #define $$d              $debug
15345 #define $$w              $$$$
15346 #define $$s              __TX_FILELINE__
15347 #define $$b              { txSleep(); DebugBreak(); }
15348 #define $$p              { txSleep(); if (txMessageBox (__TX_FILELINE__ "\n\n" "[Повтор] - продолжение программы,\n" "[Отмена] - остановка", \
15349                                                                          __TX_FUNCTION__, MB_ICONINFORMATION | MB_RETRYCANCEL) == IDCANCEL) ::exit (2); }
15350 #define $$P              ( txSleep(),     txMessageBox (__TX_FILELINE__, __TX_FUNCTION__, MB_ICONINFORMATION | MB_YESNOCANCEL) )
15351 #define $ppp             { { $sy; fprintf (stderr, "[%s ""%s: ""Нажмите любую клавишу для продолжения]", __TX_FILELINE__, __TX_FUNCTION__); } $P; { $sy; fprintf (stderr, "...\n"); } }
15352 #define $pp              { { $sy; fprintf (stderr, "[%04d %s: ""Нажмите любую клавишу для продолжения]", __LINE__,        __TX_FUNCTION__); } $P; { $sy; fprintf (stderr, "...\n"); } }
15353 #define $p               { { $sy; fprintf (stderr, "[%s ""%s(): Нажмите любую клавишу для продолжения]", __TX_FILELINE__, __func__);        } $P; { $sy; fprintf (stderr, "...\n"); } }
15354 #define $ppp_            { { $sy; fprintf (stderr, "[%s ""%s]",                                          __TX_FILELINE__, __TX_FUNCTION__); } $P; { $sy; fprintf (stderr, "...\n"); } }
15355 #define $pp_             { { $sy; fprintf (stderr, "[%04d %s]",                                          __LINE__,        __TX_FUNCTION__); } $P; { $sy; fprintf (stderr, "...\n"); } }
15356 #define $p_              { { $sy; fprintf (stderr, "[%s ""%s()]",                                        __TX_FILELINE__, __func__);        } $P; { $sy; fprintf (stderr, "...\n"); } }
15357 #define $P               ( txSleep(), ((int(*)()) (_getch)) () )  // Avoid "return value not used"
15358 
15359 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
15360 
15361 struct _txSaveConsoleAttr
15362     {
15363     unsigned attr_;
15364 
15365              _txSaveConsoleAttr()           : attr_ (txGetConsoleAttr ()) {}
15366     explicit _txSaveConsoleAttr (WORD attr) : attr_ (txGetConsoleAttr ()) { txSetConsoleAttr (attr);  }
15367             ~_txSaveConsoleAttr()                                         { txSetConsoleAttr (attr_); }
15368     };
15369 
15370 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
15371 
15372 struct _txDumpVarSuffix
15373     {
15374     typedef _txDumpVarSuffix this_t;
15375 
15376     const char* suffix_;
15377 
15378     explicit _txDumpVarSuffix (const char suffix[] = "") : suffix_ (suffix) { assert (suffix); }
15379             ~_txDumpVarSuffix()                          { ::std::cerr << suffix_; }
15380 
15381             _txDumpVarSuffix (const this_t&) _tx_delete;
15382     this_t& operator =       (const this_t&) _tx_delete;
15383     };
15384 
15385 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
15386 
15387 #define ARGS__  const char* prefix, const char* suffix, std::ios_base::fmtflags flags,                             int deep
15388 #define ARGS_   const char* prefix, const char* suffix, std::ios_base::fmtflags flags = std::ios_base::fmtflags(), int deep = 0
15389 #define VALS_   prefix, suffix, flags, deep
15390 
15391 template <typename T, typename StreamT> const T&    _txDumpVal (const T&  value, StreamT& stream, ARGS_);
15392 
15393 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
15394 
15395 template <typename T> inline const T&               _txDumpVar (const T&            value,          ARGS_)      { _txDumpVal (value, std:: cerr, VALS_); return value; }
15396 template <typename T> inline       T&               _txDumpVar (      T&            value,          ARGS_)      { _txDumpVal (value, std:: cerr, VALS_); return value; }
15397 
15398 template <int N>      inline const char           (&_txDumpVar (const char        (&value) [N],     ARGS_)) [N] { _txDumpVal (value, std:: cerr, VALS_); return value; }
15399 template <int N>      inline       char           (&_txDumpVar (      char        (&value) [N],     ARGS_)) [N] { _txDumpVal (value, std:: cerr, VALS_); return value; }
15400 
15401 template <int N>      inline const wchar_t        (&_txDumpVar (const wchar_t     (&value) [N],     ARGS_)) [N] { _txDumpVal (value, std::wcerr, VALS_); return value; }
15402 template <int N>      inline       wchar_t        (&_txDumpVar (      wchar_t     (&value) [N],     ARGS_)) [N] { _txDumpVal (value, std::wcerr, VALS_); return value; }
15403 
15404                       inline const wchar_t&         _txDumpVar (const wchar_t&      value,          ARGS_)      { _txDumpVal (value, std::wcerr, VALS_); return value; }
15405                       inline       wchar_t&         _txDumpVar (      wchar_t&      value,          ARGS_)      { _txDumpVal (value, std::wcerr, VALS_); return value; }
15406 
15407                       inline const wchar_t*&        _txDumpVar (const wchar_t*&     value,          ARGS_)      { _txDumpVal (value, std::wcerr, VALS_); return value; }
15408                       inline       wchar_t*&        _txDumpVar (      wchar_t*&     value,          ARGS_)      { _txDumpVal (value, std::wcerr, VALS_); return value; }
15409 
15410                       inline const std::wstring&    _txDumpVar (const std::wstring& value,          ARGS_)      { _txDumpVal (value, std::wcerr, VALS_); return value; }
15411                       inline       std::wstring&    _txDumpVar (      std::wstring& value,          ARGS_)      { _txDumpVal (value, std::wcerr, VALS_); return value; }
15412 
15413 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
15414 
15415 template <typename T, typename StreamT> inline void _txDumpVal (const T&            value, StreamT& stream)     {                     stream <<         value;                                    }
15416 template             <typename StreamT> inline void _txDumpVal (const char          value, StreamT& stream)     {                     stream <<  "'" << value <<  "'";                            }
15417 template             <typename StreamT> inline void _txDumpVal (const wchar_t       value, StreamT& stream)     {                     stream << L"'" << value << L"'";                            }
15418 template             <typename StreamT> inline void _txDumpVal (const char*         value, StreamT& stream)     { if (value)          stream <<  '"' << value <<  '"'; else stream <<  "(null)";  }
15419 template             <typename StreamT> inline void _txDumpVal (const wchar_t*      value, StreamT& stream)     { if (value)          stream << L'"' << value << L'"'; else stream << L"(null)";  }
15420 template             <typename StreamT> inline void _txDumpVal (const std::string&  value, StreamT& stream)     { if (value.length()) stream <<  '"' << value <<  '"'; else stream <<  "(empty)"; }
15421 template             <typename StreamT> inline void _txDumpVal (const std::wstring& value, StreamT& stream)     { if (value.length()) stream << L'"' << value << L'"'; else stream << L"(empty)"; }
15422 
15423 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
15424 
15425 template <typename T, typename StreamT>
15426 inline const T& _txDumpVal (const T& value, StreamT& stream, ARGS__)
15427     {
15428     if (_TX_ARGUMENT_FAILED (&value))  return value;
15429     if (_TX_ARGUMENT_FAILED (&stream)) return value;  //-V778
15430     if (_TX_ARGUMENT_FAILED ( prefix)) return value;
15431     if (_TX_ARGUMENT_FAILED ( suffix)) return value;
15432 
15433     $sc;
15434     if (!deep) stream << prefix;
15435 
15436     std::ios_base::fmtflags old = stream.flags ((flags)? flags : stream.flags());
15437 
15438     if (!_txIsBadReadPtr (&value))
15439         {
15440         _txDumpVal (value, stream);
15441         }
15442     else
15443         {
15444         $sE; stream << "<НЕВЕРНЫЙ АДРЕС " << &value << ">";
15445         }
15446 
15447     stream.flags (old);
15448 
15449     if (!deep) stream << ((*suffix == ']')? "" : ": ") << suffix;
15450 
15451     return value;
15452     }
15453 
15454 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
15455 
15456 template <typename T, int N>
15457 inline T (&_txDumpVar (T (&value) [N], ARGS_)) [N]
15458     {
15459     if (_TX_ARGUMENT_FAILED (&value))  return value;
15460     if (_TX_ARGUMENT_FAILED ( prefix)) return value;
15461     if (_TX_ARGUMENT_FAILED ( suffix)) return value;
15462 
15463     std::ostream& stream = std::cerr;
15464 
15465     $sc; if (!deep) std::cerr << prefix;
15466     $C;  std::cerr << ((deep)? " {" : "{");
15467 
15468     if (!_txIsBadReadPtr (value))
15469         {
15470         for (int i = 0; ; i++)
15471             {
15472             { $sC; stream << "[" << i << "]="; }
15473 
15474             _txDumpVar (value[i], prefix, suffix, flags, deep+1);
15475 
15476             if (i >= N-1) break;
15477 
15478             stream << ", ";
15479             }
15480         }
15481     else
15482         {
15483         $sE; stream << "<НЕВЕРНЫЙ АДРЕС " << &value << ">";
15484         }
15485 
15486     $C; std::cerr << "}";
15487     $c; if (!deep) std::cerr << ((*suffix == ']')? "" : ": ") << suffix;
15488 
15489     return value;
15490     }
15491 
15492 #undef ARGS__
15493 #undef ARGS_
15494 #undef VALS_
15495 
15496 //=================================================================================================================
15497 
15498 inline std::ostream& operator << (std::ostream& stream, const POINT& point)
15499     {
15500     if (_TX_ARGUMENT_FAILED (&stream)) return stream;
15501     if (_TX_ARGUMENT_FAILED (&point))  return stream;  //-V778
15502 
15503    if (&point) stream << "{ x: " << point.x << ", y: " << point.y << " }";            // NOLINT (clang-diagnostic-undefined-bool-conversion)
15504     else        stream << "(null)";
15505 
15506     return stream;
15507     }
15508 
15509 inline std::ostream& operator << (std::ostream& stream, const SIZE& size)
15510     {
15511     if (_TX_ARGUMENT_FAILED (&stream)) return stream;
15512     if (_TX_ARGUMENT_FAILED (&size))   return stream;  //-V778
15513 
15514     if (&size) stream << "{ cx: " << size.cx << ", cy: " << size.cy << " }";          // NOLINT (clang-diagnostic-undefined-bool-conversion)
15515     else       stream << "(null)";
15516 
15517     return stream;
15518     }
15519 
15520 inline std::ostream& operator << (std::ostream& stream, const RECT& rect)
15521     {
15522     if (_TX_ARGUMENT_FAILED (&stream)) return stream;
15523     if (_TX_ARGUMENT_FAILED (&rect))   return stream;  //-V778
15524 
15525     if (&rect) stream << "{ left: "  << rect.left  << ", top: "    << rect.top    <<  // NOLINT (clang-diagnostic-undefined-bool-conversion)
15526                          ", right: " << rect.right << ", bottom: " << rect.bottom << " }";
15527 
15528     else       stream << "(null)";
15529 
15530     return stream;
15531     }
15532 
15533 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
15535 
15536 #endif
15537 
15538 //}
15539 //=================================================================================================================

15546 //=================================================================================================================

15552 #define _txLocCurSet()                 __txLocCurSet (__FILE__, __LINE__, NULL)
15553 #endif

15558 #define txBitBlt(...)                  ( _txLocCurSet(), txBitBlt              (__VA_ARGS__) )

15561 #define txClear(...)                   ( _txLocCurSet(), txClear               (__VA_ARGS__) )
15562 #define txClearConsole(...)            ( _txLocCurSet(), txClearConsole        (__VA_ARGS__) )

15564 #define txCreateCompatibleDC(...)      ( _txLocCurSet(), txCreateCompatibleDC  (__VA_ARGS__) )

15593 #define txGetPixel(...)                ( _txLocCurSet(), txGetPixel            (__VA_ARGS__) )

15618 #define txRedrawWindow(...)            ( _txLocCurSet(), txRedrawWindow        (__VA_ARGS__) )
15619 #define txRegisterClass(...)           ( _txLocCurSet(), txRegisterClass       (__VA_ARGS__) )
15620 #define txRegisterClass(...)           ( _txLocCurSet(), txRegisterClass       (__VA_ARGS__) )
15621 #define txRegQuery(...)                ( _txLocCurSet(), txRegQuery            (__VA_ARGS__) )
15622 #define txReopenStdio(...)             ( _txLocCurSet(), txReopenStdio         (__VA_ARGS__) )
15623 #define txReopenStdio(...)             ( _txLocCurSet(), txReopenStdio         (__VA_ARGS__) )
15624 #define txRGB2HSL(...)                 ( _txLocCurSet(), txRGB2HSL             (__VA_ARGS__) )
15625 #define txSaveImage(...)               ( _txLocCurSet(), txSaveImage           (__VA_ARGS__) )
15626 #define txSelectFont(...)              ( _txLocCurSet(), txSelectFont          (__VA_ARGS__) )
15627 #define txSelectObject(...)            ( _txLocCurSet(), txSelectObject        (__VA_ARGS__) )
15628 #define txSetColor(...)                ( _txLocCurSet(), txSetColor            (__VA_ARGS__) )
15629 #define txSetConsoleAttr(...)          ( _txLocCurSet(), txSetConsoleAttr      (__VA_ARGS__) )
15630 #define txSetConsoleCursorPos(...)     ( _txLocCurSet(), txSetConsoleCursorPos (__VA_ARGS__) )
15631 #define txSetDefaults(...)             ( _txLocCurSet(), txSetDefaults         (__VA_ARGS__) )
15632 #define txSetFillColor(...)            ( _txLocCurSet(), txSetFillColor        (__VA_ARGS__) )
15633 #define txSetLocale(...)               ( _txLocCurSet(), txSetLocale           (__VA_ARGS__) )
15634 #define txSetPixel(...)                ( _txLocCurSet(), txSetPixel            (__VA_ARGS__) )
15635 #define txSetTextAlign(...)            ( _txLocCurSet(), txSetTextAlign        (__VA_ARGS__) )
15636 #define txSetWindowsHook(...)          ( _txLocCurSet(), txSetWindowsHook      (__VA_ARGS__) )
15637 #define txSleep(...)                   ( _txLocCurSet(), txSleep               (__VA_ARGS__) )
15638 #define txSpeak(...)                   ( _txLocCurSet(), txSpeak               (__VA_ARGS__) )
15639 #define txTextCursor(...)              ( _txLocCurSet(), txTextCursor          (__VA_ARGS__) )
15640 #define txTextOut(...)                 ( _txLocCurSet(), txTextOut             (__VA_ARGS__) )
15641 #define txTransparentBlt(...)          ( _txLocCurSet(), txTransparentBlt      (__VA_ARGS__) )
15642 #define txTriangle(...)                ( _txLocCurSet(), txTriangle            (__VA_ARGS__) )
15643 #define txUnlock(...)                  ( _txLocCurSet(), txUnlock              (__VA_ARGS__) )
15644 #define txUpdateWindow(...)            ( _txLocCurSet(), txUpdateWindow        (__VA_ARGS__) )
15645 #define txUseAlpha(...)                ( _txLocCurSet(), txUseAlpha            (__VA_ARGS__) )
15646 #define txVersion(...)                 ( _txLocCurSet(), txVersion             (__VA_ARGS__) )
15647 #define txVersionNumber(...)           ( _txLocCurSet(), txVersionNumber       (__VA_ARGS__) )
15648 #define txWindow(...)                  ( _txLocCurSet(), txWindow              (__VA_ARGS__) )
15649 #define tx_fpreset(...)                ( _txLocCurSet(), tx_fpreset            (__VA_ARGS__) )
15650 #define tx_glGetError(...)             ( _txLocCurSet(), tx_glGetError         (__VA_ARGS__) )
15651 #define _txDump(...)                   ( _txLocCurSet(), _txDump               (__VA_ARGS__) )
15652 #define _txStackBackTrace(...)         ( _txLocCurSet(), _txStackBackTrace     (__VA_ARGS__) )
15653 
15654 #endif
15655 
15656 //}
15657 //=================================================================================================================
15658 
15660 //}
15661 //=================================================================================================================
15662 
15663 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
15664 //{          The namespaces
15665 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
15666 
15669 _TX_END_NAMESPACE
15670 
15673 using namespace TX;                    // Allow easy usage of TXLib functions
15674 
15675 using ::std::cin;                      // Predefined usings to avoid "using namespace std"
15676 using ::std::cout;
15677 using ::std::cerr;
15678 using ::std::string;
15679 using ::std::wcin;
15680 using ::std::wcout;
15681 using ::std::wcerr;
15682 using ::std::wstring;
15683 
15684 //}
15685 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
15686 
15687 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
15688 //{          Compiler- and platform-specific
15689 //           Адаптация к компиляторам и платформам
15690 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
15692 
15693 #if defined (_GCC_VER)
15694 
15695     #pragma GCC optimize               "strict-aliasing"
15696 
15697     #pragma GCC pop_options
15698     #pragma GCC diagnostic pop
15699 
15700     #endif
15701 
15702 #if defined (_CLANG_VER)
15703 
15704     #pragma clang diagnostic pop
15705 
15706     #endif
15707 
15708 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
15709 
15710 #if defined (_MSC_VER)
15711 
15712     #pragma warning (pop)              // Restoring maximum level
15713 
15714     #endif
15715 
15716 #if defined (__INTEL_COMPILER)
15717 
15718     #pragma warning (default:  174)    // Remark: expression has no effect
15719     #pragma warning (default:  304)    // Remark: access control not specified ("public" by default)
15720     #pragma warning (default:  444)    // Remark: destructor for base class "..." is not virtual
15721     #pragma warning (default:  522)    // Remark: function redeclared "inline" after being called
15722     #pragma warning (default: 1684)    // Conversion from pointer to same-sized integral type (potential portability problem)
15723 
15724     #pragma warning (disable:  981)    // Remark: operands are evaluated in unspecified order
15725 
15726     #endif
15727 
15729 //}
15730 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
15731 
15732 #endif // __TXLIB_H_INCLUDED
15733
